title: Technical Illustrator (Part-Time 1-Year Contract) (Peterborough, ON, CA)
description:
At BWXT Nuclear Energy Canada Inc. we are committed to excellence in every business initiative. BWXT Nuclear Energy Canada (BWXT NEC) has achieved an enviable international reputation for excellence in the supply of nuclear fuel and fuel handling systems and service for CANDU reactors in both domestic and international markets. Our success is the result of our commitment to our employees, customers, quality & EHS initiatives.

 

Technical Illustrator (Part Time 1-Year Contract)

 

We are looking for a Technical Illustrator (Part Time 1-Year Contract) for our Peterborough, Ontario site.  BWXT NEC's Fuel Handling and Engineered Solutions group is involved in the design, manufacture, development, testing, parts supply, and service of on-power refueling, reactor maintenance, and nuclear medicine delivery tooling sold around the world. We are the original designer of the automated systems that allow 24/7 on power refueling of CANDU reactors and aim to solve some of the Nuclear Industry’s most challenging problems. Today, BWXT’s equipment is being used in most of the nuclear power plants in Canada and is critical to delivering carbon free energy production and lifesaving medical isotopes.

 

Check out the YouTube video of an innovative product we recently designed and manufactured in partnership with Bruce Power, called the Bruce Reactor Inspection and Maintenance System Channel Access Device. Go to YouTube and search for video: “Bruce Unveils new BRIMS Tool”. There are exceptional opportunities to learn and grow with a career in the nuclear industry in Ontario.

 

The Peterborough community invites you to take a deep breath, relax and enjoy life. We have an abundance of recreational opportunities, festivals, and entertainment that is fueled by culture, nature and homegrown culinary experiences. Friendly people, inspiring landscapes and incredible lakes are waiting for you in the heart of cottage country. The region is home to 140,000 people (approx. 83,000 in the City of Peterborough) in addition to the charming towns, townships and villages that make up the County. We offer the best of all worlds here and we’d like you to get to know us a bit better. http://peterboroughed.ca/why-peterborough/live/

 

 

Role Summary/Purpose:

 

Create Field Maintenance Procedures and Maintenance Manuals to support Fuel Handling products. Technical Illustrators are responsible for conveying information and requirements to technical writers to produce manuals, along with obtaining information from internal engineering departments.  They are also responsible for communicating job status, and obtaining information from technical writers when required. 

 

Responsibilities:

  • Prepare new and revised field maintenance procedures, incorporating peer, engineering and customer comments and feedback. 
  • Review and research requirements for table of contents, FMP source data, design inputs and illustration requirements.
  • Work in an Engineering environment with other illustrators and in collaboration with teams of Professional Engineers and Technologists.
  • Assist others on specific projects.

 

Required:

  • Technical Illustration college diploma – preferably mechanical or electro-mechanical specialization.
  • Technical illustrating experience creating illustrations of complex electro-mechanical equipment – preferably in Nuclear industry.
  • Excellent B&W line art skills, demonstrating exploded views and step by step assembly views.
  • Excellent computer skills with proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Acrobat, MS Word, and PowerPoint.
  • Understanding of 3D modelling and rendering principles and importing models into illustration software.
  • Proficient in reading mechanical and electrical schematics, flow sheets, drawings, bills of materials, and technical specifications of complex equipment.

 

Desired:

  • Preferred minimum 10 years of related experience.
  • Previous experience in the nuclear industry is considered an asset.
  • Portfolio samples of B&W line art.
  • Knowledge of Interleaf is beneficial.
  • Excellent time management skills to meet deadlines while managing various writing assignments simultaneously.
  • Excellent communication skills, verbal and written.
  • Detail-oriented in organizing technical illustration libraries.

 

We thank you for your interest, however, only those candidates under consideration will be contacted.

 

BWXT Nuclear Energy Canada Inc. embraces diversity of thought, values individuality, encourages new perspectives and provides equal opportunity in employment for all qualified employees and applicants without regard to race, national or ethnic origin, colour, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, family status, disability, a conviction for which a pardon has been granted or a record suspended or any other category protected by federal law.

title: Painter
description:
We know excellent painters when we see them. They’re the kind of people who are always ready and treat others’ homes like their own. They make quality and attention to detail part of their routine, and always want to get the job done right.

We need a new Painter at Handyman Connection of Kelowna, the ideal person might know painting, but also have a variety of home improvement skills to support the growth of our business. This could be someone who already does and knows how to truly work as an independent, or even as a self-employed contractor. 

Benefits:
  • Competitive wages in the area at $27- $35  depending on skills/experience 
  • Enjoy the flexible schedule of an independent contractor
  • Back end support from a professional office team
  • Custom mobile app to book appointments and communicate with others
  • Marketing support to assist in locating clients
  • Make a living in beautiful Kelowna and the surrounding area
  • Work for appreciative customers who LOVE Handyman Connection
Apply today to become a painter with Handyman Connection of Kelowna!

Job Summary:
  • Prepares various surfaces for painting by washing, scraping, burning, sanding, sandblasting, or other means as necessary.
  • Mixes, matches, and blends various paints, enamels, lacquers, varnishes, stains and special protective coatings to achieve desired color, consistency, and drying properties. Caulks, putties, cements or plasters holes and cracks.
  • Paints using brush, roller, spray gun or other applicator. Prepares wall and hangs paper or other wall covering material.
  • Ability to determine and clearly identify proper materials and material quantities for new and existing projects.
  • Evaluate customer requests, price projects, troubleshoot customer issues, and present a description of a work order to a customer.
  • Knowledge of other trades is highly desirable.
Job Requirements
  • Experience in helping homeowners for at least 5 years or more
  • Have enjoyment in finding solutions for homeowners and then surpassing expectations
  • Good collaboration skills with fellow craftsmen
  • Strong time management skills
  • Good communication
  • Valid driver's license
  • Personal, reliable transportation
  • Self-starter with little supervision
  • Comply with company policy

Start a rewarding career with Handyman Connection in Kelowna – apply today!

title: Beauty Artist - Square One
description:
The Beauty Artist provides exceptional customer service by creating a unique, inviting, entertaining, and educational multi-brand shopping destination for the Morphe babe and demonstrates their artistry skills with clients upon request. In addition, this person must create a collaborative work environment on the sales floor, provide excellent service and meet and exceed store financial goals. In addition, the Beauty Artist will be responsible for operational activities as assigned.

Sales

  • Provides the full Morphe customer service experience in store, delivering sales to meet or exceed targets.
  • Meets or exceeds all personal goals to positively contribute to the team and the store.

Service

  • Provide excellent customer service and product knowledge, offering full service experience and/or simple service depending on customers’ needs.
  • Positive representative of the Morphe brand, always demonstrating professionalism and poise.
  • Support promotions, events and launches to deliver the intended experience for customers.
  • Consistently elevate own artistry skills.
  • Attends all required trainings and completes educational and developmental tools as assigned.
  • Develops knowledge of trends in industry to provide best service possible and share with the squad

Leadership

  • Contributes to a productive and dynamic Morphe squad by connecting with employees, customers, and influencers.
  • Acts with professionalism and respect in all interactions with customers, co-workers, management and business associates.

Operations

  • Must adhere to all company policies and procedures. Immediately report any variances to a Manager or a People partner.
  • Assists in execution of visual displays, merchandising and marketing standards ensuring the store is consistently replenished.
  • Assists in the preparation and completion of accurate physical inventory as assigned.
  • Assists with non-sell tasks as assigned by Management and as part of the regular daily responsibilities.
  • Accurately ring sales and use the POS correctly.
  • Arrives to work on time and consistently follows the Morphe personal appearance guidelines.
  • Follows all safety and emergency procedures.
  • Identifies potential loss prevention issues. 
  • Perform additional duties as assigned. 

Qualifications

  • 2 years retail experience, previous sales experience required.
  • Excellent customer service, communication and organizational skills.
  • Ability to multi-task and build relationships.
  • Flexibility and the ability to handle change in a positive manner.
  • Cosmetic artistry experience a plus.
  • Demonstrated ability to support business growth and exhibit professional behavior. 
  • Have and maintain flexible availability.
  • Must have open flexibility to work during peak traffic times including evenings, weekends and holidays. 
  • Able to lift, push and pull up to 50 pounds.
  • Able to stand on your feet for up to 8 hours.

Must be able to perform essential functions (with or without an accommodation) without posing a "direct threat" to the health and safety to self or others.

The Company reserves the right to alter, change, abolish and even combine jobs depending upon changing conditions.

No recruitment agencies, please.

title: Painter
description:
We are looking for motivated individuals to join our painting team! The painter role is a fun and challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable, and has effective communication skills. 

Compensation: Top painters can make $20-$28/hour; average rate is $18/hour.

About the position:

  • Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary
  • Fast paced, fun environment
  • Hands on experience in customer service and communication
  • Work outdoors with a crew of 2-3 people
  • Can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company
Requirements:
  • Must have own transportation (job site locations change frequently)
  • Manual labor and ladder work required

Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together if you wish!

title: Full time Painters Needed!
description:
We are looking for experienced, reliable painters. Ideal candidates are individuals who can work as a team and lead their own crew. Painter duties include, but are not limited to;

  • Preparing and cleaning exterior surfaces using methods such as washing, scraping, sanding and priming. 
  • Prepare and clean interior surfaces by washing, repairing cracks and holes in walls, applying filler, sanding and applying sealer.
  • Applying paint, stains or other finish applications using brushes, rollers or spray equipment.

What are the benefits of being a painter with us?

Dependable, hardworking painters are the backbone our company. This job opportunity is perfect for someone who enjoys working outside and being part of a reliable high-energy team.

  • You will be provided with Workers Compensation coverage.
  • Wages are competitive.
  • Room to advance to a crew foreman or production manager during the current season.

What are the requirements?

  • Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required.
  • Labour experience (landscaping, warehouse work. heavy equipment work, etc.) and athletics are also considered assets.

Training will be provided to all successful applicants to teach company policy, the tricks and techniques used in the painting industry, as well as jobsite safety procedures.

title: Studio Artist
description:
As a Studio Artist in our specialized content studio, Wander, you are eager to join a fast-paced, growing team. You’re excited to put your versatile creativity to the test executing world-class content creation. Expertise in video and motion design is essential to the role—and we’ll take your experience in other areas of content creation too. From conceptualization to execution and delivery, you’ll be a trusted consultant throughout the creative process. But you’re not in this alone—with guidance and mentorship from a team of producers, directors, editors, and more, you’ll grow in your role. And you get that being part of this team means working collaboratively is just as important as an individual skillset.

The deadline to apply is April 19, 2022.

You Will:

  • Create complex animations and video content for a variety of digital media platforms across campaigns.
  • Edit post-production video and audio.
  • Be an active part of the Studio team in-house and on location during photo and film shoots.
  • Conceptualize and execute creative project work.
  • Collaborate and build relationships within the Studio team and across disciplines.
  • Maintain focus and quality while working in a fast-paced and flexible environment.

You Have:

  • A graphic design degree or both knowledge and experience with graphics and motion design.
  • A strong portfolio and reel showing proven experience in motion design and creative editorial.
  • Proficiency in After Effects.
  • Working knowledge of Premiere.
  • Additional experience in Adobe Creative Suite and other industry-standard editing programs.
  • Some experience in sound design, music supervision, and experience.
  • Additional experience with audio and video production is an asset.

title: Conformation Artist
description:
Company Description

Mikros Animation is a global CGI animation studio located in Paris, Montreal, Los Angeles, Bangalore and London, dedicated to feature films and episodic content. Since its inception, Mikros Animation has always put creativity and CG artistry at the heart of its animation and production activities, allowing our artists to work across a great variety of stories with a high level of stylized craft. So far, Mikros Animation has contributed to ten released feature animations and to numerous high-quality animated series, for the world’s best-known animation studios, either as creative studio, line producer or executive producer. Mikros Animation has also produced more than 250 hours of programming, broadcast by notable channels including Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, TF1, France TV, Gulli, M6, Gloob, and Super RTL. Our animated episodic content airs and streams globally, in over 180 countries.

At Mikros Animation, we believe great animation is about making real connections with real people. By partnering with filmmakers to unite their creative visions, with our industry-leading craftsmanship and artistry, we create characters that connect with audiences on an authentic and emotional level to bring powerful stories to life.

Job Description

  • Check the continuity of shots and sequences for the camera, location, assets and props throughout the pipeline
  • Monitor new assets produced by the modelling department, update and replace as required;
  • Work with TDs to quickly resolve any specific technical issues;
  • Prepare Maya scenes for animation, lighting and rendering;
  • Identify potential animation and FX collisions in order to report them to the appropriate department
  • Complete Final Set Dress adjustments as requested by the artistic director
Qualifications

  • The ideal candidate is thorough and will demonstrate an excellent understanding of the pipeline
  • Motivated, able to prioritize and respect deadlines
  • Autonomous and proactive in solving possible technical problems
  • Comfortable working with others, across various departments
  • Consistent and active understanding of Maya
  • Knowledge of Shotgun and Katana is a plus
  • Scripting in Python/Mel is also a plus
  • Knowledge of Shotgun software
  • French is an asset


Additional Information

Please click here to review our privacy notices for job applicants.

If you require assistance applying, please reach out to talent@thefocus.com and we'll be happy to assist.

title: Lighting Artist
description:
Company Description

This job application remains open even when we don’t have roles available. If you would like to be considered, please apply and we will contact you as soon as we have an opening.

The Moving Picture Company (MPC) is a global creative studio with a single goal: to create experiences that move people. With decades of storytelling experience, we are perpetually pushing the limits of what is technologically and artistically possible to tell visually stunning stories.

MPC continues to lead in an ever-evolving industry, building authentic and long-lasting connections with audiences across all channels.

moving-picture.com

Job Description

Lighting artists produce high-quality lighting and rendering for our CG scenes

You’ll be engaging at every stage of production including pre-visualization of complicated sequences, look development, and research and development. You’ll optimize and troubleshoot lighting and rendering problems in a fast-paced environment.

Working closely with CG Supervisors/Leads, lighting artists determine best approaches to solve 3D challenges and develop final looks.

Lighting artists also work closely with compositors to finish selected shots so that computer generated elements are seamlessly integrated with live-action plates.

If you have a passion for lighting, then we want to hear from you!

Qualifications

Lighting Essentials:

· Experience with Houdini

· Strong knowledge of rendering techniques

Any of the following technical skills is a bonus:

· Intermediate-level compositing experience (Nuke)

· Ability to problem solve and predict potential problems with assigned tasks

· Experience with Renderman, Redshift, and/or Mantra

· Experience with Houdini Digital Assets, VOPS and VEX

· Experience with Python scripting

· Experience with Texture Painting, 3D Modeling or Look Development

Any of the following experience is a great advantage:

· Ability to manage personal as well as team milestones and deadlines

· Previous experience in a VFX environment

· Strong communication skills are critical. Candidate must be able to work within a team, taking direction and exercising attention to detail in a fast-paced production environment

· Knowledge of photography, lighting and composition

The details above provide an outline of the key requirements for candidates to apply for a role in this department. At MRX we have a number of job classifications within our artist team structure. These are:

· Artist

· Key Artist

· Technical Artist

· Lead

· Head of Department

Based on your skills we will assess your suitability for a particular role during the application process.

This job application remains open even when we don’t have roles available. If you would like to be considered, please apply and we will contact you as soon as we have an opening.



Additional Information

Please click here to review our privacy notices for job applicants.

If you require assistance applying please reach out to talent@thefocus.com and we'll be happy to assist.

title: Painter
description:
Full Time/Part Time (Painter)

We are currently looking for self-motivated and outgoing individuals who are looking for a challenging opportunity to join our team as a full-time painter. The ideal candidate is a painting professional with the highest standards with experience in residential and commercial re-paints and new paints and high attention to detail with a passion for painting. They must be physically able to perform the duties of the job, which include performing repetitive movements, standing for long periods, lifting heavy objects, climbing stairs, and ladders, etc.

Compensation:

$22 - $28.50 hourly

Responsibilities:

  • Overall management of interior and exterior painting projects
  • Delivery of an extraordinary experience to our customers
  • Complete projects according to work orders in a timely and professional fashion
  • Inspect work for the highest quality
  • Maintain material and supply inventory
  • Follow all safety policies and procedures
  • Ensure that required documentation is complete and is in compliance with regulations and standards

Qualifications:

  • Previous experience in painting or other related fields
  • Minimum 2 years of experience verifiable through references
  • Familiarity with painting tools and equipment
  • Ability to handle physical workload
  • Deadline and detail-oriented
  • Ability to independently solve problems
  • Customer service-oriented, you like getting a job done right
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Must have a smartphone and basic computer skills since that’s how we dispatch our orders.
  • Exceptional customer service skills
  • Must be able to receive direction from the team leader and project manager as directed
  • Highly organized and self-motivated
  • Quality conscious and detail-oriented
  • Unrestricted driver's license and clean driving record
  • Must be willing to undergo and pass a criminal background check
  • Must be clean and tidy
About Company

Rite Painters & Reno is one of Toronto’s fastest-growing painting companies. We do commercial, residential, exterior, and interior projects. We treat our team like family. We take care of getting you the work, all you have to do is focus on the project. Behind every excellent paint job, are the people who get to know the homeowner, help craft the design, improve the look and feel and even keep the project moving along. At Rite Painters & Reno we’re looking for more people who can do that.

title: Painter
description:
FULL/PART-TIME PAINTING POSITIONS AVAILABLE!!!

*CURRENTLY HIRING FOR 2022*

ACT NOW TO SECURE YOUR POSITION IN ONE OF CANADA’S TOP  PAINTING FRANCHISES!

  

Our painting team is looking for highly-motivated individuals to join us!

We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most efficient people in Whitecourt, Alberta, who want to join a family of awesome staff and team culture, who are also looking to earn what they are worth and optimize their cash flow!

This past year alone, our team provided 60+ top-quality paint jobs in the Whitecourt area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which created a happy work atmosphere and rewarded employees. 
For 2022 we are hoping to provide an even better service and employ, train and optimize an even stronger team!
We are looking to hire our team, starting in the early spring of 2022!

About this job:
- Fast paced, fun environment with incentivized pay scale.
- Hands on experience in customer service and communication
- Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
- Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application, we love hiring teams of Rockstar’s!
- Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary! We teach everyone how to paint!
- We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company for those with the right attitude!
- We are also hiring seasonal staff for those of you who are just looking for a summer job! Act quickly, our summer positions will fill up fast!

What will be expected of you: 
- Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
- Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
- Motivation for $$$ (With this company you truly get out what you put in)
- Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
- Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably
- Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided
- Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
- Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
- A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self improvement
 

What benefits will you get? 
- Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top notch safety training.
- Lots of opportunity to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as company offered prizes and incentives.
- Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.)
- Working with other like-minded and fun individuals. 
- Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during P.A.D (performance, availability and discussion) meetings.
- Working outside in the fresh air! 
- A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!


Position Descriptions

Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.
Bonuses and Incentives as well as pay increases provided for people in this position. 
 

 If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.

title: Technical Artist - Internship - Summer 2022
description:
The Technical Artist is essential to ensure that technology, tools and processes are in place to realize the artistic vision of a project. He/She works with the creative team to explain the capabilities and limitations of the technology, as well as with the technical team to promote the needs of artists and find multiple solutions to technological issues.

To be considered for this internship, you must:
Submit your portfolio along with your resume;
Be eligible to work in Canada at the time of your application;
Be available to work 37.5 hours per week.

The internship dates are flexible, depending on the business needs and the candidate’s availabilities. 

In this role you will:

  • Acts as a resource person for the team members to determine the technical impact of the artistic vision;
  • Simplifies production by finding ways to automate tasks and improve processes;
  • Develops best practices, solutions and tools in order to solve problems;
  • Promotes the reuse of assets, know-how and tools across multiple projects;
  • Ensures that the team has the technical expertise to do the work required in the project;
  • Establishes communication between the creative and technical teams;
  • Basic comprehension of the rendering pipeline in order to gauge the impact on performance.

What we're looking for :

  • Degree in Fine arts, Computer science or Engineering;
  • Knowledge related to 3D modeling, textures, frames, animation, lighting, special effects;
  • Good Knowledge in real time 3D graphics and digital content creation pipeline;
  • Good communication skills;
  • Interest and understanding of nodal scripting and programming (materials and shaders an asset);
  • Experience with commercial 3D tools (Maya, 3ds Max, Substance);
  • Realtime and pre-calculated lighting knowledge (asset);
  • Mandatory experience with Unity and Unreal.

Dans ce rôle vous devrez :

  • Agit en tant que personne ressource pour les membres de l'équipe afin de déterminer l'impact technique de la vision artistique;
  • Simplifie la production en trouvant des moyens d'automatiser les tâches et d'améliorer les processus;
  • Développe un ensemble de meilleures pratiques, de solutions et d’outils afin de résoudre les problèmes;
  • Promeut la réutilisation des ressources, du savoir-faire et des outils sur plusieurs projets;
  • Cherche à repousser constamment les limites de la technologie;
  • Établit une bonne communication entre les équipes créatives et techniques;
  • Compréhension basique des étapes et des méthodes de rendu afin d'évaluer l'impact sur la performance.

Ce que nous recherchons :

  • Diplôme en beaux-arts, en informatique ou en génie;
  • Expérience en modélisation 3D, textures, cadrage, animation, éclairage, effets spéciaux et scripts;
  • Connaissances techniques en graphisme 3D en temps réel ainsi qu’en techniques de création de contenu numérique
  • Bonnes compétences en communication
  • Intérêt et compréhension des scripts et de la programmation;
  • Expérience avec des outils 3D commerciaux (Maya, 3ds Max, Substance);
  • Expérience obligatoire avec Unity et Unreal;
  • Comprendre le matériel de rendu sur plusieurs plateformes, en particulier les appareils mobiles, les PC et les consoles de génération actuelles;
L'artiste technique est essentiel pour s'assurer que la technologie, les outils et les processus sont en place afin de réaliser la vision artistique d'un projet. Il travaille avec l'équipe créative pour leur expliquer les capacités et les limites de la technologie, ainsi qu'avec l'équipe technique pour mettre en avant les besoins des artistes et trouver de multiples solutions aux problèmes technologiques.


Pour être considéré.e pour cette opportunité de stage tu dois :  
Être disponible pour travailler 37. 5 heures par semaine;Inclure ton un portfolio avec ton CV; Être éligible à travailler au Canada au moment de postuler. 

Les dates de stages sont flexibles, dépendamment des besoins d’affaire et des disponibilités des candidats.

title: Painter
description:
ACT NOW TO SECURE YOUR POSITION IN ONE OF CANADAâ€™S TOP  PAINTING FRANCHISES!

 

 

Our painting team is looking for highly-motivated individuals to join us!

title: Painter
description:
I am looking for motivated and hard-working individuals to join my painting team for the summer season. No prior experience is needed! I am looking for energetic individuals who excel in attention to detail, have a fantastic attitude, and are open to learning new skills! I will teach you everything you’ll need to know to be successful in the position. Fully personalized training is available, as well as full safety training to ensure you are always doing things properly! I will be operating primarily out of Chestermere, Strathmore, and Langdon, with jobs just outside these areas as well.

ABOUT THE JOB

 - Fast pace, incentivized pay scale

 - Hands-on experience in customer service & communicattion

 - Working outdoors and/or with your friends! It is encouraged to apply together and if you do, make sure to note it in your application!

 - I am hiring for Painters & Crew Managers; both positions are full-time, and the seasonality of painting makes it a great option for students!

WHAT IS EXPECTED OF YOU

 - A great attitude! I hire for attitude, these skills are teachable

 - Reliable Transportation: Jobsites vary from day to day, so it is essential you have a valid driver's license and full-time vehicle access.

 - Ability to work on ladders and at heights.

 - Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality.

 THE BENEFITS

 - Full training for painting the interiors and exteriors of homes and buildings.

 - Full safety training with WCB coverage.

 - Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependant on experience, raises based on proven skill. Bonuses to be established)

 - Strong mentorship, and the opportunity to work with like-minded individuals.

 - Working outside!

POSITION DESCRIPTIONS

Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard-working, coachable, and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role, you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
*Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.

I hope we have the opportunity to work with one another this summer, and I look forward to chatting with you!

- Michaela

title: Painter
description:
I am looking to hire 10 -12 awesome people to join my painting team this spring/summer! If you or anyone you know is looking to have an amazing summer working outside and making good money, please don't hesitate to reach out! You can email me at Madison.m@studentworks.ca or give me a call at (403) 402-1754!

 

SALARY FOR PAINTERS

 

We will discuss pay structure on our first call together, although motivated painters typically earn between $7,000 - $11,000 by summer's end! (May - August). This comes from attention to detail, efficiency, and hard work over the course of the summer together!

 

EXPECTATIONS FOR YOU TO HAVE OF ME:

 

All training and coaching provided by myself personally/job site manager

Positive and competitive team culture/environment

Control over your earning potential, the harder you work, the more you make!

Safety insurance security with WCB and safety course training

 

REQUIREMENTS FOR APPLICANTS

 

Full time access to a vehicle

Physical ability to work outside during the summer, ability to  move equipment

Attention to detail and finishing projects thoroughly in the highest quality

Positive attitude, and commitment to the position throughout the summer

 

APPLICATION PROCESS

 

To apply, please email your resumÃ© to Madison.m@studentworks.ca - Please ensure your resume is up to date with all appropriate work history and references!

title: Storyboard Artist
description:
Overview:

Company 3 Animation (CO3) provides a high-quality global animation service provider supporting creators in bringing their stories to life. Our team of world-class animation production veterans are innovators and problem-solvers. CO3 Animation is a wholly owned subsidiary of Company3 (www.company3.com)

 

Company 3 Animation is growing and weâ€™re seeking a highly skilled Storyboard Artist for an animated feature series. The role of Storyboard Artist is to create dynamic Storyboards for the creation of an animatic matching the established visual aesthetic amongst a team of international artists.

 

Role Responsibilities:

  • The Storyboard Artist is responsible for expert level composition, screen direction, camera angles, staging, posing, pace, and timing.
  • Follow instructions of creative supervisors and Director.
  • Ensure quality and style of show is consistently achieved in storyboard work.
  • Follow accurate document management requirements.
  • according to the productionâ€™s guidelines.
  • Meet all deadlines as determined by Line Producer or Production Manager.
  • Attend and contribute to meetings and pitches as needed.
  • Establishes and shares tips and tricks to streamline processes and expertly deliver on the required aesthetics of the show.
  • Will be required to pitch Storyboards.

 

Job Qualifications:

  • Bachelor degree in Animation, Film, Art or equivalent professional work experience.
  • Minimum of 3 years storyboard experience and/or training on a similar show.
  • Strong staging and composition skills.
  • Understanding of subtext in character performance.
  • Work well under pressure.
  • Link to Demo Reel/Portfolio showcasing 3D effects work done in recent years.

About the Company: 

Company 3 â€¯/ Method Studios provides a full range of Creative Services for content creators, including conceptual design, pre-vis, look development, ideation and rapid prototyping, 3D animation/CGI, motion graphics/designers, matte painting, compositing, dailies and production services, color grading, post-production finishing, marketing/trailers, live-action production, experiences, and more.â€¯ 

Creativity has diversity at its core. We celebrate the value of each unique experience by being dedicated to fostering the most diverse, equitable and inclusive culture where every employee feels empowered and safe to show up to work as their full self.

It is our policy to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees. Please inform the company's HR representative if you need assistance completing any forms or to otherwise participate in the application process.

title: Dessinateur Technique
description:
Description de l'entreprise

Laura Canada est une entreprise familiale iconique et innovatrice qui exploite Laura et Melanie Lyne, deux grandes bannières de vêtements pour femmes. Établie à Laval, au Québec, Laura Canada conçoit, produit, commercialise et distribue des vêtements de qualité partout au Canada. Nous sommes fiers d’employer plus de 2 000 collègues dévoués et d’exploiter plus de 140 magasins et deux boutiques en ligne. Notre succès repose sur l’engagement inconditionnel de notre équipe à offrir une expérience client exceptionnelle tout en incarnant nos valeurs d’intégrité, de respect, d’esprit d’équipe, de performance et de passion.

Nous croyons qu’une expérience client exceptionnelle est motivée par notre engagement à offrir une expérience exceptionnelle à nos employés.

Le genre masculin est utilisé comme générique, dans le seul but de ne pas alourdir le texte

Description du poste

Conçoit les fiches techniques pour la confection de chacun des modèles à produire de façon à ce que les échantillons soient exécutables.  Soumet les fiches techniques complètes dans les délais prescrits en travaillant en collaboration avec les designers et les gérants de catégorie.

Fonctions critiques

1. Dessin et conception des collections

  • Conçoit les fiches techniques pour la production locale et à l’étranger.
  • Fait les croquis des modèles à l’aide du logiciel Illustrator.
  • Demande tous les numéros de tissu et de modèle pour la production locale et à l’étranger.
  • Prépare toutes les fiches techniques à remettre aux coordonnateurs de la production à l’étranger.
    • Prépare les documents et échantillons à envoyer à nos manufactures.
    • Prépare la carte des couleurs.
    • Prépare tous les échantillons originaux à envoyer.
    • Prépare les copies à envoyer à la manufacture et aux coordonnateurs de la production à l’étranger.
    • Classe tous les documents.
  • S’occupe du suivi sur les tissus, des prix initiaux, des échantillonnages, des garnitures, etc. avec le fournisseur (information nécessaire pour commencer le concept/la collection).
  • Travaille avec le designer pour créer, exécuter et tenir à jour les tableaux des collections (Illustrator et InDesign). S’assure que tous les documents sont à jour.
  • Recherche, si nécessaire, des garnitures, des confections spéciales pour les vêtements, des broderies et fournit des idées sur les tendances au designer.
  • Mesure les échantillons originaux, au besoin.
  • Crée les spécifications initiales, au besoin.
  • Commente les échantillons prototypes, au besoin.
  • Participe aux séances d’essayage, au besoin.

Responsabilités additionnelles

  • Respecte toutes les politiques et procédures actuelles et nouvelles de l’entreprise (ex. : prévention des pertes, santé et sécurité, ressources humaines).
Qualifications

Exigences

  • Diplôme en design de mode
  • 3 à 5 années d’expérience à un poste similaire
  • Maîtrise du logiciel Adobe Illustrator
  • Excellente connaissance des tissus et des garnitures
  • Connaissance des mesures et spécifications des vêtements
  • Connaissance de la confection du vêtement
  • Capacité à prioriser et à respecter les échéances
  • Flair pour la mode
  • Souci du détail
  • Créativité
  • Bilinguisme


Informations supplémentaires

Conditions et milieu de travail

  • Il s'agit d'un poste à temps plein
  • Travailler assis/debout/en marchant.
  • Se déplacer dans la région, incluant hors de la ville.

title: Painter
description:
We are a well established company in Victoria BC with an extensive number of exciting residential and commercial projects coming up this season.  We operate all year round and are looking to add multiple people to our busy season.  Most of our work is located in Victoria and the surrounding area (Sooke to Sidney and in between).  We offer a fair and competitive wage that reflects your experience level: ($18-$30/ Hr) as well as other perks and incentives!

Applicants:

Ideal applicants will have a minimum of 1-2 years experience and a broad set of painting skills to tackle the variety of projects we complete as each job is unique however we also offer on the job training if you donâ€™t already have the experience but have an interest in beginning a painting career.

**On site training for the right candidate available**

Characteristics:

Team player- A willingness to collaborate and work in a team environment.

Flexible- An ability to be flexible and adapt to changes of situation calmly and effectively.

Reliability- Knowing that honesty is always the best way and being accountable on a daily basis (be on time, finish what you start, say please and thank you, be a team player!)

Communication- The ability to communicate clearly and effectively with both coworkers and clients as well as the ability to demonstrate emotional intelligence.

What We Expect:

Customer service is of the highest importance to our business and we always aim to leave the client happy. Your politeness, professionalism and interpersonal skills are as important to us as your painting ability.

Requirements:

-Preference given to those applicants with 1-2 years experience working as a painter on residential/commercial projects.

- A drivers license and vehicle.

- A full set of basic hand tools is an asset! We supply a full crew kit, ladders, sprayers, lights, protection etc but would expect any experienced painters to have their own basics (brush, putty knife, roller cage, pole etc)..

- Knowledge of prep work; filling & surface preparation.

- Knowledge of paint products and finishes.

- Ability to interpret client requirements.

- Excellent cutting and rolling skills.

- Good knowledge & experience with paint spraying.

- Problem solving & creativity.

 

What we offer:

 

-Full time work schedule (Monday to Friday 8-430) *some jobs require to work evenings and weekends.  Weekends may be required for some exterior work to make up for rain days.

-Health spending account (flexible benefits after 3 months of full time employment)

-Staff outings such as dinners or activities

-Bonuses for 5* reviews

-Logoed work shirts as team members (hats, face masks and hoodies are also included)

-Work with like minded, fun individuals who help make every day more enjoyable coming to work!

title: Painter
company: SWP West - Prince George Hart Highlands - V2K
description:
FULL/PART TIME PAINTING POSITIONS AVAILABLE!!!

*CURRENTLY HIRING FOR 2022*

ACT NOW TO SECURE YOUR POSITION IN ONE OF CANADA’S TOP  PAINTING FRANCHISES!

 

 

Our painting team is looking for highly-motivated individuals to join us!

We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most efficient people in Prince George, who want to join a family of awesome staff and team culture, who are also looking to earn what they are worth and optimize their cash flow!

This past year alone, our team provided 75+ top quality paint jobs in the Prince George area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which created a happy work atmosphere and rewarded employees. 
For 2022 we are hoping to provide an even better service and employ, train and optimize an even stronger team!
We are looking to hire our team, starting in the early spring of 2022!

About this job:
*Fast paced, fun environment with incentivized pay scale.
*Hands on experience in customer service and communication
*Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
*Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application, we love hiring teams of Rockstar’s!
*Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary! We teach everyone how to paint!
*We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company for those with the right attitude!
*We are also hiring seasonal staff for those of you who are just looking for a summer job! Act quickly, our summer positions will fill up fast!

What will be expected of you: 
-Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
-Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
-Motivation for $$$ (With this company you truly get out what you put in)
-Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
-Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably
-Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided
-Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
-Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
-A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self improvement

 

What benefits will you get? 
-Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top notch safety training.
-Lots of opportunity to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as company offered prizes and incentives.
 -Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.)
-Working with other like-minded and fun individuals. 
-Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during P.A.D (performance, availability and discussion) meetings.
-Working outside in the fresh air! 
-A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!


Position Descriptions

Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.
Bonuses and Incentives as well as pay increases provided for people in this position. 
 

 

If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.

Full-time hours

Autonomous work culture, with the ability for more responsibility/pay

High school diploma

Full-time commitment (40-50 hours weekly)

Coachable

title: Painter
description:
ATLANTIC HOME MAINTENANCE IS HIRING!!!

Love the outdoors and a job that changes from one day to the next? Hate it when you WORK HARD but make the same as the next guy? 

Then stop what you're doing, because we're hiring painters for 2022! This is a growing company based in Charlottetown, PE (Canada) that is looking for painters to help complete projects. 

Benefits: The position is open to individuals who are hardworking, leader mentality and interested in the business world. There is an opportunity to learn the ins and outs of the business from a management level directly from the business owner throughout the year. 

The position includes:
Full-time hours 
Bonus incentives 
Autonomous work culture, with the ability for more responsibility/pay 
Training and development will be provided as long as the candidate is coachable, hard-working and willing to learn. Trained to complete professional painting work for interior and exterior painting and staining 

Requirements:
Valid driver’s license 
Access to a vehicle 
High school diploma 
Preferably some experience with hands-on work (No professional experience necessary), you will be trained on how to do paint/stain projects and will be a pro in no time! 
Full-time commitment (40-50 hours weekly) 
Strong communication skills 
Coachable 

Payment Structure:
We offer a base rate ranging from $13-19 /hour 
High-performance bonuses available 

Responsibilities:
Responsible for the overall completion of projects. Start to finish completion at a high standard of quality 
Daily responsible for the cleanliness of site and project 
Delivering quality and satisfaction through constant communication with homeowners and business owner 
Manage day to day project tasks for properly providing services to clients

 

EEOC Statement: We are an equal opportunity employer and prohibit discrimination/harassment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

title: Painter
company: John's Home Service Company - Oshawa, ON
description:
Currently hiring STUDENTS for full-time painting and canvassing positions!

Develop skills that employers are looking for, such as:

  • Critical thinking
  • Problem solving
  • Sales experience
  • Interpersonal skills

And much more!

We need motivated students that are:

  • Willing to work 40-50h per week

*Job sites will be in Oshawa and Whitby*

title: Painter
description:
FULL/PART TIME PAINTING POSITIONS AVAILABLE!!!

*CURRENTLY HIRING FOR 2022*

ACT NOW TO SECURE YOUR SPOT IN ONE OF CANADA'S TOP PAINTING FRANCHISES!

 

Our painting team is looking for highly-motivated individuals to join us!

We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most efficient people in North Vancouver, B.C., who want to join a family of awesome staff and team culture, who are also looking to earn what they are worth and optimize their cash flow!

This past year alone, our team provided 30 top quality paint jobs in the North Vancouver area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which created a happy work atmosphere and rewarded employees. 
For 2022 we are hoping to provide an even better service and employ, train and optimize an even stronger team!
We are looking to hire our team, starting in the early spring of 2022!
 

About this job:
*Fast paced, fun environment with an incentivized pay scale.
*Hands on experience in customer service and communication
*Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
*Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application, we love hiring teams of Rockstarâ€™s!
*Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary! We teach everyone how to paint!
*We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company for those with the right attitude!
*We are also hiring seasonal staff for those of you who are just looking for a summer job! Act quickly, our summer positions will fill up fast!
 

What will be expected of you: 
-Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
-Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
-Motivation for $$$ (With this company you truly get out what you put in) 
-Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
-Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably
-Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided
-Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
-Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
-A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self improvement 
 

What benefits will you get? 
-Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top notch safety training. 
-Lots of opportunity to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as company offered prizes and incentives.
 -Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.) 
-Working with other like-minded and fun individuals. 
-Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during P.A.D (performance, availability and discussion) meetings. 
-Working outside in the fresh air! 
-A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!

 

Position Descriptions
Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset. 
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.
Bonuses and Incentives as well as pay increases provided for people in this position. 

 

If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.  
Please email your RESUME and COVER LETTER to Connor Britnell @ connor.b@studentworks.ca or alternatively contact: (604) 209-4533 to set up an interview!

title: Painter
description:
The Role:

Pro Works Painting is looking for motivated individuals who want to kick-start their painting career to join our spring/summer painting team! Pro Works specializes in both interior and exterior re-paints, as well as new construction, apartment buildings, townhouse complexes, and residential homes. This season alone, our team will be responsible for painting 75-100 homes, in addition to numerous other projects.

What Youâ€™ll Be Doing:

  • Preparation of surfaces, including scraping, sanding, cleaning and priming surfaces
  • Site protection and masking of necessary areas prior to painting
  • Professional cutting in and edging
  • Using a sprayer or brush and roller to paint a variety of substrates including but not limited to: drywall, wood trimming and fascia, stucco, wood siding, concrete, and aluminum
  • Removal and installation of hardware and fixtures
  • General cleanup of job site
  • Converse with clients on the job site to establish needs and ensure overall satisfaction

Who You Are:

  • Positive, team player
  • Reliable transportation and the ability to travel to different job sites in the lower mainland
  • Comfortable working from ladders
  • Strong communication skills
  • Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required

Benefits:

  • Training and development â€“ kick-start your painting career by learning how to paint the interior and exterior of homes and commercial buildings
  • Competitive wages â€“ earn up to $25 an hour or more depending on experience, as well as performance-based promotions
  • Growth opportunities â€“ motivated individuals have the ability to grow with us and work all year round
  • Rewarding company culture â€“ monthly team building and marketing events
  • Work in a variety of environments, both indoor and outdoor

title: Painter
description:
SECURE A JOB FOR THIS SUMMER NOW!!

Currently Hiring Full-Time and Part-Time Painters for this Summer in Calgary, AB!

Job Description:

We are on the lookout for individuals who are highly motivated, punctual, team-oriented, hard-working, eager to learn, have a great work ethic, and motivated to make money this summer. This position will not only make you good money but also, give you the opportunity for self-growth. You will have the opportunity to gain lots of valuable skills and to grow your resume. There are several opportunities for promotion within the company.

Previous painting experience is not required. We provide all painters with thorough safety and painting training. We pay by piece rate, which starts at $16/hour, and we offer other incentives to all painters. We also provide full WCB. 

 

Job Requirements:

  • Full-time availability from May to the end of August (This is our entire painting season)
  • Ability to work outdoors, climb ladders, and do manual labor (You will be working both indoors/outdoors for the entirety of the painting season)
  • Full-time access to a reliable vehicle (Having a reliable vehicle makes it easier to go from one job site to the next)
  • Positive attitude and ability to work with others (Highly crucial to the job)
  • Drive to learn and grow, positive mindset, and work with others
  • Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (Being punctual is key to this job)
  • Motivation to make money (This job is a perfect opportunity to make extra money this summer)

 

Position Descriptions:

  • Painter: This role is a fun and challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money over the summer. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills.
  • Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you will gain experience in leadership and management (you will run a crew of 2-3 people). This role also includes moving ladders, motivating your team, making trips to the paint store, working with clients/solving client issues, and training other painters. Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.

 

Benefits:

  • Full painting and safety training provided (Online safety training, and in-person interior/exterior painting training is provided)
  • Opportunities to earn more and other incentives offered (Lots of room for you to make extra money)
  • Starting rate depends on experience (Everyone starts at $16/hr)
  • Raises based on proven skill after start date (Based on criteria set by manager)
  • Full worker's compensation (WCB) for all painters
  • We provide mentorship throughout the season through our bi-weekly meetings
  • Opportunity to expand resume and learn valuable skills 
  • Opportunity to make new friends and meet new people
  • Work with friends (We highly recommend referring your friends to apply for this position and  have the opportunity to work with them this summer)

 

DISCLAIMER: All COVID-19 mandates will be followed on ALL job sites.

If you have any questions, please call Hajra Anwar at (587)-432-2990.

title: Hiring Full-Time painters for the summer
description:
FULL/PART-TIME SPRING/SUMMER PAINTING POSITIONS AVAILABLE!! 

Apply now to secure your position in one of Canada 's premier student run painting companies! 

 

Our painting team is looking for motivated individuals to join our spring/summer painting team for the 2022 season! 

 

We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most motivated individuals in Sherwood Park who want to join a family of awesome people who want to earn what they are worth and optimize their cash over a summer! 

This season alone, our team has set the goal of being responsible for providing 100 top quality paint jobs in the Sherwood Park area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which creates a happy work environnement and rewarded employees. 

About this job: 

  • Fast paced, fun environnement with incentives 
  • Hands on experience in customer service and communication 
  • Working outdoors with a crew of 2-3 people 
  • Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application 
  • Training is provided, therefore no experience is necessary! However previous painting experience is an asset 
  • We are currently hiring Full-Time Painters for the summer 2022! 

 

What will be expected of you: 

  • Positive attitude 
  • Reliable transportation (As you will be working at many different job sites, you must be 100% capable of getting around town. My team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
  • Motivation for $$$ 
  • Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you) 
  • Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably 
  • Ability to complete and provide certification for required training provided 
  • Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated) 
  • Referring our service to friends and family 
  • A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self improvement 

 

What benefits will you get? 

  • Full training on how to paint interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings 
  • Lots of opportunity to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as company offered prizes and incentives 
  • Ability to make $16-21/hour (rate dependent on experience ) Raises based on proven skill after start date 
  • Working with other like-minded and fun individuals 
  • Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during bi-weekly P.A.D meetings 
  • Working outside in the fresh air 
  • A glowing reference 

 

Position description 

Painter : This role is fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts over the summer. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in the warm weather so needless to say endurance is an asset. 

 

If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us! We would love to hear from you and set up an interview. 

Please email your RESUME and COVER LETTER to Chaima Bouaita at chaima@studentworks.ca or alternatively contact 587-974-5578 to set up an interview!

-Maintaining a positive attitude (our team hires for attitude and trains for skill)

Painter: This role would be ideal for someone wishing to get hands-on work experience and make money that directly correlates to their effort and hard work. description:

title: Painters
description:
Brandt Industries Canada Ltd. is currently looking for reliable and experiencedPainters to start immediately at our manufacturing facilities in Regina, Saskatchewan.

The right candidates will have the opportunity to be trained in-house working alongside our highly specialized team. We are looking for ambitious, hardworking individuals that want to build their career with a company that will provide advancement and security for them for the long haul while gaining all the experience needed to become a highly specialized professional in the industry.

We are an industry leader that employs the very latest technologies and equipment to build the best products out there andpride ourselves on delivering a safe, clean work environment for all of ouremployees.

Duties & Responsibilities

  • Prepare and paint, load and unload paint system
  • Read and understand shop drawings
  • Work closely with production supervisor
  • Maintenance of paint system and all equipment
  • Perform other related duties as assigned.
  • Forklift and overhead crane experience an asset
  • Liquid and powder paint experience an asset
  • Familiar with all shop tools related to the job
  • Must be a team player
  • Must be able to work shift work
  • Must be able to work independent when required
  • Must be able to lift up to 50 pounds

title: Full-Time Summer Painters
description:
Are you looking for a fun #summerjob? Do you like working outdoors in teams of about 2-3? This may be the ideal job for you!

 

My name is Jaslyn Pederson, I am a 3rd-year Chemistry major at MRU, and I am running an independent Student Works Painting business this summer.

 

 I am looking to hire a team of 6-8 wonderful workers to paint full-time from May to August.  Some information about the position is as follows:

 

- Seasonal, from May-end of August

- Fun, fast-paced

- Working outdoors in teams of 2-3 people

- Training is provided -- experience is not needed!

- We have $5,000,000 in liability insurance

- We have full Worker's Compensation

- I donate to the Canadian MS Society for every job

- 3 year written guarantee for every client

- Opportunities for growth

- Opportunity to work with friends, consider applying together!

- Hands-on experience with customer service, and the subtle art of painting.

- Opportunities for raises, incentives, promotions to Crew Chief!

 

Similarly, the requirements are as follows:

 

- Must have own car

- Be able to work full-time over the duration of the summer

- Comfortable working with heights and ladders

- Performing minor manual labour, such as carrying ladders, using a pressure-washer, etc

 

If you think this is the perfect #summerjob for you, or if you have any questions, feel free to email me at jaslyn@studentworks.ca. Please include your resume if applying! I am looking forward to meeting and working with some wonderful people this year!

title: Painter
description:
We are looking for motivated individuals to join our painting team!  We are looking for the hardest-working, most motivated individuals who want to be apart of a very tight-knit group of awesome people who want to earn what they are worth. This season alone, our team will be responsible for painting 50+ homes which will result in happy clients and crew members. 

Compensation: Our painting systems allow our top painters to make upwards of 20- 28$/hour, with our average painter making around 22$/hour.

About the position:

  • Fast paced, fun environment
  • Hands on experience in customer service and communication
  • Work outdoors with a crew of 2-3 people
  • Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together if you wish
  • Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary!
We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for the summer of 2022. Both positions are full-time hourly summer jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company.

Position Descriptions
 
Painter: This role is a fun and challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money over the summer. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills.
 
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and would run a crew of 2-3 people. Ask to be considered for this if you
feel you may be a good fit.
 
Requirements:
  • Able to work full-time throughout the majority of the summer
  • Must have own transportation (job site locations change frequently)
  • Manual labor and ladder work required.
Benefits:
  • Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date.
  • Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the Manager.

title: Painter
description:
We currently looking to add a few painters to our team at SWP West!

Position Descriptions

Painter: This role is a fun and challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard-working, coachable, and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.


Crew Lead: In addition to painting, in this role, you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.


Bonuses and Incentives, as well as pay increases, are provided for people in this position. 


We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most efficient people in Edmonton, Alberta, who want to join a family of awesome staff and team culture.

What benefits will you get? 

  • Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top-notch safety training.
  • Work-life balance  
  • Lots of opportunities to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as the company offered prizes and incentives.
  • Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after the start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.)
  • Working with other like-minded and fun individuals and even friends if applying together. 
  • Excellent training and strong mentorship were provided during P.A.D (performance, availability, and discussion) meetings.
  • Working outside in the fresh air! 
  • A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!


About this job:

  • Fast-paced, fun environment with incentivized pay scale.
  • Hands-on experience in customer service and communication
  • Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
  • Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application, we love hiring teams of Rockstars!
  • Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary! We teach everyone how to paint!
  • We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company for those with the right attitude!
  • We are also hiring seasonal staff for those of you who are just looking for a summer job! Act quickly, our summer positions will fill up fast!


What will be expected of you: 

  • Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
  • Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
  • Motivation for $$$ (With this company you truly get out what you put in)
  • Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
  • Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably
  • Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided
  • Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
  • Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
  • A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self-improvement


If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.

title: Painter
description:
Title: Full-time Painter 

ETCL has been in business for over 20 years, as a painting contractor for residential interiors and exteriors, offices, condos, apartment buildings, as well as commercial buildings. We pride ourselves on providing high quality service using the best paint products and skilled applications. From site inspection and our detailed estimate process to job completion and site clean-up, we take great care to make sure our clients are satisfied.

We are currently hiring for multiple full time Painters to join our growing team!

The ideal Painter with experience will have (also looking for helpers with less experience & those interested with less experience are encouraged to apply as well):

· At least 3 years of experience in residential and commercial finish painting

· Professional demeanor and the drive to provide stellar customer service

· Strong communication skills

· Excellent attention to detail and ability to carry out projects with consistently high quality application

 

As part of the ETCL Painting team, we offer you:

· $18-27 per hour with bonuses

· 40 - 44 hours a week, Monday to Friday with some evening and weekend work (if and when required occasionally) 

 

This can be a full time, long term employment opportunity! If you are looking for stable career and take great pride in the work you deliver, then please apply we'd love to hear from you!  If you are looking for a short term employment opportunity this may also be something to consider as we are hiring helpers for our busy season with the intention of hiring full time if and when the applicant is interested in working full time year round.
