title: Painter
description:
Our painting team is looking for a highly-motivated individual to join us!

***$20-$25/hour***

In the past 2 summers, our team has produced 200+ top quality paint jobs in the Greater Victoria area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which created a happy work atmosphere and rewarded employees.
For 2022 we are hoping to provide an even better service and employ, train and optimize an even stronger team!

About this job:
*Fast-paced, fun environment with an incentivized pay scale.
*Hands-on experience in customer service and communication
*Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
*Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application.
*Training is provided; therefore, no experience is necessary.
*We are currently hiring Painters and Crew Managers for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company.

What will be expected of you:
-Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
-Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this)
-Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
-Ability to work with clients and always represent our company.
-Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided.
-Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
-Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
-Able to work full time through the majority of the summer
 

What benefits will you get?
-Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top notch safety training.
-Lots of opportunities to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as the company offered prizes and incentives.
 -Pay exceeding $30/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.)
-Working with other like-minded and fun individuals.
-Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during P.A.D (performance, availability and discussion) meetings.
-Working outside in the fresh air!
-A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!


Position Descriptions

Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.
Crew Manager: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.
Bonuses and Incentives as well as pay increases provided for people in this position.

 

If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.

title: CG Storyboard Artist
description:
This is an excellent opportunity to join Atomic as a CG Storyboard Artist on one of our upcoming productions!

____

Atomic Cartoons Inc. is an award-winning animation studio with locations in Vancouver's Mt. Pleasant Animation District, Ottawa's Hintonburg neighborhood and LA. Since its inception over 20 years ago, Atomic Cartoons has created and produced numerous 2D and CG animation productions including Last Kids on Earth and Hello Ninja. Atomic is well known for its artist-friendly culture and flexible work environment. We are always looking for artists of all levels to join our team!

____

 

WHAT YOU WILL DO:

 

  • Work with and under the guidance of the Director and Storyboard Supervisor to illustrate the story, plan shots, and draw panels.
  • Maintain style, quality, and continuity of drawings.
  • Work collaboratively with a team, while also being able to work independently with minimal supervision.
  • Follow direction and notes from supervisor and director.
  • Meet deadlines as assigned by production management.

 

WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:

 

  • Previous experience with Toon Boom Storyboard Pro.
  • Excellent drawing and composition skills.
  • Able to show examples of camera work.
  • Able to work efficiently on a timeline, while maintaining consistency and quality.
  • Industry experience as a CG storyboard artist is an asset.
  • BC or ON resident preferred.
  • Currently legally eligible to work in Canada.

 

START DATE:ASAP

 

INTERESTED?

Atomic Cartoons Inc. and Thunderbird Entertainment welcome and encourage applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

Show us what you would like to contribute to Atomic by providing us with relevant examples of your previous work along with your resume and cover letter. 

We thank you for your submission; only short-listed candidates will be contacted. No phone calls, please.

 

Atomic Cartoons is an equal opportunity employer and employs personnel without regard to race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, language, citizenship, creed, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, physical and/or mental handicap or financial ability.

While remaining sensitive, fair, and providing equitable treatment for all, Atomic Cartoons works to increase participation and advancement to reflect all personnel – including Women, Indigenous People, Visible Minorities, and Persons with Disabilities, who are all qualified members. Thus, it helps identify and remove barriers that prevent the full participation of members of designated groups in the workplace.

Since its inception over 20 years ago, Atomic Cartoons has created and produced numerous 2D and CG animation productions including Last Kids on Earth and Hello Ninja. Atomic is well known for its artist-friendly culture and flexible work environment. We are always looking for artists of all levels to join our team!", 'Able to show examples of camera work.', 'Work with and under the guidance of the Director and Storyboard Supervisor to illustrate the story, plan shots, and draw panels.', 'Previous experience with Toon Boom Storyboard Pro.', 'Work collaboratively with a team, while also being able to work independently with minimal supervision.', 'Excellent drawing and composition skills.', 'Show us what you would like to contribute to Atomic by providing us with relevant examples of your previous work along with your resume and cover letter.', 'Maintain style, quality, and continuity of drawings.', 'While remaining sensitive, fair, and providing equitable treatment for all, Atomic Cartoons works to increase participation and advancement to reflect all personnel – including Women, Indigenous People, Visible Minorities, and Persons with Disabilities, who are all qualified members.\xa0Thus, it helps identify and remove barriers that prevent the full participation of members of designated groups in the workplace.', 'Able to work efficiently on a timeline, while maintaining consistency and quality.']

title: Painter
description:
The Role:

PWP is looking for motivated individuals who want to kick-start their painting career to join our spring/summer painting team! PWP specializes in both interior and exterior re-paints, as well as new construction, apartment buildings, townhouse complexes, and residential homes. This season alone, our team will be responsible for painting 75-100 homes, in addition to numerous other projects.

What You’ll Be Doing:

  • Preparation of surfaces, including scraping, sanding, cleaning and priming surfaces
  • Site protection and masking of necessary areas prior to painting
  • Professional cutting in and edging
  • Using a sprayer or brush and roller to paint a variety of substrates including but not limited to: drywall, wood trimming and fascia, stucco, wood siding, concrete, and aluminum
  • Removal and installation of hardware and fixtures
  • General cleanup of job site
  • Converse with clients on the job site to establish needs and ensure overall satisfaction

Who You Are:

  • Positive, team player
  • Reliable transportation and the ability to travel to different job sites in the lower mainland
  • Comfortable working from ladders
  • Strong communication skills
  • Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required

Benefits:

  • Training and development – kick-start your painting career by learning how to paint the interior and exterior of homes and commercial buildings
  • Competitive wages – earn up to $25 an hour or more depending on experience, as well as performance-based promotions
  • Growth opportunities – motivated individuals have the ability to grow with us and work all year round
  • Rewarding company culture – monthly team building and marketing events
  • Work in a variety of environments, both indoor and outdoor

title: Painter
description:
Student Works Painting is looking for motivated individuals to join our spring/summer painting crew! 

We are looking for the hardest-working, most motivated students(or student-aged people) in Nanaimo who want to be a part of a very tight-knit group of awesome people who want to earn what they are worth. If you don't know how to paint, don't worry! We will train you to our standard, and soon enough you will be a highly detailed painter. This season alone, our team will be responsible for painting 50-100 projects which will result in happy clients and happy employees.

What a typical day looks like: Drive to the paint store to pick up the paint or needed supplies for the job, drive to the clientâ€™s house and begin assigned painting tasks. Listen to music or podcasts while you work, take lunch, work through the afternoon, clean the job site and equipment, and then drive home.

What is expected of you: Pick up paint in the morning, transport equipment, be responsible and respectful when painting, job site marketing, collect final signature and payment from the client.

What will be expected of you continued:

-Positive Attitude 

-Reliable Transportation (as we will be working at many different job sites) 

-Motivation for $$$ 

-Ability to work from ladders 

-Ability to work with clients 

-Referring our services to friends and family 

 

What benefits will you get? 

-Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings 

-Lots of $$$ to pay bills, tuition, etc. 

-Pay is $18-$24/hour depending upon experience 

-Working with other like-minded and fun individuals 

-Working outside!

title: Painter
description:
*CURRENTLY HIRING FOR THE SPRING/SUMMER OF 2022*

ACT NOW TO SECURE YOUR POSITION IN ONE OF BC'S TOP  PAINTING COMPANY!

Our painting team is looking for highly-motivated individuals to join us!

We are looking for the absolute hardest-working, most efficient people in Trail/Castlegar, BC, who want to join a team of awesome staff and culture, who are also looking to earn what they are worth and optimize their cash flow!

This year we plan to paint 100+ homes in the Trail/Castlegar area, with one strategy in mind: satisfied clients, which create a happy work atmosphere and rewards employees. 
For the Spring/Summer of 2022 we are hoping to provide an even better service than last year and employ, train and optimize an even stronger team!
We are looking to hire our team, starting in the early spring of 2022!

About this job:
*Fast paced, fun environment with incentivized pay scale.
*Hands on experience in customer service and communication
*Working outdoors with a crew of other like-minded people
*Working with friends is encouraged, so apply together and note this in your application, we love hiring teams of Rockstar’s!
*Training is provided! We teach everyone how to paint!
*We are currently hiring Painters and Site Supervisors for 2022. Both positions are full-time jobs and can lead to future promotion opportunities within the company for those with the right attitude!
*Act quickly, our summer positions will fill up fast!

What will be expected of you: 
-Positive Attitude (My team hires for attitude and trains for skill)
-Reliable Transportation (As we will be working at many different job sites you must 100% be capable of getting around town. The team may be required to move job sites mid-day and you must be able to accommodate this, no exceptions!) 
-Motivation for $$$ (With this company you truly get out what you put in)
-Ability to work from ladders (if you are afraid of heights, this job is not for you)
-Ability to work with clients and always represent our company respectably
-Ability to complete and provide certifications for required training provided
-Ability to ensure proper time management and punctuality (lateness is not tolerated)
-Referring our services to friends and family (this is not required but always appreciated)
-A strong mindset dedicated to learning and self improvement

 

What benefits will you get? 
-Full training on how to paint the interior and exterior of homes/commercial buildings as well as top notch safety training.
-Lots of opportunity to earn more with greater efficiency, as well as company offered prizes and incentives.
-Pay exceeding $20/hr for exemplary painters (Starting rate dependent on experience. Raises based on proven skill after start date. (Bonuses will depend on performance and the criteria established by the business Owner/Operator.)
-Working with other like-minded and fun individuals. 
-Excellent training and strong mentorship provided during P.A.D (performance, availability and discussion) meetings.
-Working outside in the fresh air! 
-A glowing reference to help really beef up your resume!


Position Descriptions

Painter: This role is a fun but incredibly challenging position that is ideal for someone wanting to get hands-on work experience and make money reflective of their efforts. The ideal individual is hard working, coachable and has effective communication skills. You will be sometimes required to work at heights or for long hours in warm weather so needless to say endurance is also an asset.
 

Site Supervisor: In addition to painting, in this role you would gain experience in leadership and management skills. You would take on additional responsibilities for additional pay. This would include moving ladders, making trips to the paint store, motivating your team, solving client issues, training additional painters, and managing other tasks on job sites.
Ask to be considered for this if you feel you may be a good fit.
Bonuses and Incentives as well as pay increases provided for people in this position. 
 

If this job sounds like the right fit for you then please get in contact with us!
We would love to hear from you and set up an interview.

title: BC, Houdini Lighting Artist
description:
Houdini Lighting Artist

This position is based in Vancouver. All applicants must reside in the United States or British Columbia / Ontario if applying within Canada.

Zoic Studios is an Award winning VFX company made up of accomplished artists and producers who understand story, process and relationships. Partnership, integrity and enthusiasm are our key founding principles. We have three locations, Los Angeles, New York City and Vancouver, Canada. Recent credits include: Sweet Tooth, Legends of Tomorrow, Stargirl, Superman & Lois and The Haunting of Bly Manor.

"Visual Evolution" is our mission; we invest in constantly improving our technological and studio processes so that our artists can focus on being creative even in the lightning fast paced world of visual effects. We apply these principles to our work on some of the most VFX intensive film and television projects out there. We like a challenge. Do you?

We are seeking a Houdini Lighting Artist for our Vancouver studio. This is a project-based position working on a variety of projects, and working closely with the dynamics and compositing teams. The Houdini Lighting Artist reports to the Facility CG Supervisor.

The ideal candidate will have a Generalist background with strong Houdini lighting skills. They will be responsible for creating photo realistic and stylized lighting set ups for dynamics, sets, props and creatures. Good communication skills and collaborative traits are mandatory.

Responsibilities 

  • Light dynamics, environments, props, creatures, and other 3D assets to production requirements
  • Work within the colour and lighting pipeline.
  • Provide basic comps of lit elements to help visualize look of final element.
  • Ensure downstream pipeline needs are considered and optimized for rendering.
  • Work with team members to address internal/external notes.
  • Ensure internal and external deadlines are met within budgeted hours.
  • Keep up to date with internal techniques, tools, and software.
  • Share knowledge and techniques with team members to improve overall team skills and asset quality.
  • Take point on lighting sequences under the direction of Leads and Supervisors as needed
  • Take on 3D Generalist tasks as needed.

Qualifications:

  • Ability to extrapolate from provided art direction/concept art when needed.
  • Proactive in reporting in to 3D Leads on progress, questions, resource needs etc.
  • Lighting - experience with technical line up digital lighting matching practical in camera conditions to add digital asset to plate using HDRI and middle grey/chrome sphere lighting principles/methods.
  • Lighting Design â€“ experience in creative layout of lighting for use in a virtual or set extensions using middle grey lighting principles.
  • Colour Theory â€“ knowledge of colour space (ACEScg) , neutralization of plates/textures and middle grey principles.
  • Minimum 3 yearsâ€™ experience in a lighting specific role w/ Houdini and within a VFX studio
  • Experience with Houdini
  • Experience rendering with Mantra
  • Excellent communication skills in English; both written and verbal
  • Ability to establish a methodology to achieve desired results within allotted timeframe.
  • Work within a fast-paced team environment.
  • Must showcase an up-to-date demo reel demonstrating listed skills.

Would be nice:

  • Experience in Maya
  • Experience in Vray (for Houdini)
  • Experience in Nuke.
  • Knowledge of Shotgun.

Additional information

  • Candidates MUST be located in the United States, British Columbia or Ontario. This is a remote (work from home) position. 
  • Zoic does not cover relocation costs.
  • This job description contains the basic requirements for the position and is NOT intended to be a complete list of responsibilities; other duties may be assigned.
  • Due to the volume of applications we receive across our different openings we regret that only those selected to interview will be contact.

title: Painter - Residential / Light Commercial
company: Handyman Connection of Metro Vancouver, BC
description:
To meet the demands of our rapidly growing base of satisfied customers, Handyman Connection of Metro Vancouver, BC is seeking an experienced painter.  This skilled craftsman would ideally have a variety of home improvement skills to support the growth of our business.  Handyman Connection is a locally owned and operated, well established Home Improvement Company dedicated to excellent customer service and quality work.  Our customers love us!  We have over 50% repeat/referral customer base and our business is growing!

What You Will Receive

  • Receiving comparative wage based on the work experience
  • Flexibility in job locations; craftsman can select where to work
  • Continues jobs as long as the craftsman provides satisfactory work quality
  • Professional Office Support - scheduling, customer support, job tracking
  • Free access to custom mobile application for scheduling and communications
  • Successful marketing campaign that brings us well qualified customers
  • Branded apparel and signage
Responsibilities

The Painter performs and coordinates the preparation and application of exterior and interior finishes in a residential and light commercial setting. You must have experience as a residential painter, and you must have a positive attitude.

  • Prepares various surfaces for painting by washing, scraping, burning, sanding, sandblasting or other means as necessary.
  • Mixes, matches, and blends various paints, enamels, lacquers, varnishes, stains and special protective coatings to achieve desired color, consistency, and drying properties. Caulks, putties, cements or plasters holes and cracks.
  • Paints using brush, roller, spray gun or other applicator. Prepares wall and hangs paper or other wall covering material.
  • Ability to determine and clearly identify proper materials and material quantities for new and existing projects.
  • Evaluate customer requests, price projects, troubleshoot customer issues, and present a description of a work order to a customer.
Requirements

  • Must have current Driver's License and Insurance
  • Must have tools, work vehicle and good references
  • Must have experience in the remodeling or home repair trades
  • Independent Contractors must carry liability insurance and workers comp
  • Must pass screening process which includes a background check
  • Must have a smart phone and access to the internet
HOW TO APPLY:

Please send your application including your resume to pbehpouri@handymanconnection.com

 Check us out on the web at: www.handymanconnection.com 

Thank you

title: Artiste 3D
description:
Description du poste

Tu as un bon sens de l'urgence? Nous aussi! Si retenu, le processus de recrutement ne devrait pas durer plus de cinq jours;

Qui sommes-nous?

REAL by FAKE est un studio d'effets visuels en pleine croissance basé à Montréal et Los Angeles, avec des points de services en déploiement. L'entreprise est reconnue pour son cinéma intégré d'effets visuels réalistes et de services de post-production, pour films, téléséries publicités, et vidéos clips. Notre promesse; rendre la vie simple aux employés en fournissant tous les outils et l'encadrement nécessaires pour accomplir le travail de façon autonome. D'ailleurs, Notre technologie pionnière de télétravail, développée en 2016, nous a non seulement offert une flexibilité considérable, mais nous a également mis à l'avant-garde des tendances actuelles. REAL by FAKE incarne une culture qui encourage l'autonomie, la croissance personnelle et professionnelle. Viens faire partie de notre expansion et voir ton talent réellement valorisé!

Description du poste ;

L'artiste 3D participe au développement du design, de l'animation et de la réalisation de contenus visuels animés photo-réalistes. L'artiste 3D a des connaissances techniques avancées et artistiques et il doit être capable de respecter des échéanciers.

Ce qu'on offre ;

  • Un environnement de travail agréable dans une équipe compétente, qui met de l'avant le plaisir au travail;
  • Un horaire flexible;
  • Du télétravail;
  • Un programme de bien-être (enfin la motivation que tu cherchais pour commencer le gym);
  • Bientôt : des nouveaux bureaux (en construction) au métro Berri-UQAM.

Ce que tu vas faire ;

  • Collaborer au processus créatif avec le Lead 3D et le responsable du projet en proposant des concepts et en créant des storyboards ;
  • Travailler en équipe avec les différents départements afin d'assurer une synergie entre l'environnement, son contenu et les technologies utilisées ;
  • Utiliser des techniques de production appropriées en fonction des échéanciers et du budget ;
  • Accompagner ses collègues en lien avec ses connaissances et compétences acquises ;
  • Être à l'affût des logiciels constamment en changement en animation et design graphique ;
  • Être responsable de la livraison des projets qui lui sont assignées en respectant les calendriers ;

Tes qualifications ;

  • (Les candidatures seront évaluées dans leur ensemble et il n'est pas requis de posséder toutes les compétences énumérées ci-dessous pour postuler)
  • DEP en animation 3D, design graphique ou dans un domaine connexe ;
  • Compréhension du français et de l'anglais, tant à l'oral qu'à l'écrit ;
  • Plus de 3 ans d'expérience en création de contenu visuel 3D ;
  • Maîtrise des logiciels de visualisation et animation 3D (Arnold, Maya, C4D) ;
  • Connaissance avancée des logiciels After Effects et Photoshop ;
  • Connaissance dans Nuke, et de programmation Python, ainsi que les outils tels que Realflow, Thinking Particles, Xparticles, Houdini est un atout ;
  • Connaissance de base dans Blender ou ouverture d'apprendre.

Ton profil ;

  • Esprit créatif et résolution de problème;
  • Personne rigoureuse et avec le souci du détail;
  • Autodidact.
  • Autonomie et un bon sens de l'initiative un incontournable;
  • Être outillé dans un environnement changeant et sous pression ;
  • L'organisation et la communication ;
  • Travail professionnel axée sur le dynamisme et la collaboration ;
  • Travail d'équipe ;
  • Savoir gérer les priorités et le respect des échéances.

Ce que tu veux savoir ;

REAL by FAKE ™ est une équipe forte, dévouée et passionnée de talents créatifs et technologues de classe mondiale. La tribu d'artistes de REAL by FAKE offre de « REAL » effets visuels qui maximisent l'impact créatif et les possibilités visuelles, quel que soit le support : du concept au produit fini. Son travail comprend de nombreux blockbusters: Wild, Dallas Buyers Club, The Aviator, C.R.A.Z.Y., 300 et, plus récemment, FAKE a supervisé la postproduction complète et les effets visuels de la série Big Little Lies 1 et 2 de HBO et également The Morning Show d'Apple TV +. Aide à développer notre tribu d'artistes et viens travailler sur un contenu intelligent et créatif.

*Le masculin est utilisé dans l'unique but d'alléger le texte

Type d'emploi : Temps Plein

title: Virtual Art Department: Concept Artist
description:
About Pixomondo's Virtual Art Department:

The Virtual Art Department (VAD) is the bridge between a traditional Art Department to the Virtual Production (VP) and Visual Effects (VFX). VAD Concept Artists work with the Art Director to quickly prototype ideas and designs using a mixture of 2D and 3D techniques for both Virtual Production and Traditional VFX projects. They help define looks of characters, creatures, props, and vehicles with a focus on supporting development of real time environments. VAD Concept Artists overpaint renders to generate key art frames that help define the "look" of a show.

Responsibilities:

  • Rapid prototyping of designs using 2D/3D techniques
  • Creating concept art and mood boards for VP/VFX projects
  • Collecting and assembling research and reference material that will be influential to client and design team
  • Blocking out layout and lighting for real time environment builds in Unreal Engine as base
  • Rendering and overpainting to generate Key Art Frames for VP/VFX projects to guide the looks early on
  • Potentially creating 3D Real Time Assets (model/texture) and Previs geometry
  • Teaming up with VAD Generalist and working together to tackle creative development
  • Communicate with Production and Art Director and follow up on specific artistic direction
  • Work to meet defined milestones and deadlines

The Ideal Candidate:

  • A strong traditional/digital art foundation with an emphasis on photo-realism
  • A developed "eye" and strong aesthetic
  • Good understanding of anatomy and hard surface is a plus
  • Experience in creating storyboards and illustrations is a plus
  • Being able to follow a specific style/look and achieve a more stylized finish is a plus
  • Experience using Unreal Engine is a huge plus
  • A desire to learn and ability to quickly pickup new software
  • Demonstrated and proven ability in one or more 2D/3D techniques, including : Matte Painting / Concept Art / Design / Procedural Environment Creation / Modeling / Texturing / Shading / Lighting / Look Dev
  • Demonstrated and proven knowledge in some or all of these software packages : Photoshop / Maya / Unreal Engine / Z Brush / Houdini / Gaea / Substance Painter / Nuke (Comparable Software experience considered e.g., Blender)
  • An individual who displays strong teamwork and excellent communication
  • An individual with VFX/Game Development experience is a huge plus

Powered by JazzHR

title: Senior Lookdev Artist
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Look Artist who will embrace our philosophy and share their hard-earned expertise to build an incredible experience for our customers.

We are picturing someone who is passionate about world-building and expert in crafting high quality, highly detailed real-time or offline environments and assets.

We desire someone who is a forward-thinking about their craft and is dedicated to high quality production values.

Requirements/Responsibilities:

  • Set up and maintain our material pipeline in our real-time environment
  • Create physically-based materials/textures for use with props, environments, and characters
  • Assist in material library creation and maintaining material pipelines
  • Collaborate with other artists to build and integrate assets into a visually consistent and highly immersive world
  • Strong understanding of real-time shader material pipeline/setup
  • Strong understanding of Substance painter-creating smart materials/texture arrays for team to use for consistent art style and speed
  • Strong understanding of Substance designer or other related shader creation software that integrates well with real-time engines
  • Create a solid base material foundation library for enviro team
  • Create shaders and materials for team that are efficient in shader complexity and have correct parameters for team to adjust and work with (keeping our materials from not becoming bloated with too many parameters that can be confusing and expensive)
  • Shipped at least 2 or more AAA titles working on materials and material pipelines

What you'll do:

  • Create high-quality materials using Substance Designer
  • Maintain a consistent aesthetic across your work
  • Collaborate across teams sharing ideas and articulating visions.
  • Show initiative, push ideas and innovate within your duties
  • Be aware of project/task schedules and be capable of delivering work to deadlines
  • Take direction from the Art Director, Creative Director and engage with Producers

What you'll need:

  • Experience as a Material Artist
  • Substance Designer Expert
  • 4 years experience as a 3D Art Generalist or Environment Artist in professional AAA video games or cinematics, animation or VFX studios
  • Solid grasp of colour and other physical material properties as they relate to games
  • Proficient at creating realistic and PBR material using Substance Designer, Substance Painter and Photoshop
  • Expert knowledge in node-based material editors, tiling layered material, shader networks and procedural texturing.
  • Knowledgeable in the key professional tools, techniques and asset creation pipelines: Maya, Zbrush, game engine (eg UE/Unity/proprietary), Marvelous Designer, modeling, baking, texturing, UV creation, unwrapping

NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. We have some of the most resourceful and dedicated people in the world working for us. If you're creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you! NVIDIA is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and proud to be an equal opportunity employer.


By submitting your interest in this job, you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application. You will receive up to 6 messages from the number "63879". Message & data rates may apply. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.

title: Artiste niveaux/environnements 3D - 3D Artist – Levels/Environments
description:
Company Description

Gameloft Montréalrecherche son nouveau Chef animateur 3D qui rejoindra l'équipe LEGO Star Wars: Castaways, une exclusivité Apple Arcade qui a déjà atteint le sommet du palmarès mondial!

Acclamée par les joueurs pour son histoire, ses mécaniques de jeu et sa qualité graphique, LEGO Star Wars: Castaways est une production 100 % originale de Gameloft Montréal, conçue par une équipe passionnée qui n'attend que vous!

Pour en apprendre plus sur le jeu :

Bande-annonce : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJt01eQzC8M

Site officiel : https://www.gameloft.com/en/game/lego-star-wars-castaways

 

Êtes-vous à la recherche d’un employeur de choix?

Rejoignez le jeu!

Gameloft a pour mission d'émerveiller le monde afin d'offrir à chacun un moment de joie.

Nous créons avec fierté des jeux depuis 2000, dont deux sont classés dans le « Top 10 des jeux iOS les plus téléchargés au monde de tous les temps » d'App Annie. Partout à travers le monde, des employés talentueux de Gameloft oeuvrent à créer des franchises reconnues telles qu'Asphalt®, Dragon Mania Legends, Modern Combat et Dungeon Hunter.

Nous insufflons notre passion dans chaque pixel de nos jeux. Et cette passion est au coeur de nos pratiques quotidiennes, et des détenteurs de droits de premier plan, incluant Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Mattel®, Lamborghini®, etc., reconnaissent la créativité de Gameloft et nous font confiance pour produire des expériences de jeu formidables.

Nous faisons partie de Vivendi - un des groupes de médias les plus importants au monde - ce qui nous confère le pouvoir et les ressources pour établir des attentes élevées et atteindre les objectifs les plus ambitieux.

Toutes les marques déposées mentionnées ci-dessous sont la propriété de leurs détenteurs respectifs.

****

Gameloft Montreal is seeking a new Lead 3D animator to join the team for LEGO® Star Wars™: Castaways, an Apple Arcade exclusive that has already reached the top of the global charts!

Praised by gamers for its story, game mechanics and graphics, LEGO® Star Wars™: Castaways is a 100%-original Gameloft Montreal production, designed by a passionate team that are just waiting for you to join them!

To learn more about the game:

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BJt01eQzC8M

Official website: https://www.gameloft.com/en/game/lego-star-wars-castaways

Are You Looking for a Great Place to Work?

Join the Game!

Gameloft’s mission is to amaze the world, so everyone can enjoy a moment of happiness.

We have been proudly crafting games since 2000, two of which are featured in App Annie's “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads.” Talented Gameloft employees from all over the world have created established franchises, such as Asphalt®, Dragon Mania Legends, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter.

We put passion into every pixel of our games. It’s at the core of what we do every day, and major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Mattel®, Lamborghini®, etc. recognize Gameloft’s creativity and trust us to produce awesome gaming experiences.

We are part of Vivendi—one of the world’s largest media groups—giving us the mana and resources to set our expectations high and aim for the very best.

All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.

Job Description

Dès le début de votre aventure avec nous, vous serez appelé(e) à :

  • Travailler en collaboration avec l'équipe de production et le chef d'équipe d'artistes
  • Créer des décors, des environnements et des kits modulaires (organiques, mécaniques, architecturaux) de grande qualité pour les plateformes mobiles de nouvelle génération
  • Utiliser des outils développés à l'interne et adapter vos méthodes de travail en conséquence, tout en relayant des suggestions, problèmes et commentaires aux personnes appropriées
  • Suivre les directives artistiques, les prérogatives de design et les directives techniques définies
  • Faire preuve de méticulosité et d'organisation dans la gestion du travail
  • Prendre la responsabilité des tâches assignées et du suivi sur le projet
  • Utiliser tous les canaux de communication disponibles pour transmettre les questions, commentaires et mises à jour de manière efficace aux collègues et chefs d'équipe appropriés

***

From the beginning of your adventure with us, you will be tasked with:

  • Working in collaboration with the production team and the lead artist
  • Creating high-quality scenery, environments and modular kits (organic, mechanical, architectural) for next-gen mobile platforms
  • Using in-house tools and adapting your work methods accordingly, while relaying suggestions, issues, and comments to the relevant parties
  • Following outlined artistic directives, design intent and technical limitations
  • Exhibiting organization and attention to detail in your work
  • Taking responsibility for assigned tasks and for overseeing the project
  • Using all available communication channels to efficiently share questions, comments and updates with the relevant colleagues and team leads
Qualifications

Expérience et compétences recherchées :

  • Détenir au minimum un diplôme d'études collégiales en art graphique ou équivalent
  • Intérêt envers les jeux vidéo, plus spécifiquement les jeux d'action, d'aventure, RPG, etc.
  • Maîtrise des workflows traditionnels de modélisation 3D (3ds Max ou Maya), pour la création d'assets optimisés pour les jeux mobile
  • Maîtrise des outils de production additionnels suivants : ZBrush, Marmoset, Quixel SUITE, Substance Designer/Painter, Houdini
  • Intérêt et expérience pour les workflows procéduraux et non destructifs, par exemple l'utilisation d'Houdini et Substance Designer
  • Notions solides en éclairage, shading et techniques de baking
  • Solides bases artistiques (compréhension de la couleur, composition et éclairage)
  • Expérience en production d'environnements en temps réel et modulaires et maîtrise d'un ou plusieurs frameworks de production tels que Unity ou Unreal
  • Être au courant des capacités techniques des plateformes mobiles de nouvelle génération
  • Bonne culture visuelle dans différents domaines (architecture, design, cinéma, BD, jeux, etc.)
  • Ouvert, motivé, curieux et autocritique
  • Organisé, efficace et autonome

***

Experience and Qualifications:

  • At least a diploma of college studies in graphic arts or equivalent
  • Interest in video games; more specifically action games, adventure games, RPGs, etc.
  • Mastery of traditional 3D modeling workflows (3ds Max or Maya) for the creation of assets optimized for mobile games
  • Mastery of the following additional production tools: ZBrush, Marmoset, Quixel Suite, Substance Designer/Painter, Houdini
  • Interest in, and experience with, procedural and non-destructive workflows, e.g. using Houdini and Substance Designer
  • Strong knowledge of lighting, shading and baking techniques
  • Strong artistic foundation (understanding of colour, composition and lighting)
  • Experience with real-time modular production environments and mastery of one or more production frameworks, such as Unity or Unreal
  • Up to date on technical capabilities of next-gen mobile platforms
  • Strong knowledge of various visual domains (architecture, design, film, comics, games, etc.)
  • Open, motivated, curious and self-critical
  • Organized, efficient and independent


Additional Information

oici pourquoi entrer dans l’univers Gameloft:

  • Parce que vous voulez vivre une expérience exceptionnelle, au sein d'une entreprise en constante évolution !
  • Parce que vous voulez travailler avec des collègues talentueux et pionniers dans l’industrie !
  • Parce que l’idée d’ouvrir vos horizons à une culture internationale et au partage de connaissances avec des collègues à l’autre bout du monde vous enchante !
  • Ou tout simplement parce que vous recherchez un endroit où il y fait bon travailler !

Nous offrons:

  • Horaire flexible
  • Dès votre embauche, 3 semaines de vacances et des congés mobiles
  • Congé offert entre Noël et le jour de l'An pour bien débuter la nouvelle année
  • Programme de REER collectif avec participation de l'employeur
  • Programme d'assurances collectives avantageux
  • Accès gratuit à une clinique médicale virtuelle 24h/24, 7 jours/7
  • Programme d'aide aux employés et à leur famille immédiate
  • Programme de remboursement partiel pour votre déplacement au bureau (transport en commun et/ou stationnement)
  • Accompagnement lors de toute relocalisation pour les nouveaux collaborateurs en provenance de pays ou de régions hors Québec
  • Programme de référencement avec bonus
  • Activités et prix offerts régulièrement par le comité social

Mais aussi au studio :

  • Local à vélos sécurisé et montant offert pour encourager le transport actif (période estivale)
  • Collations offertes quotidiennement (fruits, café, etc.)
  • 4@7 les vendredis
  • Espaces de jeux
  • Terrasse sur le toit
  • Studio à proximité du parc Jarry et des nombreux attraits du Mile-Ex et de la Petite-Italie
  • Activités physiques organisées à même le studio ou au parc Jarry (ex. : yoga)

Nous souhaitons vous connaître!

Soumettez votre candidature dès maintenant.

 

****

 

Why Join the World of Gameloft?

  • Because you want to be part of an exceptional experience within a company that is constantly growing!
  • Because you want to work with talented people who are industry pioneers!
  • Because you want to join a global company and meet great people around the world from all walks of life.
  • Or, just because you’re looking for a great place to work!

What We Offer

  • Flexible schedule
  • 3 weeks’ vacation and mobile days off, available as of your start date
  • Time off between Christmas and New Year’s Day to help you start the year off on the right foot
  • Group RRSP program with employer contributions
  • Great group insurance program
  • Free 24/7 access to a virtual medical clinic
  • The Employee and Family Assistance Program
  • Partial reimbursement of your commuting costs (for public transit and/or parking)
  • Support for new employees relocating from countries or regions outside Quebec
  • Referral program with bonuses
  • Regular activities and prizes courtesy of our Social Committee

And at the studio itself:

  • Secure bike storage room and a subsidy to encourage active transportation (during the summer)
  • Daily snacks (fruit, coffee, etc.)
  • Friday happy hours
  • A game room
  • A rooftop terrace
  • Studio located near Jarry Park and the charming Mile-Ex and Little Italy neighbourhoods
  • Fitness classes at the studio itself or at Jarry Park (e.g., yoga)

We want to get to know you!

Submit your application now.

title: Senior Technical Artist
description:
Company Description

Who we are?

Our vision is to create a virtual world for one billion people by 2030.

With over 4,000 team members across nine global locations, we build gaming experiences that are beyond the imagination. Our most recent flagship title, Genshin Impact, grossed over $1 billion within six months and is enjoyed by over 30 million players everyday.

Established in 2021, our Canada studio is developing a brand-new, AAA open-world action-adventure title. Over the next two years, we will hire hundreds of top talents across North America to realize the vision of our ambitous project. Hoyoverse Canada offers:

  • Cutting-edge, brand-new AAA project: Opportunity to make an impact on one of the most ambitious gaming projects currently under development

  • Flat, tech-oriented culture: Work in a refreshing, focused, and down-to-earth studio enviroment with some of best professionals in the business

  • Industry-leading compensation: we benchmark against the top technology companies, not other gaming studios.

Job Description

What you will do: The technical artist responsible for destruction system plays a very central role on this important pillar feature. More precisely the candidate will be involved in the
following areas:

  • Configure, test, maintain and play important part in the development of the destruction system
  • Make sure that destructible system is aligned with high level design requirements for the game
  • Elaborate budgets for destructible content, memory-wyse, performance-wyse and platform-wyse (mobile, next gen)
  • Assist and support content creators making destructible assets
  • Validate created content and make sure they follow guidelines to meet defined budgets
  • Play a role in the design features of the system with engine programmer
  • Support gameplay/vfx/audio programmers in the usage of destructible assets
  • Stay up to date on Unreal Engine best practices regarding content creation and performance
Qualifications

What we are looking for:

  • Having shipped at least one title as a technical artist 
  • 4 years Unreal Engine experience
  • Having shipped an open world game
  • Houdini and its destruction tool set experience
  • And/or other procedure destruction asset generation pipeline experience


Additional Information

Eligible to work full time in Canada

title: Peintre
description:
Tu es peintre et tu es à la recherche de nouveaux défis? Tu es minutieux et perfectionniste?

Une entreprise de Sherbrooke spécialisé dans la fabrication d'armoires de cuisines est à ta recherche! Viens postuler.

Poste: Peintre
Horaire: de SOIR du lundi au jeudi de 15h15 à 1h45
Salaire: entre 19$ et 22$/h selon l'expérience
Lieu: Sherbrooke (accessible en transport en commun)
Type: Permanent

Avantages
En travaillant pour cette compagnie, tu auras:

Poste Permanent
Assurances collectives ;
Congé d’anniversaire payé;
Entreprise en croissance;
12 congés fériés offerts;
Remboursement de lunette ou lentilles;
Semaine visant à la reconnaissance des employés;
Horaire de travail stimulante;
Milieu de travail sécuritaire et inclusif

Responsabilités
Le/la peintre est responsable de créer, mélanger et appliquer des peintures, des teintures et une variété de vernis. Étant un des derniers maillons de la chaîne de production, le/la peintre est responsable de la qualité du fini.

Peinture / Teinture / Vernis
• Peinturer les pièces en bois de diverses essences avec des peintures à l’huile ou à l’eau à l’aide d’un pistolet à peinture;
• Teindre les pièces en bois avec de la teinture à l’huile ou à l’eau;
• Préparer les produits de peintures, de teinture et de vernis en fonction des chartes;
• Consigner les nouvelles couleurs dans des chartes;
• Travailler en collaboration avec la personne coloriste
• Préparer les surfaces pour appliquer correctement les produits de peinture, de teinture ou de vernis;
• Effectuer des retouches de peinture, de teinture ou de vernis lorsque nécessaire;

Sablage
• Effectuer du sablage de finition à l’occasion
• Participer aux activités de sablage brut
• Utiliser des crayons pour corriger les petits détails et colliger les informations sur les peintures, les teintures et les vernis
• Utiliser de l’époxy pour réparer des pièces en bois;
• Utiliser des papiers sablés de différents grains ou des sableuses rotatives sur diverses essences de bois;


Qualifications
Nous cherchons quelqu'un qui:

- Détient de l'expérience comme peintre dans un milieu industriel ou en carrosserie (atout)
- A la capacité de suivre un certain rythme
- Est manuel, minutieux et autonome
- Est en mesure de bien distinguer les couleurs
- A la capacité d'effectuer des mouvements répétitif
- A la capacité de travailler debout avec un masque spécialisé


Sommaire
Le poste t'intéresse?

Postulez en ligne, écrivez-nous au https://www.facebook.com/randstadsherbrooke/ ou appelez-nous au 819 346-9244 ligne 1.

Nos services sont gratuits et nous avons plusieurs opportunités d’emploi à Sherbrooke et dans la région. Donc, si vous êtes à la recherche d’un nouvel emploi, envoyez-nous votre candidature ou contactez-nous. Il nous fera plaisir de discuter avec vous des diverses opportunités que nous avons à vous offrir.

Stéphanie et Anick

Randstad Canada s'engage à favoriser une main-d'œuvre représentative de toutes les populations du Canada. Nous nous engageons en conséquence à développer et à mettre en œuvre des stratégies pour promouvoir l'équité, la diversité et l'inclusion dans toutes nos sphères d'activité en examinant nos politiques, pratiques et systèmes internes tout au long du cycle de vie de notre main-d'œuvre, y compris au niveau du recrutement, de la rétention et de l'avancement pour tout individu. En plus de notre profond engagement sur le respect des principes des droits de la personne, nous nous engageons à prendre toute mesure positive pour influer sur les changements à mettre en place en vue de garantir la participation de tout individu dans le monde du travail et ce, sans obstacle, systémique ou autre, en particulier pour les groupes en quête d'équité généralement sous-représentés dans la main-d'œuvre au Canada, y compris les personnes qui s'identifient comme femmes ou personnes non-binaires/non conformes au genre, les Peuples et communautés autochtones, les personnes en situation de handicap (visible ou invisible), les personnes faisant partie des minorités visibles, les personnes racisées et des communautés LGBTQ2+.

Randstad Canada s'engage à créer et à maintenir un milieu de travail inclusif et accessible pour toutes les personnes candidates et employés en soutenant leurs besoins d'accessibilité et d'accommodation tout au long du cycle de vie de l'emploi. Nous demandons à toutes les personnes demandeuses d'emploi de bien vouloir identifier leurs besoins en matière d'accommodation en envoyant un courriel à

accessibilite@randstad.ca

pour s'assurer de leur capacité à participer pleinement au processus d'entrevue.

title: Jr. Graphic Designer
description:
Job Description:

At One Kings Lane, weâ€™re doing so much more than selling great home dÃ©cor. We are pioneering a new generation in ecommerce, building the next great lifestyle brand, and rapidly scaling our revenues and employee base. Our company is full of passionate, innovative, agile and customer-focused employees who understand the value of collaboration. If you bring passion and high impact to your work each day, we invite you to apply to join the One Kings Lane family and see where we can take this companyâ€”and your careerâ€”together.  

 

Your day to day will vary but hereâ€™s an idea of what youâ€™ll work on:  

  • Designing and coding daily email campaigns  
  • Creating email and SMS graphics and templates, web banners and graphical elements, banner ad designs, and various other design projects.  
  • Staying abreast of any industry-wide changes in design philosophy and any new tools and technologies being used for web design.    
  • Working closely with design team and email marketing    

 

Our ideal candidate  

  • Bachelorâ€™s Degree or Equivalent Experience  
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional experience designing email campaign creative, graphic design, coding for email  
  • Proficiency in Figma, Adobe creative suite and experience with animation  
  • Understand the One Kings Lane brand aesthetic    
  • Working knowledge of HTML (HTML5, Java Script, and CSS aplus but not required)  
  • Experience with email marketing service providers (ESPs) a must
  • Ability to be collaborative in a deadline-driven environment  
  • Stay current on design trends, technologies, and usability  
  • Have strong attention to detail and effective communication skills (written and oral)  
  • Experience using Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word),  
  • Ability to work well with others  
  • Creative problem-solving skills  
  • Ability to work efficiently and accurately in a high-volume production environment  

 

Whatâ€™s in it for you?  

  • Massive career growth opportunities  
  • Competitive compensation and benefits  
  • Casual/flexible work environment, no suit or ties  
  • Birthday off with pay!

title: Graphic Design Intern
description:
StackAdapt is hiring a Graphic Design Intern for an exciting opportunity to join our innovative Design team and help the Marketing team deliver fascinating content. If you are looking to grow your professional experience as a designer, this is for you!

In this role, you will explore brand application, multimedia design, video animation, layout and composition within a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.

StackAdapt is a Remote First company, we are open to applicants located anywhere in the GTA for this position.

title: Graphic Design Intern (Summer 2022)
description:
Graphic Design Intern (Summer 2022)Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future.At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

ABB Smart Buildings digitally transforms commercial, industrial and residential buildings for the highest comfort, efficiency, safety and security - enhancing quality of life in buildings of the future through safe, smart and sustainable electrification solutions, services and products.
Your responsibilities

  • Work with product managers to support initiatives related to the creation or revision of sales tools.
  • Create or revise product catalogs.
  • Create and update documentation and perform data entry.

Your background
  • College or University student in graphic design.
  • Ability to work with Adobe InDesign software.
  • Proficient in Microsoft applications.(Excel/Word/PowerPoint)
  • Good communication skills.
  • Bilingual French and English (spoken and written).

More about us
We look forward to receiving your application. If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our websitewww.abb.com.For the 4th year in a row, ABB Canada has been recognized as one of Canada's top employers by Forbes Magazine and has been ranked #1 within the industry category. Also named as Canada's Top 100 Employers, Montreal's Top Employers, Canada's Top Employers for Young People, and Best Candidate Experience Award (CandE Award), ABB's culture and commitment are to provide a caring workplace where everyone collaborates, feels valued, respected, included and supported. Also committed to ensuring that all policies and practices respect the Employment Equity Program, we aim for our workforce to be truly representative of the four designated groups; women, aboriginal people, members of visible minorities, and/or persons with disabilities. ABB will provide reasonable accommodation to the applicant with disabilities and encourage applicants to self-identify in the application process.#LI-Hybrid

title: Senior Technical Artist
description:
Senior Technical Artist
Montreal


With over 4,000 team members across nine global locations, our client is developing new gaming experiences that are changing the industry. Their most recent flagship title grossed over $1 billion within six months and is enjoyed by over 30 million players everyday.

Their Canadian studio is developing a brand-new, AAA open-world action-adventure title. Over the next two years, they are growing across North America to realize the vision of their ambitious project.

What our client offers:

  • Cutting-edge, brand-new AAA project: Opportunity to make an impact on one of the most ambitious gaming projects currently under development
  • Flat, tech-oriented culture: Work in a refreshing, focused, and down-to-earth studio environment with some of best professionals in the business
  • Industry-leading compensation: they benchmark against the top technology companies, not other gaming studios.

What you will do:

  • Configure,test,maintainandplay an important part in the development of the destruction system
  • Ensure alignment of destructiblesystem with high level design requirements for the game
  • Elaboratebudgetsfordestructiblecontent,memory-wyse,performance-wyseandplatform-wyse(mobile,nextgen)
  • Assistandsupportcontentcreatorsmakingdestructibleassets
  • Assist in designing of featuresofthesystemwithengineprogrammer
  • Supportgameplay, vfx, audioprogrammersintheusageofdestructibleassets

What we are looking for:

  • Experience shipping atleastonetitleasatechnicalartist
  • 4+ years UnrealEngineexperience
  • Experience shipping anopenworldgame
  • Knowledge of Houdinianditsdestructiontoolset
  • Experience withotherproceduredestructionassetgenerationpipeline
How to apply?
You can apply directly tojosh.morantz@talentlab.com or on our website atwww.talentlab.com. We want to thank all applicants for their interest, but only those in consideration will be contacted.

title: Jr. Production Designer - Digital
description:
Company Description

Publicis is an omni-channel communications agency with over 600 employees across our Canadian operations.  The office is the largest in our industry in Canada and boasts talent across various disciplines of marketing and advertising expertise. Publicis carries a balanced split of Canadian, U.S. and Global clients for which we are Agency of Record.  Publicis supports a range of D&I actions through our Driving Change team as well as giving back to the community through a long-standing participation in the Out of the Cold Program. With a strong, active and familial culture, Pub United is the agency’s social club, hosting events as wide reaching as Curling, Trivia Nights and more.

Job Description

Publicis is looking for a creative thinker with an eye for design to join our team. You will learn from other designers, art directors and copywriters and have the opportunity to work with a variety of big-name clients. Chemistry within our team is very important – Publicis is looking for an individual who is able to collaborate with people from a variety of departments: account management, project management and senior creative leads.

As a production designer, you will be expected to apply design sensibility to execute creative campaigns established by senior creative leads across a number of digital media channels.

Our ideal candidate should: 

  • Demonstrate the ability to take direction and thrive in a team environment 
  • Be able to troubleshoot software and hardware and be a natural problem solver
  • Set high quality standards for themselves in everything they do
  • Be able to deliver high quality work and possess a strong attention to detail
  • Welcome constructive feedback and believe in continuous learning
  • Be able to maintain constant and efficient communication between multidisciplinary teams
Qualifications

  • 1-2 years digital design and interactive work experience
  • Undergraduate degree or post-secondary certificate in Graphic Design
  • Proficiency in Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign)
  • Proficiency in Google Docs/Slides, PowerPoint and Keynote
  • Able to learn new tools and apps used for design (Figma, Sketch, Miro)
  • Able to work in a team environment
  • Able to communicate creative and technical thoughts and ideas
  • Able to multitask and prioritize effectively
  • Demonstrate artistic ability
  • Able to meet deadlines and follow directions
  • Able to thrive in a high pressure, detail-oriented environment

Interested candidates should:

  • Submit a cover letter and resume with a link to your website or PDF of work samples.
  • Clearly include your name, address, telephone number and email address


Additional Information

Publicis Canada is committed to building a diverse workforce representative of our community. We encourage and are pleased to consider all qualified candidates, without regard to race, colour, citizenship, religion, sex, marital / family status, sexual orientation, gender identity, aboriginal status, age, disability or persons who may require an accommodation, to apply.  If you require a specific accommodation please contact Human Resources at 416-925-7733 or by email at inquiries@publicisna.com

title: Senior Tech Artist
description:
Company Description

Odyssey Interactive is a Canadian Game Development studio formed around the mantra of building "Games you Live". We believe that the best games are the ones you think about long after you put them down, that help you feel like you're a part of something bigger than yourself, and that you believe you can invest in for years to come. 

The studio is comprised of experienced devs from a large number of studios and games such as League of Legends, Teamfight Tactics, Apex Legends, Call of Duty, Warframe and many more. We're a small, talent dense team that is looking to make accessible yet deep PvP games that are played by players all over the world by building games with them from the earliest points in our development process.

Job Description

As a tech artist on our team, your focus will be on helping build out and support the character and art pipeline of a brand new IP, looking for ways to solve creative problems with technical solutions working closely with our character artists, animators, and other artists on the team. 

Day to day responsibilities:

  • Rigging characters and props to help our animators achieve the look and feel we're targeting with our style
  • Set-up character assets in the engine (meshes, animation blueprints)
  • Provide technical support to art and animation in both Maya and Unreal Engine
  • Build asset generation pipelines and tools to make the lives of artists easier :D
Qualifications

  • 4 years experience working as a tech artist in games or adjacent industries
  • Experience with modern engines like Unity or Unreal
  • Expertise in content creation tools like Maya and Blender

Nice to haves:

  • Experience with shaders or modern rendering techniques a huge plus!
  • Experience with cross platform development and knowledge of what limitations and opportunities exist in the space
  • Experience working with, or passion for an anime art aesthetic


Additional Information

Benefits:

  • Comprehensive health benefits.

  • Unlimited paid-time-off policy with 2 week minimum enforced by the company as well as a week off between Christmas and New Years.

  • Stock options in an early stage startup.

  • Permanent Remote Work - or relocation assistance if you chose to join the team in Canada.

title: Jr. Digital Designer
description:
Company Description

We’re a creative consultancy. That means we put creativity at the center of all our thinking—be it strategic consulting, design and advertising or product and service design. If you believe in the power of creativity to transform how people think and behave, you’re in the right place.

Job Description

Leo Burnett Toronto is looking for a Junior Digital Designer to join our team! 

We’re looking for someone passionate about creating content on the digital platform to join our team as a Junior Digital Designer. The Digital Designer reports to the Director of Creative Technologies and will develop their existing skills by working with senior creative staff on a range of projects. They must have an understanding of typography, layout, animation and art direction. 

Please be sure to include an up-to-date and relevant portfolio in your application. 
 

Key Responsibilities: 

  • Newsletters  
  • Web maintenance, new page layouts, production assets  
  • Online advertising 
  • Supporting the senior team throughout the execution of campaigns and projects 
Qualifications

  • 6 months - 1 year of relevant digital design expereince 
  • Good knowledge of the following tools is required: 
  • After Effects 
  • Illustrator 
  • Photoshop 
  • InDesign 
  • Sketch 
  • InVision 
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills 
  • Confidence to contribute throughout the entire create process 
  • Adeptness with leading design software packages 
  • Some agency experience 
  • The ability to meet deadlines in a high pressure environment 
  • A background of working as part of a team 
  • The ability to see projects through from inception to production 
  • Consistency regardless of project size 
  • Good organizational skills that support the rest of the team 
  • The motivation to maintain and improve design standards 
  • The willingness to listen to feedback and use it to improve 


Additional Information

Leo Burnett Toronto is an equal opportunity employer with a strong commitment to diversity and inclusion. Drawing on valuable perspectives and insights from our unique workforce allows us to continue sharing our creativity with the world. We encourage applications from all qualified individuals and will provide appropriate accommodation for candidates with disabilities or accessibility needs throughout the recruitment process, upon request. Please contact our recruiter for any questions, accommodations or specific requests.

Drawing on valuable perspectives and insights from our unique workforce allows us to continue sharing our creativity with the world.\u202fWe encourage applications from all qualified individuals and will provide appropriate accommodation for candidates with disabilities or accessibility needs throughout the recruitment process, upon request.\u202fPlease contact our recruiter for any questions,\xa0accommodations\xa0or specific requests.', 'Some agency experience', 'Good organizational skills that support the rest of the team']

title: Graphiste junior | Junior Graphic Designer
description:
Why Grass Valley?

GV is the leader in live broadcast solutions.

GV keeps current with the evolving market: We create innovating breakthrough live broadcast solutions to serve customerâ€™s needs and realities.

GVâ€™s rich history: For the last 60 years, we have enabled the production of rich and compelling content bringing viewers as close to the action as possible. We believe in real connection.

The GV people: We are knowledgeable creatives. We thrive on passion, dedication, and collaboration. At GV, we have one main goal, which is to deliver high quality and individually curated solutions to customers worldwide.

Are you our next ambassador, technologist, thought leader or innovator?

Help us continue to spread the broadcast magic. Join us!

For further information, please visit www.grassvalley.com.

The Opportunity

The Junior Graphic Artist will assist the marketing team in the design and graphic production of various projects for marketing & company initiatives.  

Your Role

  • Design and produce various materials for print and digital
  • Ensure projects are completed with high quality and on schedule
  • Develop design of corporate tradeshow materials including large format graphics, print and digital invitations, advertisements, digital signage, attire logos, pre and post event communications for external and internal, etc.
  • Design and produce visuals for web, social media, email and campaigns
  • Produce high quality corporate presentations and templates in PowerPoint
  • Support the Creative Design Manager in the creative direction for the company as well as in brand guidelines
  • Ensure brand guidelines are respected throughout all content production
  • Support the Creative Design Manager in file proofing & artwork delivering for the print

title: Production Graphic Designer - Internship - Summer 2022
description:
The Production Graphic Designer is responsible for creating and editing various marketing materials through various digital and print projects. The Production Graphic Designer must ensure that all pertaining work respects Behaviour standards and its corporate identity and any brand associated with the project. 

To be considered for this internship, you must:
- Submit your portfolio along with your resume;
- Be eligible to work in Canada at the time of your application;
- Be available to work 37.5 hours a week.

Internships dates are flexible, depending on the business needs and the candidate’s availabilities.

What you will do:

  • Under the supervision of the Art Director, create and maintain various marketing assets, including presentations, logos, advertising (digital & print), tradeshow signs, assets for video, web promotional elements, and all collateral images;
  • Design and produce marketing graphic for the various internal brands and licensed products;
  • Update collateral and assets with new material or modified layouts;
  • Responsible for the quality and accuracy of content, ensuring proper sign-off and final approvals from the Art Director;
  • Collaborate and support other members of the team for their specific design needs. 

What we're looking for:

  • Degree in graphic design;
  • Comfortable on a Windows platform;
  • Well versed in the Adobe Suite, mainly Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects and XD will be an asset;
  • Knowledge of Microsoft Office applications (PowerPoint, Word, etc.);
  • Strong attention to details;
  • Creative, conscientious, methodical, and organized;
  • Willing to learn new design methodologies;
  • Team player with the ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced team environment;
  • Ability to work with multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize projects and meet deadlines;
  • Bilingual (French and English) written and spoken.

Ce que vous ferez:

  • Sous la supervision du∙de la directeur∙trice artistique, créer et maintenir différents éléments marketing tels des présentations, des logos, de la publicité (numérique et imprimée), des visuels pour les expositions commerciales, des vidéos, des éléments promotionnels pour le web et des images connexes;
  • Conceptualiser et produire des éléments de marketing graphiques pour différentes marques internes et produits sous licence;
  • Mettre à jour les images connexes et autres éléments en harmonie avec le nouveau matériel ou avec la nouvelle mise en page;
  • Superviser la qualité et l’exactitude du contenu, notamment son approbation initiale et son approbation finale par le∙la directeur∙trice artistique;
  • Collaborer et offrir un soutien aux autres membres de l’équipe pour leurs besoins spécifiques en termes de design.

Ce que nous recherchons :

  • Diplôme en conception graphique;
  • À l’aise dans l’environnement Windows;
  • Excellentes connaissances de la Suite Adobe (Photoshop, Illustrator; After Effects et XD) un atout;
  • Connaissance des applications de Microsoft Office (PowerPoint, Word, etc.);
  • Souci du détail;
  • Créatif∙ve, consciencieux∙se, méthodique et organisé∙e;
  • Désir d’apprendre de nouveaux concepts et méthodologies;
  • Joueur∙euse d’équipe ayant la capacité de travailler de façon collaborative dans un environnement au rythme rapide;
  • Capacité à travailler sur de multiples projets de façon simultanée et à prioriser les projets selon les échéanciers;
  • Bilinguisme (français et anglais) à l’oral et à l’écrit.
Le∙la concepteur∙trice graphique, Production, est responsable de créer et d’itérer différents éléments marketing destinés à des projets numériques et imprimés. Le∙la concepteur∙trice graphique doit assurer que l’ensemble des éléments sur lesquels il∙elle travaille respectent les normes de Behaviour en ce qui a trait à son image de marque, et celles des autres marques associées au projet.

Pour être considéré.e pour cette opportunité de stage tu dois :  
- Joindre un portfolio à ton application;
- Être éligible à travailler au moment de soumettre ta candidature;
- Être disponible pour travailler 37.5 heures par semaine.

Les dates de stage sont flexibles, dépendamment des besoins d’affaires ainsi que des disponibilités des candidats.

title: Graphic/Production Designer (Summer 2022 Co-op Student)
description:
Welcome to HILO! We are busy disrupting the commercial real estate (CRE) industry, the largest asset class in the world. HILO was created to connect people to their workplace building and surrounding community, no matter where they work or live. The pandemic has caused building operators and employers to create new spaces, services and amenities that support hybrid working. Our HILO workplace experience and engagement platform gives tenants and employees mobile access to everything available at their building. 

We are a hybrid-friendly workplace that values connection, tenacious focus, growth, change and of course, community. We are deeply passionate about what we do and believe that our team is our greatest asset. After all, weâ€™re in the people business. We hope youâ€™ll join us!

The Role

We are seeking a motivated Graphic/Production Designer (Summer 2022 Co-op Student) to create high quality and engaging content to support HILOâ€™s growth marketing strategies. Our ideal candidate has a passion for graphic design, has proficiency with Adobe Creative Cloud applications, is detail-oriented and doesnâ€™t mind trying new things while wearing many hats in order to get the job done.

Here are the things youâ€™ll own day to day:

  • Produce and edit high quality print and digital marketing collateral following brand guidelines for HILO and HILOâ€™s building partners.
  • Support creative needs for HILO social media content. 
  • Support creative needs for HILOâ€™s Onboarding team.
  • Work closely with the Podcast & Video Coordinator to provide design and/or production support that may be required to produce the company podcasts.
  • Support the entire Growth Marketing team.
  • Participate in weekly Marketing meetings.

Our ideal candidate:

  • Is currently registered as a full time student in a design, media, marketing, production or related post secondary institution program.
  • Has a passion for graphic design.
  • Has the passion, drive and ambition that is uniquely suited to startup life.
  • Is proficient with Adobe CC (InDesign, Illustrator and Photoshop).
  • Bonus if you also have Premiere, After Effects and Audition skills.
  • Has exceptional communication skills.
  • Has strong prioritization, time management and organizational skills.
  • Values collaboration, connection and community.

What we offer:

  • A hybrid-friendly workplace that values its people.
  • Flexible work schedule.
  • Work for an emerging startup at the ground level with the opportunity to grow.
  • A small team that fosters an entrepreneurial mindset and offers on-going support/mentorship.

Please note that this role is paid, contingent on government grants or subsidization being received. The term will last from May to August, but may be extended at the discretion of HILO.

HILO for All

At HILO, we are committed to building a community where everyone feels included, valued and heard. Diversity, inclusion, and belonging are an important part of our everyday working culture. We strongly encourage applications from all people, no matter their race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability or marital status.

title: Senior Technical Artist - SPORTS ART
description:
EA SPORTS is one of the leading sports entertainment brands in the world, with top-selling videogame franchises, award-winning interactive technology, fan programs, and cross-platform digital experiences. EA SPORTS creates connected experiences that ignite the emotion of sport through industry-leading sports video games, including Madden NFL football, FIFA soccer, NHL® hockey, and EA SPORTS UFC.

The EA SPORTS ART team is a global community of content creators, fueled by imagination and a unified passion to grow the love of sports for players worldwide through inspiring visuals and immersive experiences. We push visual boundaries and create leading edge content across multiple disciplines. Serving our broad portfolio of sports titles, and across multiple art styles, we craft amazing games for hundreds of millions of sports fans worldwide. 

EA SPORTS ART encompasses Characters, Environments, Lighting, Project Management, Technical Art, and Visual Effects. We are a diverse group that encourages team members to bring their unique perspectives and expertise to the table

The Technical Art team combines creativity and imagination with technical expertise. We are the bridge between artists, engineers and designers responsible for data design and content production workflows.

Your Responsibilities  

The Senior Technical Artist (Sr TA) acts as a bridge between the artists and engineers. They are considered part of the art team and work closely with artists, project managers, SEs, and the Technical Art team. The main areas of responsibilities include art production workflows, tools, pipelines, asset optimization/integration, and shader development. Sr TAs are expected to assume ownership over any technical issues that arise on their project and bring them to resolution. This often includes delegating to/mentoring more junior staff on the team. You can be from an Art, Design, Mathematics, Engineering, or Computer Science background; however, you must demonstrate a comfort level in working with both art and science. Senior Technical Artists report to Technical Art Directors on the EA Create Technical Art team.

Your Qualifications:

  • At least 6+ years of cinematic/games production experience. You have completed more than 3 AAA games/movies.
  • A bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in a related field is desired.
  • Effective at communicating with different audiences: artists, engineers, managers.
  • Proficient scripting/programming in python and C#. (C++ is a bonus, but is not required).
  • Expert knowledge of a 2D and 3D art packages: Maya/Photoshop needed. Houdini/Substance Designer a bonus.
  • A solutions-provider, particularly as it pertains to testing and debugging technical issues.
  • Experience with asset optimization challenges/techniques.
  • A willingness to jump into the unknown and solve new problems; the ability to think creatively to resolve technical challenges and limitations.
  • A Passion for Games!
