title: Graphics Designer
description:
Company Description

ARE YOU CUT OUT FOR AIM RECYCLING?

Take recycling to a global scale.

Join us in our mission to recycle more than 3,000,000 tons of metal every year across the globe. At AIM Recycling, we recycle metals to the maximum of their capacity. For more than 80 years, we have been uniting our strengths to make a positive difference. Join our team to contribute to our company’s growth and to support our recycling activities in North America.

It’s simple: we do it right. We aim for excellence.

Job Description

Reporting to the Director of Marketing - Ontario, the Graphic Designer role at AIM is responsible for designing and producing marketing visual tools in line with the division’s brand image. 

Design

  • Design and produce all marketing/visual tools for AIM Recycling ensuring a strong and consistent brand image (internal and external displays, web, traditional media, social media)
  • Participate in the development of the creative aspect of various projects
  • Create mockups and make recommendations for branding on equipment, buildings, etc.

Collaboration

  • Meet with clients or other team members to determine requirements and vision for design elements, which may include multiple strategy meetings
  • Work with a wide range of media and use graphic design software
  • Coordinates with internal teams, including marketing, in the design concept phase through completion of a project

Creative

  • Assist Director of Marketing with execution of creative output across all applications
  • Ensure accuracy of all creative before approval and execution
  • Ensure that Head Office has all necessary brochures and collateral on hand at all times
  • Support internal departments with creative tasks/executions as needed

Budget and Planning

  • Prioritize and manage multiple projects within design specifications and budget restrictions

Other duties as required; The Graphic Designer will experience intermittent peak periods (tied to site openings, events, trade shows, etc.) that will occasionally call for longer hours, including some evenings and weekends.

Skills

  • Analytical
  • Creative
  • Organized
  • Attention to Detail
  • Time Management
  • Flexible
Qualifications

  • Post secondary education in graphic arts, design, or related field is an asset
  • Minimum of three to five years of relevant experience in a similar role
  • Knowledge of Adobe PhotoShop, Premiere, Illustrator, Sketch, InDesign, and other graphic design software
  • Agency and consumer facing experience is an asset


Additional Information

All information received will be addressed confidentially. We thank all applicants for their interest but only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.

title: Senior 3D Designer
description:
Description



Hey there, we’re Article. We’re a digital-first furniture brand that’s working to make everyday living better by providing an easy way for people to furnish their space. We don’t have brick-and-mortar stores, so we’re able to deliver better value on beautiful modern furniture. We've ranked as one of Canada’s Fastest-Growing Companies for the last three years, and we’re on the hunt for talented, enthusiastic team members who want to solve meaningful problems in pursuit of being remarkably better for our customers.

We’re looking for a Senior 3D Designer who will assist in the various content creation pipelines here at Article. Your days will be spent creating 3D assets on various projects across our Product Development, Marketing, and Creative Teams. As a Sr 3D Designer / Artist, you are responsible for developing top-quality real-time assets that reflect the high production standards of digital assets at Article. You will collaborate daily with the 3D Manager to plan projects and track your daily tasks. You will manage, evaluate, and guide an exceptional team of outsourced vendors to deliver compelling interactive experiences for 3D & AR.

What You'll Do


  • Build real-time 3D assets using various hardware and software
  • Collaborate with 3D Manager to control quality standards for 3D assets which are produced from outsourced vendors
  • Attend daily standups with cross-functional stakeholders to monitor and discuss the development and execution of ongoing projects
  • Identify and conceive essential features to improve and optimize 3D pipelines and communicate them to key stakeholders
  • Review asset submissions to verify quality and confirm deliverables follow specific workflow standards
  • Actively learn and stay up to date on capabilities/limitations of emerging technologies and applications for 3D Models from a technical standpoint 
  • Mentor and develop Junior 3D Designer/ Artists— and help create a dynamic, fun, and supportive culture for our Particles

Skills Knowledge and Expertise


  • 3+ years of applicable experience as a Sr 3D Designer / Artist
  • Proficiency in Traditional Modeling workflows using Autodesk Fusion 360, 3dsMax, Solidworks
  • Proficient in rendering in Blender, V-Ray 
  • Proficiency in High Poly Sculpting workflows 
  • Proficiency in industry-standard Texturing workflows 
  • Experience in 3D asset creation for real-time assets (AR, VR, Game Development)
  • Detail Focused - keen eye for judging the quality of 3D assets
  • Good communication skills - help others and ask for help when needed
  • Great team-player attitude - flexible with new ideas, being open to direction and changes. Listening to teammates opinions and feedback
  • Deadline oriented - able to manage and organize work so you meet all deadlines and are able to adjust when changes happen

Preferred Qualifications:
  • 3D art portfolio of compelling digital work
  • Experience in other disciplines in VFX/Game Development (Engineering, Animation, VFX)
  • Knowledge of Photogrammetry workflow
  • Experience in animation for media and marketing applications
  • Passionate about making shopping for a beautiful space radically easy.

Benefits



At Article, we believe in an “Ownership Mindset” where you’ll be given autonomy and the ability to own your work. Beyond a competitive salary:

  • We reward that ownership mindset, so we offer stock options after one year of employment
  • With our fast growth, we have a culture of curiosity, where learning happens on the fly — and while having a lot of fun
  • Access to dental and health benefits package plus a health/lifestyle spending account for your total physical and mental well-being
  • 45% discount on our products so you can experience first-hand why our customers love Article 
  • Your choice of state-of-the-art laptops with the tech and tools to easily collaborate 
Most HQ employees are working from home due to COVID-19. When it’s safe to return to the office, we have flexible solutions if you want to be in the office a lot, sometimes, or not at all. 
  • When our office is safe to reopen, you’ll love that:
    • The Article HQ is a converted warehouse with in-house photo studios, an airy open layout, an open kitchen filled with snacks, premium coffees and teas (and ALL the milks).
    • A dog-friendly office. We love our dog friends here at Article. If you have a well-behaved, well-socialized pup, we’d love to have them in the office too.
    • Onsite fitness equipment, change rooms (including towel service!) and bike storage
    • Regular extra-curricular activities, such as socials, open-mics, picnics... even cross-country skiing! For now, we've replaced them with creative virtual events for the time being — like virtual trivia night or a cooking class through Zoom!
Ready to become a Particle? Apply today. We're excited to meet you.

#INDARTICLE
#ZR1
#LI-VJ9
#LI-Remote

title: Anime Streetwear Video Editor & Graphic Designer
description:
Are you highly skilled in design and video editing with a passion for streetwear, anime, and one-of-a-kind artwork? 

Animebae is looking for a talented Anime Streetwear Video Editor & Graphic Designer to join our growing team remotely on a contract part-time basis! 

About Animebae 

Animebae creates one-of-a-kind streetwear experience featuring unique, anime-inspired designs. Selling in 1000 retail stores like Hot Topic and Zumiez across North America, Animebae collaborates with Japanese and international artists who bring unique perspectives and original artwork through fashion. All of our streetwear is produced ethically, and is made and designed in Vancouver, B.C. 

About You 

  • You bring a strong sense of style and interest in streetwear, anime, design and Social Media trends. 

  • You understand the â€˜street artâ€™ world â€“ whether through a design interest in fashion, tattoos, graffiti, anime or related content, your aesthetic is in line with our style! 

  • You bring content and media experience working in advertisement, marketing, and promotions. 

  • You understand how to effectively edit videos and generate stand-out content on social media (I.e., TikToks, Instagram Reels, YouTube). 

Key Responsibilities 

As an Anime Streetwear Video Editor & Graphic Designer with Animebae, you will leverage your design experience to: 

  • Work closely with our Marketing Manager to create digital promo ads through various social media channels using Photoshop. 

  • Edit video content using advanced editing software for social media (you've mastered Canva and iMovie and are proficient with programs such as Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Lightroom). 

  • Design graphics and edit/retouch photo shoot images for online channels to align with brand standards. 

  • Collaborate on and edit designs concepts for Animebae apparel/accessories.  

  • Engage with artists and companies on collaborative projects that require design edits. 

  • Create animation illustration loops with your keen eye for detail. 

  • Reflect alignment between Animebaeâ€™s social media promotions/advertisements and our brand. 

Key Qualifications 

  • An impressive portfolio of graphic design and video editing work that showcases your strong design skills in streetwear and anime. 

  • Exceptional video editing skills and experience creating animation loops. 

  • Strong proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Lightroom. 

  • Previous experience creating digital promo ads through various social media channels. 

  • An adaptable, team-focused attitude with a focus on creative collaboration and project timelines. 

  • Demonstrated skills and experience in animation would be considered an asset.  

Whatâ€™s In It For You 

  • Competitive compensation plan. 

  • Flexible work hours to support your creative process! 

  • A 2-month contract including guaranteed 12 hours per week (minimum).  

  • An opportunity to work in cutting-edge, digital art. 

  • 50% off of all Animebae products in our store. 

  • Option to work in-person at our open-concept office if you are local to the area (North Richmond)! 

Does this sound like the opportunity youâ€™ve been waiting for to share your design skills with the world? 

We want to hear from you â€“ apply today with your resume and portfolio! 

Interested in checking out our work? Visit our site at https://animebae.co and follow us on Instagram at animebae.co!

title: Graphic Designer
description:
ABOUT LOCALCOIN

At Localcoin, we aim to empower our customers to join the crypto economy by helping them buy, sell, and convert digital currencies. In addition to running Canada's largest Bitcoin ATM network, we offer an expanding product line that makes digital currencies far more accessible for crypto-enthusiasts in their communities.

We believe that the cryptocurrency space is one that rewards passion, creativity, innovation and those willing to challenge the status quo. As a member of our rapidly-growing team, you'll join a talented, dynamic group of team members who will encourage you to learn, grow and thrive in your career every step of the way. So if you're a self-starter looking to hone your skills in a startup environment that fosters innovation, transparency and team connectivity, we look forward to hearing from you! 

YOUR ROLE 

At Localcoin, our creative assets are a top priority. As a Graphic Designer, you will bring your knowledge of different brands, products and media outlets and effectively create designs for our website, media assets and promotional material that will engage our customers and bring our brand to life. 

Reporting to our Senior Director of Marketing, you will work in close collaboration with cross functional teams to discover how to best showcase Localcoin while developing exceptional creatives to support all business channels. This position will be based out of Toronto, ON and will be remote work for the time being. 

YOUR IMPACT

  • Generate compelling static and dynamic creative assets for online campaigns including digital, social media, email and web 
  • Lead the creative development process from theme and conceptual development to asset creative for online and offline elements
  • Work collaboratively with our marketing team to explore and develop design strategiesCollaborate with the Web Developer to design graphics for company websites, landing pages, web forms to enhance the user experience for Localcoin customers
  • Design and maintain consistent brand presence for internal assets such as document and presentation templates, sales collateral and internal communications
  • Bring your subject matter expertise to support every department with design needs for proposals, presentations and other pursuit collateral by accomplishing the tasks as needed.
  • Drive performance of selected marketing KPIs such as ad click through rates and ad conversion rates by turning provided data into effective designs
  • Improve user interface based on advanced analytics available to you. (i.e. Our website and mobile application, ad creatives and email designs)
  • Be a brand ambassador for Localcoin to uphold the integrity of our Brand across all channels and projects 

THIS IS YOU

  • Bachelor's Degree in Graphic Design or similar field
  • 3-5 years of relevant work experience
  • Experience working in highly regulated and/or multi-dimensional environments with ecommerce or fintech based brands 
  • Experience working in an agency/client focused environment
  • Passion and interest in learning about cryptocurrency
  • Advanced proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Animate, Premier Pro) on PC/Mac
  • Strong experience in content production for Social Media, Email, Online Advertising, and Video
  • Highly organized and comfortable balancing multiple projects and competing priorities
  • Ability to work well cross-functionally with all levels.
  • Experience working in a fast-paced, agile environment with multiple stakeholders
  • Experience working in a highly regulated environment where there are restrictions on creative within certain platforms
  • Passionate about graphic design and do the impossible to stay up to date on new techniques.
  • A professional who craves for responsibility and thrives in a rapidly evolving environment

THIS IS NICE

  • Basic understanding of UX/UI for website design enhancements
  • Knowledge and interest in Photography is a plus
  • Sketch/Illustration skills for storyboarding video concepts/dynamic online ads a plus

WHY YOU WILL LOVE WORKING AT LOCALCOIN!

Professional Development

We are a fast-growing company and as a result, there are ample opportunities for career growth and professional development when you join our team. From a transparent promotion structure and defined career paths to a wide range of learning and development opportunities, we do what it takes to invest in your career and help you hone your skills so you can grow alongside us! 

Health & Wellness Benefits

We offer a comprehensive array of health and wellness benefits that provide choices so you can tune your benefits plan to fit your unique needs. 

Events and Socials

Just because we are working remotely, does not mean we don't know how to get together! When you join our team, you'll enjoy everything from virtual company-wide teaching and training days, industry events, themed monthly Fri-YAY happy hours, team social events and much more! 

Employee Discounts 

All of our team members enjoy exclusive employee discounts at all of our cryptocurrency ATMs across Canada. 

Localcoin is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where all individuals have an opportunity to succeed. If you require accommodation at any stage throughout the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
description:
Are you a self-starter with a passion for all aspects of design? Do you have excellent project management skills, with a demonstrated ability to multi-task and set priorities? If so, we may have the perfect opportunity for you.

Working with the Art Director, you’ll have the opportunity to affect the evolution of the Maplesoft brand as we continue to grow, as well as supporting the ongoing business with digital, print, web and video collateral.

Key Accountabilities

  • Providing design support across all areas of the business
  • Developing creative for new and existing marketing campaigns and promotions
  • Designing assets for digital campaigns and overall website design maintenance

Requirements

  • Experience working in a Graphic Design role
  • Post-secondary education in Graphic Design or related field, or equivalent experience
  • Strong design and layout skills
  • Proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite
  • Proficiency in front-end development web programming languages such as HTML and CSS
  • A conceptual thinker with an eye for detail
  • Ability to work quickly and manage multiple projects on tight deadlines
  • Understanding of UX/UI design

Applicants should include a PDF of work and/or link to online portfolio.

Working at Maplesoft

For over 30 years, Maplesoft™ has been a leading provider of software tools for engineering, science, research and teaching. Maple is math software that combines the world's most powerful math engine with an interface that makes it extremely easy to analyze, explore, visualize, and solve mathematical problems.

Our teams build world-class software and services for system simulation, calculation management and systems engineering. Our product suite reflects the philosophy that given great tools, people can do great things!

Maplesoft offers a collaborative culture and the opportunity to work on some of the most innovative and exciting projects in the industry. We are committed to providing every employee with professional growth opportunities, a flexible and supportive work environment, and excellent compensation and benefits. This position is a hybrid of office and home-office work.

Maplesoft is committed to integration and equal opportunity. Accommodation throughout the recruitment process is available upon request.

title: Visual Designer
description:
Job Title: Visual Designer

Location: Toronto, ON

Duration: 6+ Months

 

Must-have

·         BA/BS degree in Design (e.g. interaction, graphic, visual communications, product, industrial), HCI, CS, or a related field or equivalent experience.

·         1-3 years design industry experience working on complex digital products.

·         Portfolio that includes web and/or mobile design samples.

·         Solid knowledge of design tools (Figma, Sketch, and InVision) and principles (typography, grid systems, visual hierarchy, colour, white space, etc.).

·         Understanding of responsive design and the utilization of design systems.

·         Solid problem-solving skills and the ability to build good working relationships.

 

Nice-to-have

·         Experience working in the Financial industry specifically with Wealth Management is an asset

·         General understanding of HTML/CSS (able to produce web-ready assets and designs)

description:

Top Hat is looking for a Digital Designer to help shape the story of Top Hat now and into the future! This role will help create a wide variety of design solutions including landing pages, social ads, event collateral, and editorial. This person will also contribute to ongoing conceptual brand ideation to build an iconic Canadian brand.




Ten reasons people choose to join the Top Hat team:

title: Graphic/Visual Design Specialist
description:
Why work for Lafarge?:

 

 

 

 

 

As the global leader in innovative and sustainable building materials, weâ€™re committed to shaping a greener, smarter and healthier world. At Lafarge Canada Inc., safety comes first, collaboration matters and diversity is celebrated with people who share our desire to continually make our materials better.  

 

Do you have the drive, the skills, and the passion to join us?

 

 

Overview:

 

The successful candidate will be a brand ambassador involved in creatively designing visual materials to tell our companyâ€™s stories internally and externally (graphics and short videos).

Responsibilities:

 

  • Design graphics for our internal channels (newsletter, magazine, intranet, email templates), and external channels (social media posts, press releases, marketing materials) etc.
  • Create multimedia content for Lafarge Canadaâ€™s internal and external platforms (short videos with leadership team and employees).
  • Participate in creative ideation and brainstorming sessions.
  • Monitor internet culture and online trends to cooperate with social media management and overall corporate communications.

Relationship with Others

  • Executive Committee  
  • Internal departments, such as Marketing, HR, Environmental & Public Affairs, Sales, Operational Managers and Teams, etc.

Specific Accountabilities:

  • The Communications Team drives Lafarge Canada storytelling strategy with compelling content and visuals. The successful candidate will be a brand ambassador involved in creatively designing visual materials to tell our companyâ€™s stories internally and externally (graphics and short videos). If you are looking for a place where you can make an impact with your work and consequently grow your career, join us.
  • In this role, you will have the opportunity to do more than developing day-to-day assets, you will be able to be part of the strategy and planning behind creating compelling communications with an exceptional visual identity for Lafarge Canada. Although based on a framework, there will be room for innovation and creativity.  
Dimensions
  • The person will be evaluated on their ability to put together creative and compelling graphics/visuals, time management, organization, discipline, ability to work independently and in a team setting.
Qualifications:

 

  • Bachelor Degree or College diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Communications or related discipline
  • Creative mind with an eye for aesthetics, creative and social trends, and brand personality
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, After Effects, Premiere, Illustrator & InDesign).
  • Detailed oriented with excellent organization, project and time management
  • Self-starter with ability to work independently in a fast-paced and deadline sensitive environment
  • Creative portfolio (youâ€™ll be asked to share it)
  • Hootsuite and social media experience and knowledge an asset
  • French language skills an asset
  • Flexible work â€“ part remote/part at the office in Mississauga

 

Competency

  • Creativity
  • Action oriented
  • Approachability
  • Composure
  • Timely Decision making
  • Decision quality
LafargeHolcim:

 

As we are reinventing the way the world builds, we need world-class talent to join our Lafarge Canada team: people who are passionate, driven by curiosity and keen to grow, learn, develop and thrive in our high-performance culture.

Whatever you do, you will make a difference here. Because we know that your passion and curiosity are the natural resources the world needs.  

 

We thank you for your interest.  Only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.   Lafarge is committed to the principles of employment equity and encourages the applications from women, visible minorities, and persons with disabilities.

 

Lafarge Canada Inc. welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities.  In Ontario, our organization/business is committed to fulfilling our requirements under the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act.  Accommodations are available on request for  candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

 

Lafarge Canada is committed to providing a safe environment for employees, customers, contractors and vendors. As such, in keeping with the requirements of our industry associations, partners, and clients across Canada, Lafarge Canada has implemented a COVID-19 vaccination policy intended to reduce the spread of COVID-19. As of October 1st, 2021, all new employees joining Lafarge Canada, subject to any requirement to accommodate pursuant to applicable human rights legislation, must be fully vaccinated against COVID-19.

title: Designer graphique / Graphic designer
description:
Tu cherches à travailler dans une entreprise qui a les valeurs à la bonne place et qui contribue à bâtir des villes et communautés plus durables?


Nous recherchons une personne à l'esprit créatif, capable de sortir des sentiers battus afin d'élever notre marque et de nous aider à développer une histoire visuelle convaincante qui résonne sur tous les canaux et toutes les plateformes.


Chez MicroHabitat, nous implantons l'agriculture urbaine pour améliorer l'environnement urbain, les habitudes de vie des citadins et encourager une meilleure compréhension des enjeux environnementaux. Nous installons des potagers sur les toits des entreprises, institutions et écoles afin de reconnecter les gens à la nature et à leur alimentation.


Plus de détails:


∙Début d'emploi: Dès que possible

∙Sur appel

∙ Heures flexibles

Pour toutes questions en lien avec le poste, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter sur info@microhabitat.ca


Compétences recherchées: 


• Passion pour le design et l’influence

• Organisé.e, autonome, stratège, esprit d’équipe, prise d’initiative, créatif.ve   

• Curiosité et créativité

• Autonomie, excellent sens de l'organisation, de gestion du temps et des priorités

• Sens de l’esthétisme, de la précision et du détail

•Bonne capacité de vulgarisation et de transmission de connaissances.

•Patience, empathie et générosité.


Atout:


•Figma, Sketch (utile pour le prototypage rapide/les itérations)

•Adobe After Effects (la norme industrielle pour les animations 2D)

•Adobe XD (impression, illustrations)

•Expérience en matière de stratégie d'identité d'entreprise

•Expérience en conception et préparation du matériel imprimé 

•Maintenir une cohérence entre les échantillons de travail


Exigences:


∙ Détenir une expérience  dans le domaine de la conception graphique ou web, avec un solide   portefeuille d'exemples à partager.

∙ Expertise en matière d'identité visuelle, de marketing numérique et de conception publicitaire

∙ Esprit d'entreprise : curiosité, créativité et capacité à sortir des sentiers battus.

∙ Être bilingue et à l'aise autant à l'oral et à l'écrit en français et en anglais.

∙ Être résident Canadien et habiter au Canada


Votre rôle consistera à:


- Inspirer un contenu de marque créatif, innovant et axé sur le rayonnement.

- Concevoir et développer des actifs marketing

- Assurer la cohérence de la marque et de la création entre les différents points de contact.

- Participer à l’élaboration des supports de présentation pour les événements 

- Apporter un design innovant aux discussions sur les besoins visuels de la marque


Rôles et responsabilités:


En tant que graphiste à temps partiel de MicroHabitat, vous ferez partie intégrante de l'équipe de marketing et vous contribuerez à donner vie à la créativité de notre marque en créant des ressources web, des banques d'icônes, du contenu visuel numérique qui constitue une image de marque propre à la compagnie. Le ou la candidat.e idéal.e doit faire preuve d'ingéniosité, être à l'aise avec la technologie et avoir le souci du détail. Il ou elle doit communiquer efficacement et coordonner avec les membres de l'équipe de marketing pour s'assurer que la conception visuelle transmet efficacement le message et le produit livrable souhaités.

Company Introduction

At MicroHabitat, we implement urban agriculture to improve the urban environment, the lifestyles of city dwellers and encourage a better understanding of environmental issues. We install urban farms on the roofs and outdoor spaces of businesses and schools to reconnect people to nature and their food.
With offices in Montreal, Toronto, Vancouver and New York City, MicroHabitat plans to be in all major North American cities by 2030.
An ambitious, but realistic plan, which is being realized thanks to a dynamic, visionary and close-knit team.
_____________
Chez MicroHabitat, nous implantons l'agriculture urbaine pour améliorer l'environnement urbain, les habitudes de vie des citadins et encourager une meilleure compréhension des enjeux environnementaux. Nous installons des fermes urbaines sur les toits des entreprises et écoles afin de reconnecter les gens à la nature et à leur alimentation.
Avec des bureaux à Montréal, Toronto, Vancouver et New York, MicroHabitat a comme plan d'être dans toutes les grandes métropoles de l'Amérique du Nord d'ici 2030.
Un plan ambitieux, mais réaliste, qui se réalise grâce à une équipe dynamique, visionnaire et soudée.

Nous installons des potagers sur les toits des entreprises, institutions et écoles afin de reconnecter les gens à la nature et à leur alimentation.", '•Expérience en conception et préparation du matériel imprimé', '•Figma, Sketch (utile pour le prototypage rapide/les itérations)', "Nous recherchons une personne à l'esprit créatif, capable de sortir des sentiers battus afin d'élever notre marque et de nous aider à développer une histoire visuelle convaincante qui résonne sur tous les canaux et toutes les plateformes."]

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Company Description

Metroland Media is a dynamic Media Company delivering vital business and community information to millions of readers across Ontario each week. With a healthy product offering in-print, online, trade shows and distribution networks, no target is unreachable. We are Ontario's largest and most successful community news and information source, provides local news and multi-media marketing solutions in Canada's heartland.

Metroland's diverse array of on-line products are visited by over 4 million unique visitors each month and print products are in the hands of more than 4.5 million customers a week. We continuously bringing new and acquired online products to market in order to provide our customers with a one-stop, comprehensive marketing solution. To connect with us, visit www.metroland.com.

Job Description

The creative services department is looking for a talented, energetic, and optimistic professional to fill the role of Graphic Designer.  This is a temporary full time, 18 month role.  The ideal candidate has a good understanding of print production and pre-press and is plugged into social media trends and marketing. Strong interpersonal skills and “can-do” attitude are fundamentals. The ideal designer can think inside and outside the box and express creativity without being tied to software but rather ideas and execution.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:

  • Design newspaper and digital advertisements and promotional material.
  • Work with sales representatives to determine and meet their clients’ creative needs.
  • Proof ads to clients and make necessary corrections in a timely fashion.
  • Monitor ad queue and traffic ads and corrections to our production center.
  • Assist production center by clarifying instructions or concerns as well as communicate priorities to ensure deadlines are met.
  • Paginate newspapers and send press-ready PDFs to the printer.
  • Design magazines.
  • Work with the creative services team to develop web presence and maintain web properties.
  • Assist with administrative and housekeeping tasks.
  • Available to work evenings when required.
  • Perform other duties as assigned including PowerPoint presentations, sales sheets, etc.
Qualifications

WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR:

  • Degree or Diploma in Graphic Design or in a related field and/or equivalent work experience.
  • Strong knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, HTML, CSS, web design, and Microsoft Office in a MAC environment.
  • Powerful people skills and a knack for communicating clearly with a variety of individuals and groups.
  • Highly adaptable, positive, “can-do” attitude, team player and open to criticism.
  • High degree of initiative, organization and time management skills with extreme attention to detail in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to handle multiple assignments.


Additional Information

Diversity & Inclusion
Torstar Group of Companies is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion. Torstar is committed to ensuring employment opportunity to qualified applicants without discrimination on the basis of race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, citizenship, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, family status or disability or any other factor protected by law.

AODA
Torstar Group of Companies is committed to providing an inclusive and barrier-free recruitment process ensuring equal access to employment opportunities for candidates, including persons with disabilities. In compliance with Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act and Ontario Human Rights Code we will endeavour to provide accommodation to persons with disabilities in the recruitment process upon request. If you are selected for an interview and you require accommodation due to a disability during the recruitment process, please notify the hiring manager upon scheduling the interview of your requirements.

COVID-19
Torstar Corporation remains committed to its employees and to providing a safe workplace. As of November 30, 2021, candidates for employment are required to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 and successful candidates must agree to obtain any additional vaccinations or booster dose(s) that may be required. Proof of such vaccination will be required. We will make accommodation for qualifying medical or religious exemptions.

title: Infographes
description:
Le titulaire de ce poste fera partie de l’équipe Prémédia, tant pour la division de l’impression que celle de l’emballage. Notre équipe Prémédia est la plus importante en son genre au Canada avec plus de 500 employés talentueux à travers le Canada. Nous sommes fiers d’offrir des services clés à nos clients nationaux du commerce de détail et aux fabricants de biens de consommation, incluant la création de contenu, la production de photos et vidéos, la rédaction et la traduction de textes, la création d’emballage et des solutions technologiques. Vous ferez partie d’une équipe passionnée et dynamique et vous évoluerez dans un environnement captivant tout à fait unique.

En tant qu'infographiste vous travaillerez de concert avec nos différents départements. Vous serez appelé à travailler à la production de divers projets imprimés et numériques. Que ce soit en déclinant des concepts graphiques, en préparant des documents pour l’impression, ou encore, en produisant des pièces numériques, vous devrez vous démarquer par votre souci du détail, votre rapidité d’exécution et votre capacité à travailler plusieurs projets à la fois. Le mode de travail pour l’instant est le télétravail et sera en mode hybride dans le futur. Nous avons des postes permanents et temporaires disponibles et sur différents quarts de travail.
CE QUE NOUS OFFRONS:
  • Équipement informatique fourni par l’entreprise;
  • Une rémunération compétitive;
  • Un programme d’assurances collectives avantageux, incluant les soins dentaires;
  • Un régime de retraite avec contribution de l’employeur;
  • Une allocation annuelle pour votre bien-être;
  • Un espace de travail moderne, épuré et agréable dans lequel règne une ambiance conviviale;
  • L’accès à une plateforme complète de soins de santé virtuels via Dialogue et un programme d’aide aux employés et aux familles;
  • Un programme de formation varié et adapté en fonction de vos besoins;
  • Mais surtout, faire partie d’une équipe de travail performante, dévouée et inspirante!

VOS RESPONSABILITÉS:
  • Prendre connaissance des spécificités du travail à effectuer à partir des dossiers de production
  • Assembler les textes, photos et les illustrations dans un logiciel de mise en page selon le brief et la maquette client
  • Décliner une conception graphique donnée
  • Identifier les éléments qui peuvent créer des problèmes et proposer des alternatives
  • S’assurer que le produit corresponde aux attentes du client selon les normes de qualité en vigueur
  • Exécuter la sortie d’épreuves pour approbation, faire les correctifs nécessaires s’il y a lieu

QUALIFICATIONS REQUISES:
  • Maîtriser les logiciels InDesign (essentiel), Illustrator, Photoshop ainsi que l’environnement OS X;
  • Détenir un diplôme collégial en Arts Graphiques ou expérience pertinente;
  • Maîtrise de la langue française (parlé et écrit);
  • Posséder le sens de l’organisation et un bon jugement.
  • Détenir un bon sens de la résolution de problèmes.
  • Posséder un bon esprit d’équipe et maintenir de bonnes relations.
  • Être minutieux et orienté vers les résultats.
  • Maîtriser les nouvelles technologies.

title: Call it Spring - Graphic Designer
description:
Job Title: Call it Spring - Graphic Designer

Department: Call It Spring

Are you looking for a new opportunity? Let’s shape our future together!

WE'RE ON A JOURNEY TO CREATE A WORLD OF LOVE, CONFIDENCE AND BELONGING

The ALDO Group has been on this journey for over 40 years. We believe that our passionate associates are at the heart of our success, and that with them we will lead into our future with kindness. 

The ALDO Group is committed to diversity and inclusion, not only now, but for the long term. We strongly encourage people who are Aboriginal, racialized, have disabilities, come from gender and sexually diverse communities and/or have intersectional identities to apply for employment with us. At ALDO Group, we will always strive to take steps to create a diverse and inclusive work environment that promotes equal opportunity and accountability.#WeAreALDO

 

ALDO GROUP ASSOCIATE PERKS

  • Recognition programs to showcase your talent!   
  • To be part of a company that takes a stand on issues affecting people, the environment, and our partners    
  • Summer Fridays (because Summer is for fun) 
  • Purchase discount on merchandise sold in all our divisions. 
  • Family & Friends events with discounts on our products    
  • Subsidized cafeteria & daycare   
  • Subsidized public transportation, carpooling network and free parking   
  • On campus gym with access to a trainer
  • Flex schedules and telecommuting 
  • Sick days 
  • Attractive total compensation! 

YOUR ROLE

A brand owned by the ALDO Group, Call It Spring is your go-to for on-trend, sustainable and vegan footwear as well as accessories that allows you to stay true to yourself for all occasions. We are currently looking for a Graphic Designer to bring their passion and creativity to the Call It Spring team --- to make us that much better!

You will be working collaboratively with the Digital Art Director and the design team to help deliver the creative content needed to feed all channels (In-Store, Online, E-mail design, PR, Social, Paid Media). You will be part of the team conceptualizing and executing the brand’s key activations that covers our local and international market’s needs.

You have a strong design background, enjoy being presented with challenges, you come up with creative solutions on-the-fly. You also have experience working in a fast paced ever changing setting, and above all, have a true strong passion for executing really cool and beautiful designs. You are positive, fun and eager to learn more.

 

If this speaks to you, then Call It Spring is calling for YOU!

 

  • Assist the Design team in delivering marketing projects for print, e-mail, social and web
  • Deliver creative content that follows the brand’s visual direction and guidelines
  • Enrich brainstorm sessions with ideas and research that helps direct and inspire the creative team
  • Support with developing artistic concepts for the season's launches and special activations
  • Produce all content needed in different formats and languages based on a previously approved concept
  • Produce internal materials such as presentations, booklets, lookbooks, and various other elements respecting branded templates and guidelines
  • Proactively support, manage and create seasonal marketing elements for international market
  • Assist the design team in developing creative briefs (research, creating mock-ups, ideation, etc)
  • Prepare print production files
  • Assist in digital production for web, social and paid media
  • Fully responsible for archiving & managing the documents created
  • Ensure that all timelines and production schedules are respected

 

DO YOU HAVE THE PROFILE WE'RE LOOKING FOR?

  • 2-5 years of design experience in a similar role
  • Diploma in design, advertising, visual communications or a strong portfolio and resume
  • Adobe CC proficiency (Photoshop, Indesign, and Illustrator)
  • Understanding of print processes and interactive processes
  • Design experience across print and digital an asset
  • Understanding of researching, storytelling, concept building, and branding
  • Positive, dynamic and energetic
  • Strong communication skills, people skills and teamwork driven
  • Highly organized and able to handle multiple projects and tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment
  • Professional attitude in a high-stress work environment
  • Meticulous and detail-oriented
  • Understanding of web interface and design, an asset
  • A global perspective and understanding of different cultures

 

Don't wait any longer, apply now, we want to meet you!

WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT US? HERE ARE SOME FUN FACTS.

Present in more than 100 countries, the ALDO Group has established itself with strong brands: ALDO/ALDO Accessories, Call it Spring and Globo. Guided every day by its purpose “A journey to create a world of love, trust and belonging”, the organization is simply unique. What makes our culture so one of a kind is our people’s passion for innovation, excellence, craftsmanship, entrepreneurship and diversity, as well as their empathy and friendliness. In addition, our associates all have an insatiable curiosity!

 

A brand owned by the ALDO Group, Call It Spring is your go-to for on-trend, sustainable and vegan footwear as well as accessories that allows you to stay true to yourself for all occasions. We are currently looking for a Graphic Designer to bring their passion and creativity to the Call It Spring team --- to make us that much better!

You will be working collaboratively with the Digital Art Director and the design team to help deliver the creative content needed to feed all channels (In-Store, Online, E-mail design, PR, Social, Paid Media). You will be part of the team conceptualizing and executing the brand’s key activations that covers our local and international market’s needs.

You have a strong design background, enjoy being presented with challenges, you come up with creative solutions on-the-fly. You also have experience working in a fast paced ever changing setting, and above all, have a true strong passion for executing really cool and beautiful designs. You are positive, fun and eager to learn more.

 

If this speaks to you, then Call It Spring is calling for YOU!

 

  • Assist the Design team in delivering marketing projects for print, e-mail, social and web
  • Deliver creative content that follows the brand’s visual direction and guidelines
  • Enrich brainstorm sessions with ideas and research that helps direct and inspire the creative team
  • Support with developing artistic concepts for the season's launches and special activations
  • Produce all content needed in different formats and languages based on a previously approved concept
  • Produce internal materials such as presentations, booklets, lookbooks, and various other elements respecting branded templates and guidelines
  • Proactively support, manage and create seasonal marketing elements for international market
  • Assist the design team in developing creative briefs (research, creating mock-ups, ideation, etc)
  • Prepare print production files
  • Assist in digital production for web, social and paid media
  • Fully responsible for archiving & managing the documents created
  • Ensure that all timelines and production schedules are respected
  • 2-5 years of design experience in a similar role
  • Diploma in design, advertising, visual communications or a strong portfolio and resume
  • Adobe CC proficiency (Photoshop, Indesign, and Illustrator)
  • Understanding of print processes and interactive processes
  • Design experience across print and digital an asset
  • Understanding of researching, storytelling, concept building, and branding
  • Positive, dynamic and energetic
  • Strong communication skills, people skills and teamwork driven
  • Highly organized and able to handle multiple projects and tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment
  • Professional attitude in a high-stress work environment
  • Meticulous and detail-oriented
  • Understanding of web interface and design, an asset
  • A global perspective and understanding of different cultures

title: Senior Brand Designer - Retail
description:
Our diverse and inclusive Marketing Team at Best Buy Canada is home to some of the most creative and strategic thinkers in Canada. From designers to copywriters, video specialists and the managers who bring it all together, Marketing is made up of talented, forward-thinking individuals all committed to one goal: building real and lasting relationships with our customers.

As a Senior Brand Designer - Retail you will be acting as an art director, working with a strong creative team to create national campaigns for the leading consumer electronics retailer in Canada. With a passion for tech and retail, you’ll be responsible for the look and feel of the brand, whilst creating exciting and meaningful creatives. When bringing your work to life, your passion for creativity, conceptual and strategic thinking, and storytelling will help propel our brand story in new and exciting ways.

What you will do...

  • Develop and produce creative for integrated advertising and marketing campaigns, from initial concepts and designs to final execution.
  • Develop marketing style guides and provide guidance on the implementation of marketing materials.
  • Provide feedback and peer review support on creative presentations and production hand-offs.
  • Produce storyboards for video and display advertisements, prepare style guides and proof produced materials to ensure accurate interpretation of art direction.
  • Communicate with various departments and stakeholders to provide creative solutions to challenges that meet business objectives and ensure consistent brand identity.
  • Collaborate closely with copywriters, video production, and other teams to bring your ideas to life
  • Present creative concepts and pitch to internal stakeholders
  • Develop high-visibility campaigns across digital and traditional channels
  • Bring your passion for storytelling, creative ideation, and conceptual thinking to the development of our marketing campaigns.

What we need from you...

  • A strong visual portfolio showcasing multichannel work that clearly represents a brand’s tone or identity
  • Experience as an art director with a track record of strong creative concepting, ideation, and storytelling.
  • Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite – especially InDesign, Illustrator & Photoshop
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office
  • Excellent verbal and written skills
  • Project and time management – able to work on multiple projects, prioritize, and meet deadlines
  • Thorough understanding of social media channels

We believe we have the unique opportunity to help customers enrich their lives and pursue their passions with the help of technology.

Join our amazing team!

We are looking for people just like you.

title: Graphiste Bilingue
description:
Êtes-vous créatif et avez-vous de solides compétences en édition? Vous êtes à la recherche d'un contrat de longue durée avec possibilité de prolongation ? Pouvez-vous commencer immédiatement ?

Nous sommes actuellement à la recherche d'un graphiste bilingue à Montréal.

Avantages
- Travailler pour une organisation de premier plan dans la société mondiale
- Emplacement de Montréal
- 24,38 $/heure
- Lundi à vendredi
- 9h à 17h
- Mission de 12 mois

Les travailleurs placés par l'intermédiaire de Randstad ont droit à des tarifs préférentiels sur l'assurance maladie, dentaire et vie. Ce programme à valeur ajoutée offrira un large éventail d'options pour répondre à vos besoins.

Responsabilités
• Fournir des services de conception de documents graphiques et numériques, du concept à la gestion de l'impression
• Retouche photo avec Photoshop
• Travailler avec d'autres designers dans un environnement d'équipe
• Créativité et conception sur des projets
• Autres tâches selon les besoins

Qualifications
* Bilingue français et anglais
* 2+ années d'expérience en conception graphique
* Diplôme/diplôme en design graphique/beaux-arts
* Une expérience d'Adobe Suite, y compris Acrobat Pro, est indispensable\
* Bonne connaissance pratique de Word, PPT et Excel
* Comprendre l'environnement et les exigences de la couleur numérique,
* Connaissance pratique des logiciels multimédias
* Fort leadership et capacité à travailler avec les autres dans un environnement d'équipe

Sommaire
Si vous avez de l'expérience en conception graphique et que vous êtes disponible pour commencer immédiatement, postulez dès maintenant à www.randstad.ca.

Randstad Canada s'engage à favoriser une main-d'œuvre représentative de toutes les populations du Canada. Nous nous engageons en conséquence à développer et à mettre en œuvre des stratégies pour promouvoir l'équité, la diversité et l'inclusion dans toutes nos sphères d'activité en examinant nos politiques, pratiques et systèmes internes tout au long du cycle de vie de notre main-d'œuvre, y compris au niveau du recrutement, de la rétention et de l'avancement pour tout individu. En plus de notre profond engagement sur le respect des principes des droits de la personne, nous nous engageons à prendre toute mesure positive pour influer sur les changements à mettre en place en vue de garantir la participation de tout individu dans le monde du travail et ce, sans obstacle, systémique ou autre, en particulier pour les groupes en quête d'équité généralement sous-représentés dans la main-d'œuvre au Canada, y compris les personnes qui s'identifient comme femmes ou personnes non-binaires/non conformes au genre, les Peuples et communautés autochtones, les personnes en situation de handicap (visible ou invisible), les personnes faisant partie des minorités visibles, les personnes racisées et des communautés LGBTQ2+.

Randstad Canada s'engage à créer et à maintenir un milieu de travail inclusif et accessible pour toutes les personnes candidates et employés en soutenant leurs besoins d'accessibilité et d'accommodation tout au long du cycle de vie de l'emploi. Nous demandons à toutes les personnes demandeuses d'emploi de bien vouloir identifier leurs besoins en matière d'accommodation en envoyant un courriel à

accessibilite@randstad.ca

pour s'assurer de leur capacité à participer pleinement au processus d'entrevue.

title: Experienced Digital Designer (Brand, UI & UX) - Montréal
description:
Are youa digital design superhero, ready for your next adventure andinspired by innovation and creative thinking?

Signifly has been one of the fastest growing agencies in Denmark and our young and energetic team has won several awards for our innovative approach to digital projects and user experiences. Now, one decade after developing our first digital project, we have started our global journey. This journey has taken us across the Atlantic Ocean to Montreal where we have opened our Canadian office. With an increasing number of ambitious Canadian and American clients, we are now looking for a creative digital designer to play a core role in our new growing team in Montreal – to conceptualize, design and push the limits for excellent customer experiences.

As an experiencedDigital Designer, you will join our small but ambitious team in Montreal.Together we will push the boundaries of digital design, innovation, and creativity. You will be working on digital projects for customers ranging from start-ups to large enterprises with one overall objective –– to help them unleash their digital potential through strong branding & Visual Identity work,excellent user experiences in everything from apps, websites, e-commerce, and digital campaigns.Hence, it is important for you to develop a deep business understanding and a comprehensive understanding of project needs through design-thinking workshops, user research& test, and prototyping. At Signifly,we are a team so you will be working with developers and consultants to understand technical requirements and business objectives as they relate to the design of the products.

Apart from designing brilliant digital products, websites, and e-commerce, you will, together with the team of designers, strategists, and project leads, discover, learn and use the newest and best technologies toexceedour customers'expectations.

About Signifly

At Signifly, we work in close corporation with a range of clients from all industries, to create new and innovative digital products and business models. We are a team of developers, designers, film-makers and digital strategists, and we believe that creativity, entrepreneurship and a diverse mix of top-notch skills can drive the innovation and change that will help shape a better and more sustainable tomorrow.

Honesty, Energy, and Funare the core values in everything we do!

Check out our work and approach atSignifly.com.

What's in it for you?

The best part is of course to be a part of an ambitious and new thinking team and agency. You will be able to work closely with our team of specialists both in Montreal and Copenhagen. And we give you the opportunity to join our exchange program in Copenhagen. We have beautiful office spaces in a fast-paced start-up environment, centrally located in Montreal.

But of course we can also tempt you with:

  • Yearly one-week team trip with both social and professional focus (paid)
  • Coffee, tea, soft drinks, snacks, etc. day and night
  • Beautiful office space with 24/7 access, centrally located in Montreal
  • Competitive salary based on qualifications and performance
  • Culture of Learning & Development
  • Onboarding and development programs in Copenhagen, Denmark (paid).
  • Monthly Social & team events
  • Career progress based on merits rather than seniority
  • Flexible Vacation Policy

And if you think something is missing, just let us know. We can probably work together to add it. After all, we are trying to create the best possible place to work!



We expect of you

You are a super-user of Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD or Photoshop and you know every little corner of the Adobe Suite. You are familiar with creating early concepts and prototypes with tools such as Marvel, InVision, or Principle.

Specific requirements:

  • You have a kick-ass portfolio of digital projects + Visual Identity/Brandingwork
  • You excel in creating digital experiences and interfaces using the latest design software
  • You have experience with the design process and have a passion for bringing concepts to life through design
  • You have a deep understanding of responsive web design and are able to communicate well with our developers
  • You are good at understanding real-world user- and client problems and are able to propose smart design solutions to address them
  • You are able to present your ideas and design to clients and participate in client meetings
  • You have a strong interest in and knowledge of UI, UX, technology and digital
  • Having additional creative skills within Animation, UX-design, Photography, E-commerce, Prototyping, Drawing, Concept development, CSS, Javascript, Copywriting or Visual identity is a plus but is not required

Got what it takes? - Join our digital journey!

title: Lead Graphic Designer - North America
description:
<section class="cached-bot-fjv-skeletonstyle__CachedSkeletonDescription-sc-gqtazs-0 gbrdjA">Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

We are looking for a Lead Graphic Designer to help develop and define the Binance identity. You will be part of a highly talented team, working to elevate the brand through creative excellence.


Working at Binance
• Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry
• Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
• International work environment and flat organisation
• Great career development opportunities in a growing company
• Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Company Description

Creative thinking. Collective value.

A leader in architecture, design and development, Lemay has seen spectacular growth and exciting transformation in recent years. Driven by design excellence and deeply committed to its net-positive approach, the firm delivers outstanding projects that have won over 400 awards and distinctions.

Job Description

Are you passionate about all aspects of design? Do you want your sense of aesthetics and your talent for streamlining content to benefit Lemay's various disciplines? Are you described as a results-focussed team player, skilled in several creative media? Then you are probably the graphic designer Lemay's Branding and Visual Communication team is looking for!

What you will accomplish with us

  • Production of electronic and printed documents and presentations;
  • Management of corporate documents and updating of corporate brochures;
  • Design of summary visuals for project communication purposes;
  • Layout and graphic adaptation of various studies (maps, graphics);
  • Adaptation of the Lemay brand to client needs while ensuring compliance with graphic standards;
  • Maintenance of corporate image bank;
  • Creation of video and motion design content for promotional purposes.

What you need

  • College diploma or bachelor's degree in graphic design;
  • Between 3 and 5 years of relevant experience;
  • Proficiency in Adobe InDesign, Photoshop and Illlustrator software;
  • Knowledge of After Effects;
  • Proficiency with the Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook);
  • Ability to multitask;
  • Excellent knowledge of French and English (spoken and written);
  • Knowledge of web design (UX/UI) an asset.

What we offer

Lemay makes its employee development and well-being a priority. Part of that is offering the following advantages:

  • Competitive salary and bonus program;
  • Flexible group insurance plan (health and dental insurance, health and well-being management accounts, RRSP/DPSP);
  • Payment of professional association membership fees;
  • 3 weeks of vacation;
  • Possibility of flexible schedule throughout the year;
  • Social activities throughout the year;
  • Creative work environment.

Please note that only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.

We are committed to providing an equitable, diverse, and inclusive working environment for all members of our team so that each person feels respected and valued.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Department: Marketing, Communications and Recruitment
Campus: Barrie
Classification: Support Staff
Posting Date: March 17, 2022
Salary Range: $ 21.77 - $ 28.59
Hours per week: Up to 24 hours per week - Current hours anticipated to be 24 hours per week
Status: Part-time (Regular)

Reporting to the Associate Director, Marketing, Communications and Recruitment, the incumbent provides concept development, design and production of print and digital marketing and communications materials for the college. Specific duties include, but are not limited to:

  • Providing concept development, design and production of print and digital marketing and communications materials including program guides, digital advertising, brochures, flyers, signage, promotional products, apparel, web, video and social media graphics, presentations etc.
  • Providing concept development, layouts and user interface design for website and landing pages, ensuring AODA compliance and responsiveness
  • Designing and building email templates within marketing automation platform / email marketing tool
  • Meeting with clients or team members to discuss projects, design expectations, target audience, deadlines and budget requirements, etc.
  • Preparing and presenting recommendations and concepts to clients, including design direction
  • Working within a set budget for design jobs which includes purchasing materials and tracking expenses where necessary.
  • Working collaboratively with the Marketing team, college stakeholders and vendors to maintain college brand standards and brand consistency throughout all marketing materials
  • Preparing files for print production and digital use, assuring quality products
  • Reviewing proofs and attending press approvals, as needed
  • Photo retouching and image editing
  • Investigating and understanding the markets / audiences to be targeted in the design
  • Researching and analyzing the design work of competitors and making recommendations for improvements or changes to ensure Georgian remains competitive in the market
  • Investigating and recommending new technologies to enhance product development
  • Art directing photo shoots, working with models and photographer. Coordinates details including wardrobe, props, set design and shot list

QUALIFICATIONS:
  • Successfully completed a three-year postsecondary diploma in a relevant field of study
  • 5 years of experience in a similar role
  • Experience supporting the development and implementation of brand standards and visual identity guidelines
  • Demonstrated experience in Adobe Creative Suite, preferably in a PC environment
  • Experience leading / planning various size projects demonstrating project management skills
  • Certified Graphic Designer (CGD) designation is an asset
  • Animated graphics production / video skills is an asset

Georgian College supports diversity, equity and a workplace free from harassment and discrimination and is committed to an inclusive, barrier-free environment. We invite applications from all qualified candidates and actively encourage applications from members of groups with historical and/or current barriers to equity, including, but not limited to persons of Aboriginal ancestry, members of visible minorities, persons with disabilities, women and members of the 2SLGBTQ community. If you are contacted to participate in the interview, please advise the coordinator of any accommodations needed with respect to any materials or processes used to ensure you have access to a fair and equitable process.

Alternate formats will be provided upon request throughout the recruitment and selection process.

Georgian College has a COVID-19 vaccination procedure in place. As a condition of employment, employees are required to be vaccinated for COVID-19 to work on any campus, or a facility owned, operated or controlled by Georgian College unless they have a valid medical or religious belief/creed reason for not getting vaccinated, which reason will be considered on a case by case basis and which will be subject to the College's accommodation processes.

Applications for this position must be received by 11:59 p.m. March 23, 2022. While we thank all applicants, only those contacted for an interview will be acknowledged.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
A leading AI-enabled marketplace e is seeking a Graphic Designer to design, develop, and execute highly engaging design projects for a diverse array of digital media. 

The ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of current design software and be skilled with every step of the design process from concept to the final deliverable.

This is a remote position for a 6-month contract.

Responsibilities:

  • Study design briefs and conceptualize visuals based on identified requirements.
  • Create illustrations, logos, and other designs using software or by hand.
  • Ensure that all designs align with the brand image, while also meeting usability and website standards
  • Maintain graphic design guidelines and brand identity.

Requirements :

  • Proven digital design experience in a studio, agency, or freelance setting.
  • Previous experience designing banners, posters, infographics, packaging, simple video edits, and GIFs.
  • Strong portfolio demonstrating professionally trained digital design skills.
  • Expertise in design software and technologies such as Sketch, Figma, InVision, and Adobe Creative Suite.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Organizational and time-management skills for meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

About Hire Digital

Hire Digital is a network of top-performing marketing, technology, and creative talent with clients such as Unilever, Stripe, Shopify, Philips, and Marriott. Through our technology platform, we assemble dedicated talent teams for brands and enable fast-growing startups and enterprises to grow and scale their digital programs with improved ROI and decreased costs.

Powered by JazzHR

title: Designer Graphique Médias Sociaux - eSport
description:
Description de l'entreprise

Les équipes d’Ubisoft comptent 20 000 personnes réparties sur plus de 30 pays à travers le monde et sont liées par une mission commune : enrichir la vie des joueurs et des joueuses par des expériences de jeu originales et mémorables. Leur énergie et leur talent ont permis de donner vie à de nombreuses franchises acclamées telles que Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Watch Dogs, Just Dance, Rainbow Six, et bien d'autres à venir. Ubisoft est un employeur soucieux de l'égalité des chances et estime que la diversité des origines et des perspectives est essentielle pour créer des mondes qui permettent l’épanouissement et l’expression de tous et toutes. Si vous êtes enthousiaste à l'idée de relever des défis passionnants, exploiter des technologies de pointe, et prendre part au futur du divertissement, rejoignez-nous et créez l’inconnu.

Description du poste

La personne embauchée pour ce poste sera l'employé d'un fournisseur de paie tiers et ne sera pas un.e employé.e direct d'Ubisoft. Il est également important de noter que ce poste est axé sur le marketing et non sur la production de jeux. Il s'agit d'un contrat à durée déterminée de 8 mois.

Notre équipe de marketing eSport - Rainbow Six est à la recherche d’un.e Designer graphique médias sociaux pour couvrir les événements eSport en direct de la ligue Nord-Américaine.

Ce que vous ferez :

· Présenter des concepts novateurs et qui crée de l’engagement pour les publications sur les médias sociaux en suivant les lignes directrices de l’équipe de marque et créer du contenue en lien avec Rainbow Six Siege.

· Créer du contenu en direct afin de mobiliser la communauté eSport de Rainbow Six.

· Mettre à jour en temps réel le contenu de la couverture en direct en fonction de l’évolution des matchs et publier sur les réseaux sociaux appropriés.

· Se tenir au courant des nouvelles tendances en matière de médias numériques, comme les memes, les références à la culture populaire, etc.

· Collaborer avec l’équipe marketing de marque sur le suivi du rendement du contenu afin d’identifier quelle publication a du succès.

· Rédiger des textes originaux et créatifs qui respectent les directives de la marque et restent en phase avec l'univers de Rainbow Six Esports.

Qualifications

Ce que vous apportez :

· Fortes compétences en lien avec les outils de conception graphique (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.) ainsi qu’avec les logiciels de montage vidéo (Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere, After Effects, etc.) et finalement avec les outils de gestion de contenu.

· Connaissance approfondie de Rainbow Six Siege ou du eSport en général.

· Capacité à réaliser plusieurs tâches et projets simultanément.

· Possibilité de travailler selon des horaires flexibles, parfois de nuit et certaines fins de semaine.



Informations supplémentaires

Pour postuler, veuillez envoyer votre CV et des articles récents ou un portfolio présentant votre meilleur travail créatif (liens vers des publications sociales, des vidéos, des GIF, etc.)

Si vous avez besoin d'un permis de travail, votre admissibilité peut dépendre de votre éducation et de vos années d'expérience de travail pertinentes, comme l'exige le gouvernement.

Les habiletés et les connaissances se présentent sous différentes formes et peuvent être basées sur des expériences pertinentes, c'est pourquoi nous vous encourageons vivement à poser votre candidature, même si vous ne remplissez pas toutes les exigences énumérées ci-dessus.

 

Chez Ubisoft, vous êtes les bienvenu·es tel·les que vous êtes. Nous accueillons la diversité sous toutes ses formes. Nous nous engageons à favoriser un environnement de travail inclusif et respectueux de toutes les différences.

Code de conduite Ubisoft : Code de Conduite Ubisoft

title: Graphic Designer 2
description:
About Behavox

Behavox is shaping the future for how businesses harness their most important raw material - data. Our mission is bold: Organize enterprise data into actionable information that protects and promotes the business growth of multinational companies around the world.

From managing enterprise risk and compliance to maximizing revenue and value, our data operating platform presents a widespread opportunity to build multilingual, AI / ML - based solutions that activate data for every function within a global enterprise.

Our approach is unique, and it's validated by our customers who tell us to keep forging ahead because no one else is aggregating, analyzing, and acting on data to uncover opportunities or solve problems quite the way we are.

We are looking for fearless innovators who have an insatiable appetite for building what no one has built before.

About the Role

As a Graphic Designer, you will be involved in driving brand awareness through content creation. This is a unique and exciting opportunity to help expand existing accounts and acquire new logos.

This role will provide a great opportunity for the right talent to be a leader for activities that include:

1. Establishing a visual identity for a young company
2. Developing the company's standards for design
3. Ideating on new, innovative ways to showcase content

What You'll Bring

  • Knowledge of enterprise, SaaS-related technology and terminology
  • Skilled in professional, high-level content standards with experience using tools Adobe InDesign and Photoshop
  • Solid experience designing content on tight deadline, with accuracy and polish 
  • Creativity in representing complex ideas in a visually appealing manner
  • Skilled in creating, updating, managing all content in a standard marketing collateral suite (Case Studies, Infographics, 1-Pagers, Reports)

What You'll Do

  • Successfully work on large-scale content projects across teams and geographies submitting work on deadline, with accuracy and polish
  • Contribute to multiple, competing priorities and project support requests simultaneously
  • Maintain brand tone across different content types
  • Assist content projects working independently and collaborating on revision cycles
  • Understands complex product concepts and translate complex product concepts into content and messaging understandable by lay people

What We Offer

  • A truly global mission with a passionate community in locations all over the world
  • Huge impact and learning potential as our aspirations require bold innovation
  • Highly competitive compensation with 100% bonus pay already integrated
  • Benefits include fully covered health coverage for employee and family
  • Generous time-off policy and flexible work schedule

About Our Process

We take Talent very seriously and we are building a community of extraordinary individuals working together in very high performing teams. We also know that the best Talent always has options so we believe that the process has to be a two way assessment - the company AND the candidate assessing the business needs alignment, the career next step alignment, and the cultural alignment. 

During the process we will begin by exploring the core factors regarding salary and location along with core experience and skills and values alignment. We will then deep dive explore the critical technical competencies we have identified for the role, and then we will deep dive in behavioural competencies.

The most aligned candidate will then be asked to do a practical work task simulation activity so we can make sure that you will enjoy the kind of work the role requires, and this task will typically be presented and discussed with a group of colleagues and managers. Finally we will ask you to meet with a number of our senior leaders to make sure that you are making the most informed call possible.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Eventscape has an exciting opportunity for an Graphic Designer to take on the graphics production needs of our marketing department. The successful candidate will join our passionate and creative internal team, taking responsibility for the alignment of brand assets and helping to promote a strong brand story. The ideal candidate will be a creatively driven, strategic designer, looking to go beyond the ordinary and delivery exceptional results.

  

WHO ARE WE?

At Eventscape, customization is our focus, architecture is our playground, and fabrication is our expertise. As global leaders in the custom architectural fabrication space, we thrive on challenging design and strive for innovation towards one shared goal--to build the extraordinary!

How do we do it? By refining design concepts; by providing expertise on materiality, finishes, details, and fabrication methods; and by embracing R+D as a critical part of each project. Eventscape houses dedicated project managers, design detailers, engineers, fabricators, and installers. All this, combined with state-of-the-art machinery, means we truly are an architectural toy factory. We build things others can’t.

 

 

ABOUT THE ROLE

The graphic designer position will:

  • conceptualize and execute marketing and business development initiatives across print and digital platforms
  • oversee digital branding and ensure brand consistency across all media and platforms
  • design and maintain assets including web-ready content, promotional materials, and templates
  • manage workflow and balance the marketing team’s priorities and deliverables
  • update and manage website content
  • support and facilitate the sales process by designing graphic materials required
  • collaborate with Project Managers and Designers on client projects
  • participate in social media analysis, marketing brainstorms, and sales initiatives
  • generate graphic content for social media
  • promote the Eventscape brand image through internal and external marketing
  • utilize in-house videography, photography, and graphics to showcase our projects

 

 

ABOUT YOU

To succeed in this role, you will have:

  • the ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team
  • a strong background designing for both print and digital outlets
  • Extensive skills in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects etc.)
  • familiarity with website design and maintenance (HTML + CSS familiarity)
  • a keen understanding of graphic design principles including typography, colour theory, proportion, scale and printing process
  • up-to-date familiarity with social media platforms and design trends
  • a working knowledge of Keynote and the ability to design presentations
  • experience with MailChimp and newsletter marketing
  • experience in the architecture and design, or related industry considered an asset
  • the ability to manage multiple, competing and sometimes changing deadlines

 

WHY JOIN EVENTSCAPE?

  • claim your place in our collaborative and supportive network of multi-disciplinary architectural fabrication experts
  • join in on frequent contests, celebrations, and unique social activities
  • be inspired and challenged by our team of the most creative, talented, and passionate individuals
  • a regular Monday to Friday work schedule
  • a fast-growing company with opportunities for advancement
  • enjoy being at the forefront of technological innovation with our state-of-the-art machinery
  • the opportunity to work on unique and challenging projects and…
  • the reward of seeing those projects come to life through fabrication and installation
  • extended health and dental benefits
  • be part of a socially conscious and family-owned company

 

 

APPLY NOW

Apply now with your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter telling us why you're the right person for this role. 

All candidates must submit samples, a portfolio, or link to a personal website to be considered.


For more information or if you need disability accommodation, contact human resources at (416) 231-8855. We wish to thank all applicants for their interest in Eventscape, but only those selected for an interview will be contacted. Eventscape is committed to fostering a workplace in which individual differences are recognized, appreciated, and respected. Eventscape will consider all qualified candidates and welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available for all stages of the selection process.
