title: Graphic Designer
description:
GRAPHIC DESIGNER ROLE

Become one of the most impactful Graphic Designer on the planet!

WHY YOU WILL LOVE FINGERPRINT FOR SUCCESS (F4S) 

We are a groundbreaking technology platform that is expanding and growing rapidly around the world.We are looking to onboard and hire the next generation of graphic designers to help our customers set and achieve their crazy big goals.

Fingerprint for Success (F4S) is the future of human development. We are on a mission to empower individuals and teams to solve the worldâ€™s biggest problems. Featuring a vast range of tools for collaboration, performance, wellbeing, diversity, and inclusion, plus a huge library of AI and human coaching programs, with F4S anyone can develop and achieve amazing things at work and in life.

Until now professional coaching has been reserved only for the elite, financially inaccessible to most of the worldâ€™s population. Driven by a scientific evidence-based methodology, F4S democratizes coaching, creating for the first time a scalable human development solution for everyone. Through predictive data, conversational A.I., and also some of the world's very best professional coaches, F4S is loved by consumers, teams, enterprises, universities, and professional coaches alike.

We are a digital-first, small but fast-growing values-led team, genuinely on a mission to change the world. We are swift, passionate, hard-working, scaling ourselves at the same pace we grow our product and customers. We invest deeply in our company culture and our teamâ€™s wellbeing, knowing this is the well from where the worldâ€™s greatest products and companies flourish. 

Who you are:

  • An open-minded person who is willing to learn and become one of the most impactful graphic designers in the world 
  • A person with an insatiable curiosity and unrelenting drive to learn, succeed and lead by example
  • A person who is a force for good and celebrate individual uniqueness
  • Be driven by helping their team meet and exceed aggressive conversion targets and individual career goals. 
  • Be passionate about creating purposeful and valuable content that helps business professionals grow better.
  • Be highly organized and have a high level of accountability for the quality and outcomes of your work and your teamâ€™s work.
  • Lead with empathy, serve as an ally for underrepresented communities, and create psychological safety to ensure the team can do their best work. 
  • Able to identify design needs to continuously elevate the quality of digital marketing and brand management
  • A keen eye for aesthetics and details
  • Effective communication skills and comfortable with candor.
  • Strong prioritization skills and ability to consistently meet deadlines.
  • Ability to work independently (while also functioning and contributing as part of a team) and efficiently manage your own time.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills

The Graphic Designer will assist the Marketing Team with the production and implementation of the companyâ€™s portfolio of creative requirements.

What youâ€™ll do:

  • Responsible for creative design solutions that have a high visual impact
  • Creates branding proposals, advertising materials, e-books, magazines, brochures, folders, packaging, exhibitions and display materials, flyers, and online materials such as Facebook and Instagram posts, online ads and banners, as well as company AVPs and other video material.
  • Responsible for creating branding standard guidelines for the company and ensuring all design outputs are aligned with the company's and brandsâ€™ standards
  • Prepares rough drafts of material based on an agreed brief
  • Reviews final layouts and suggests improvements if required

Qualifications (any or all):

  • Entry-level 
  • Intermediate to proficient in layout design, with at least 1 - 2 years experience in doing layouts whether in a professional or freelance capacity.
  • Candidates with more experience are welcome to apply.
  • At least basic in illustrations, 2D animation, and storyboards.
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree.
  • Required skill(s): Canva or Adobe Photoshop (proficient), Adobe Illustrator (proficient), Adobe After Effects (basic - intermediate)
  • Has a creative flair in design and a good sense of art.
  • Has a strong design sense of color, layout, and typography.
  • Has strong creative skills and the ability to design ideas for a wide range of industries.
  • Has creative conceptualization ability as well as technical execution capability.
  • Can translate complex data or information into easy-to-digest designs, layouts, and infographics.
  • Has the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
  • Strong communication and organization skills.
  • Able to multi-task and can gracefully handle pressure.
  • Willing to learn other multimedia software apart from Adobe creative tools to deliver other multimedia-related work.

Software Expertise:

  • Applicants should have extensive knowledge of the use of Canva or Adobe Creative Suite, particularly:
    • Canva presentations & videos
    • Adobe Illustrator
    • Adobe InDesign
    • Adobe Premiere / After Effects
  • A plus if you have knowledge of and experience using the following programs:
    • Microsoft Office
    • Youtube and similar platforms
    • Google Suite
    • Activecampaign
    • WordPress and other CMS programs

Where?
This role is initially fully digital/remote, eventually establishing our US Hubs for regular teaming and events. Given our HQ in Sydney Australia, the ideal candidate will be based on the west coast or in Austin, Texas to benefit from the overlapping timezone windows. 

Why Join Us?

  • Empower our users with helpful content
  • Learn digital marketing and content marketing real-life skills
  • Bring direct impact to the business and see blog traffic grow with your efforts
  • Be among team members who believe in working and playing hard 
  • Flourish in a flat organizational structure with no office politics

Benefits

At F4S, we are committed to living out our mission every day and that starts with providing benefits that allow our employees to care for themselves, support their families, and give back to their community. 

  • Access to F4S coaching
  • A competitive compensation plan with opportunity for advancement
  • Flexible paid time off
  • Per year: paid holidays and leave 
  • Learning and Development stipend
  • Amazing high performing remote global team 
  • Incredible culture and community

We are hiring for many role types including Full-time, part-time, contract, internships.

We look forward to you joining us in our very real mission to make human development accessible to everyone!

hello@f4s.com

How to get started?

Go to F4S.com to complete the F4S Questionnaire (15-30 mins) to help us better understand your work-style motivations and how we can best support your onboarding. We look forward to making a positive impact with you!

title: Creative Strategist & Designer
description:
We are looking for a digital graphic designer and strategist to join our Creative Studio team and help our clients deliver world-class advertising executions. 

As part of the dynamic revenue team, you will work to help close new and grow existing business by creating compelling ads and strategies that perform. You will also manage creative requests from intake to delivery by collaborating with our account and production teams.

StackAdapt is a Remote First company, we are open to candidates located anywhere in Canada for this position.

title: Painters Needed for the Summer!
description:
We’re hiring full time painters for the summer!

We are looking for individuals who want to be a part of a fun, high energy team and who love being outdoors!

Why is this the perfect summer position?

  • Work with your friends and roommates.
  • 40 PLUS hours available per week, earn $11,000- $14,000 this summer!
  • Work outside and get into shape.
  • Room to advance throughout the season to crew foreman or production manager.

Duties include:

  • Preparing, cleaning and repairing interior and exterior surfaces.
  • Applying paint, stains and other finishes using brushes, rollers and spray equipment.
  • Use of ladders, must not be afraid of heights!

Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required! If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.

 Apply now!

If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.']

title: Crowd Artist
description:
Company Description

As a company founded and run by an artist, it's our mission to provide talented artists with the freedom and resources they need to deliver quality work and to thrive in a fun and creative environment.

Job Description

The Crowd Artist creates simulation setups to compose crowds, ensuring to meet the high quality standards of Rodeo FX.

Main responsibilities:

  • Create simulation setups to compose realistic crowds;
  • Run simulations in shots and address any notes;
  • Work closely with the CG and the Head of Crowd to find creative and technical solutions and approaches that meet project requirements and deadlines;
  • May participate in the development of tools and techniques for the department;
  • Perform quality control on shots before they are submitted for review/approval, ensuring all technical and creative standards are met, and promptly apply notes received;
  • Keep Production and the project team informed of the status of work, issues to be resolved, ramifications of problems encountered and recommend potential solutions;
  • Ensure deadlines are met, advising the project team promptly if delays could be expected.
Qualifications

  • Experience in a similar position, within the VFX industry;
  • Excellent knowledge of Maya;
  • Excellent knowledge of Crowd software (Houdini crowd, Golaem);
  • Excellent sense of prioritization and respect of deadlines.


Additional Information

  • Full-time, Permanent Contract;
  • 5 paid sick days;
  • 2 additional statutory holidays in the winter holidays;
  • Group Insurance, access to Dialogue online support and to an Employee Assistance Program (EAP);
  • RRSP with employer contribution;
  • Discounts with Bixi, Bota Bota Spa, Nautilus Plus and many more local businesses.

Diversity is a core value at Rodeo FX. We are passionate about building and sustaining an inclusive and equitable work environment where diversity is celebrated and valued. We believe every member on our team enriches our work by exposing us to a broad range of ways to perceive and interact with the world, identify challenges, and to design and deliver projects.

title: Senior Concept Artist
description:
Company Description

People Can Fly is one of the leading Polish gaming studios and a globally operating AAA game developer that made its mark on the action shooter genre with titles such as Painkiller, Bulletstorm, Gears of War: Judgement and Outriders. We are also one of the most experienced Unreal Engine studios in the world. We have gained a vast know-how as a part of Epic Games family and we have developed our unique, trademark approach to the engine as an independent studio. We are rapidly growing, ambitious company looking for the most promising talents working in the game industry.

In December 2020 studios’ holding company PCF Group S.A. debuted as a public company on the Warsaw Stock Exchange. Over the last 5 years, our studios have grown from 40 to over 350 people, whom we affectionately call ‘Aviators’. In addition to our headquarters in Warsaw, we have studios located in Poland (Lodz and Rzeszow), the UK (Newcastle), the US (New York and Chicago), and Canada (Montreal) – with plans to expand even further in near future! Recently, our family was extended with a newly formed partnership with Game On, a creative motion capture, animation, and audio studio with a portfolio of AAA collaborations.

To foster the creative process, we make sure that our culture stays informal, whilst direct
communication and a quick decision-making process really matter. As a PCF aviator, you will have a real impact on the games we’re working on. We also offer access to solid know-how, creative resources, and constructive feedback at every stage of development. Our modus operandi is based on staying dynamic, evolving in sync with gaming industry trends and focusing on delivering creative solutions in any circumstances.

During the pandemic, we have successfully transitioned to a remote work model, and we aim to develop it further and keep this option available to most of our employees. And with millions of players embracing our recent hit, Outriders, we can guarantee that you will work on the projects with true impact on the whole gaming community.

Project Dagger is a new IP developed with Take-Two Interactive. It’s a yet unannounced AAA action-adventure game developed by our North American team supported by PCF’s European studios.

Take flight on this amazing journey with us and spread your wings in the game industry! 

Job Description

Would you like to work with a team that consistently ships innovative and over-the-top action games?  Would you like to be the person engaged in development of our AAA products in New York? If you answered yes to any of those questions we would like to talk to you about joining our team here at People Can Fly.

People Can Fly is looking for a passionate Senior Concept Artist. You will be responsible for creating cool environments, characters, weapons and vehicles for our games and ensuring a consistent art style is maintained across the game. You need to have a creative mind, the ability to create scenes with a memorable “wow” factor, but with grounding details to make it believable and personal.

All applicants are required to relocate for full-time positions in New York. 

Qualifications

  • Strong understanding of color theory and how color affects mood & focal points
  • Strong portfolio showcasing your concept art skills
  • Solid traditional drawing skills and visual knowledge of human anatomy
  • Good mechanical design skills
  • Ability to show visual storytelling within an environment design
  • Traditional art skills along with core graphic design competencies (composition and layout, typography, color and light)
  • Strong Photoshop skills
  • Ability to work with several development teams, while maintaining consistency of design
  • Vector art creation (Flash, Illustrator) is a plus
  • 3D software knowledge (Maya/Max/SketchUp) is a plus


Additional Information

What we offer

  • 100% company paid Medical, Dental, and Vision plans 
  • Company-paid holidays and an attractive paid time off policy which includes 4 weeks of vacation
  • Relocation Assistance
  • Short and Long Term Disability, Life Insurance, Pet Insurance
  • Flexible Savings Account Programs
  • Commuter Tax benefits 
  • Discounted gym memberships to keep our staff healthy and happy
  • An informal atmosphere, no dress code, no unwanted formalities

title: Content Designer
description:
Job Title: Content Designer
Location: Toronto, ON
Duration: 12+ Months
 
Required Skills:
  • A post-secondary education, ideally with a university degree or college diploma
  • At least 4 years of writing experience at a creative agency or in-house creative team
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically about the challenge at hand
  • Proficiency in English
  • A portfolio of work samples showcasing your copywriting work
 
Nice to have Skills:
  • Facility in French
  • A working knowledge of accessibility standards and methods to address them
  • A knowledge of design and technology trends

title: Graphic Designer
description:
GRAPHIC DESIGNER ROLE

Become one of the most impactful Graphic Designer on the planet!

WHY YOU WILL LOVE FINGERPRINT FOR SUCCESS (F4S) 

We are a groundbreaking technology platform that is expanding and growing rapidly around the world.We are looking to onboard and hire the next generation of graphic designers to help our customers set and achieve their crazy big goals.

Fingerprint for Success (F4S) is the future of human development. We are on a mission to empower individuals and teams to solve the worldâ€™s biggest problems. Featuring a vast range of tools for collaboration, performance, wellbeing, diversity, and inclusion, plus a huge library of AI and human coaching programs, with F4S anyone can develop and achieve amazing things at work and in life.

Until now professional coaching has been reserved only for the elite, financially inaccessible to most of the worldâ€™s population. Driven by a scientific evidence-based methodology, F4S democratizes coaching, creating for the first time a scalable human development solution for everyone. Through predictive data, conversational A.I., and also some of the world's very best professional coaches, F4S is loved by consumers, teams, enterprises, universities, and professional coaches alike.

We are a digital-first, small but fast-growing values-led team, genuinely on a mission to change the world. We are swift, passionate, hard-working, scaling ourselves at the same pace we grow our product and customers. We invest deeply in our company culture and our teamâ€™s wellbeing, knowing this is the well from where the worldâ€™s greatest products and companies flourish. 

Who you are:

  • An open-minded person who is willing to learn and become one of the most impactful graphic designers in the world 
  • A person with an insatiable curiosity and unrelenting drive to learn, succeed and lead by example
  • A person who is a force for good and celebrate individual uniqueness
  • Be driven by helping their team meet and exceed aggressive conversion targets and individual career goals. 
  • Be passionate about creating purposeful and valuable content that helps business professionals grow better.
  • Be highly organized and have a high level of accountability for the quality and outcomes of your work and your teamâ€™s work.
  • Lead with empathy, serve as an ally for underrepresented communities, and create psychological safety to ensure the team can do their best work. 
  • Able to identify design needs to continuously elevate the quality of digital marketing and brand management
  • A keen eye for aesthetics and details
  • Effective communication skills and comfortable with candor.
  • Strong prioritization skills and ability to consistently meet deadlines.
  • Ability to work independently (while also functioning and contributing as part of a team) and efficiently manage your own time.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills

The Graphic Designer will assist the Marketing Team with the production and implementation of the companyâ€™s portfolio of creative requirements.

What youâ€™ll do:

  • Responsible for creative design solutions that have a high visual impact
  • Creates branding proposals, advertising materials, e-books, magazines, brochures, folders, packaging, exhibitions and display materials, flyers, and online materials such as Facebook and Instagram posts, online ads and banners, as well as company AVPs and other video material.
  • Responsible for creating branding standard guidelines for the company and ensuring all design outputs are aligned with the company's and brandsâ€™ standards
  • Prepares rough drafts of material based on an agreed brief
  • Reviews final layouts and suggests improvements if required

Qualifications (any or all):

  • Entry-level 
  • Intermediate to proficient in layout design, with at least 1 - 2 years experience in doing layouts whether in a professional or freelance capacity.
  • Candidates with more experience are welcome to apply.
  • At least basic in illustrations, 2D animation, and storyboards.
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree.
  • Required skill(s): Canva or Adobe Photoshop (proficient), Adobe Illustrator (proficient), Adobe After Effects (basic - intermediate)
  • Has a creative flair in design and a good sense of art.
  • Has a strong design sense of color, layout, and typography.
  • Has strong creative skills and the ability to design ideas for a wide range of industries.
  • Has creative conceptualization ability as well as technical execution capability.
  • Can translate complex data or information into easy-to-digest designs, layouts, and infographics.
  • Has the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
  • Strong communication and organization skills.
  • Able to multi-task and can gracefully handle pressure.
  • Willing to learn other multimedia software apart from Adobe creative tools to deliver other multimedia-related work.

Software Expertise:

  • Applicants should have extensive knowledge of the use of Canva or Adobe Creative Suite, particularly:
    • Canva presentations & videos
    • Adobe Illustrator
    • Adobe InDesign
    • Adobe Premiere / After Effects
  • A plus if you have knowledge of and experience using the following programs:
    • Microsoft Office
    • Youtube and similar platforms
    • Google Suite
    • Activecampaign
    • WordPress and other CMS programs

Where?
This role is initially fully digital/remote, eventually establishing our US Hubs for regular teaming and events. Given our HQ in Sydney Australia, the ideal candidate will be based on the west coast or in Austin, Texas to benefit from the overlapping timezone windows. 

Why Join Us?

  • Empower our users with helpful content
  • Learn digital marketing and content marketing real-life skills
  • Bring direct impact to the business and see blog traffic grow with your efforts
  • Be among team members who believe in working and playing hard 
  • Flourish in a flat organizational structure with no office politics

Benefits

At F4S, we are committed to living out our mission every day and that starts with providing benefits that allow our employees to care for themselves, support their families, and give back to their community. 

  • Access to F4S coaching
  • A competitive compensation plan with opportunity for advancement
  • Flexible paid time off
  • Per year: paid holidays and leave 
  • Learning and Development stipend
  • Amazing high performing remote global team 
  • Incredible culture and community

We are hiring for many role types including Full-time, part-time, contract, internships.

We look forward to you joining us in our very real mission to make human development accessible to everyone!

hello@f4s.com

How to get started?

Go to F4S.com to complete the F4S Questionnaire (15-30 mins) to help us better understand your work-style motivations and how we can best support your onboarding. We look forward to making a positive impact with you!

title: Graphic Designer Level 3-25480
description:
Description:

This role will report to the National Creative Lead supporting Marsh & McLennan in Canada.

Marsh Canada is a PC based client with the majority of the work produced using corporate templates in various Microsoft programs. This is not a creative role. Our primary focus is Desktop Publishing, layout, text formatting and brand management.
• The ability to build client relationships and a focus on superior customer service is a key requirement of all applicants.
• Applicant needs to be professional, energetic and able manage numerous demands nationally.
• Only looking for applicants who are seeking a long term position.
• Experience in a corporate environment and using Word and PPT to create and format documents is required.
• Experience in Adobe Suite, including Acrobat Pro is a must.
• In office position only - not a remote work position

title: Graphic Designer (Digital Ads)
description:
We are looking for a digital graphic designer to join our Creative Studio team and help our clients deliver world-class advertising executions. 

As a Production Artist, you will work closely with Creative Strategists to drive the efficiency of the team, producing pixel-perfect client deliverables with speed and accuracy. 

StackAdapt is a Remote First company, we are open to candidates located anywhere in Canada for this position.

title: Painters Needed for the Summer!
description:
We’re hiring full time painters for the summer!

We are looking for individuals who want to be a part of a fun, high energy team and who love being outdoors!

Why is this the perfect summer position?

  • Work with your friends and roommates.
  • 40 PLUS hours available per week, earn $11,000- $14,000 this summer!
  • Work outside and get into shape.
  • Room to advance throughout the season to crew foreman or production manager.

Duties include:

  • Preparing, cleaning and repairing interior and exterior surfaces.
  • Applying paint, stains and other finishes using brushes, rollers and spray equipment.
  • Use of ladders, must not be afraid of heights!

Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required! If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.

 Apply now!

If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.']

title: Animation Artist
description:
Company Description

As a company founded and run by an artist, it's our mission to provide talented artists with the freedom and resources they need to deliver quality work and to thrive in a fun and creative environment.

Job Description

The Animation Artist creates hyper-realistic animation for creatures, characters and objects, ensuring to meet the high quality standards of Rodeo FX. 

Main responsibilities:

  • Develop performance and movement for a variety of creatures, animals, characters and objects, generating original concepts and designs as needed;
  • Work closely with the Animation Lead and Supervisor to find creative and technical solutions and approaches that enhance shots, while meeting project specifications and deadlines;
  • May participate in the development of tools and techniques for the department;
  • Perform quality control on shots before they are submitted for review/approval, ensuring all technical and creative standards are met, and promptly apply notes received;
  • Keep Production and the project team informed of the status of work, issues to be resolved, ramifications of problems encountered and recommend potential solutions;
  • Ensure deadlines are met, advising the project team promptly if delays could be expected.
Qualifications

  • Experience in a similar position, within the VFX industry;
  • Excellent knowledge of Maya software;
  • Good knowledge of body mechanics and facial animation;
  • Excellent sense of prioritization and respect of deadlines.


Additional Information

  • Full-time, Permanent Contract;
  • 5 paid sick days;
  • 2 additional statutory holidays in the winter holidays;
  • Group Insurance, access to Dialogue online support and to an Employee Assistance Program (EAP);
  • RRSP with employer contribution after 6 months of continuous employment;
  • Discounts with Bixi, Nautilus Plus and many more local businesses.

Diversity is a core value at Rodeo FX. We are passionate about building and sustaining an inclusive and equitable work environment where diversity is celebrated and valued. We believe every member on our team enriches our work by exposing us to a broad range of ways to perceive and interact with the world, identify challenges, and to design and deliver projects.

title: Senior Concept Artist
description:
Company Description

People Can Fly is one of the leading Polish gaming studios and a globally operating AAA game developer that made its mark on the action shooter genre with titles such as Painkiller, Bulletstorm, Gears of War: Judgement and Outriders. We are also one of the most experienced Unreal Engine studios in the world. We have gained a vast know-how as a part of Epic Games family and we have developed our unique, trademark approach to the engine as an independent studio. We are rapidly growing, ambitious company looking for the most promising talents working in the game industry.

In December 2020 studios’ holding company PCF Group S.A. debuted as a public company on the Warsaw Stock Exchange. Over the last 5 years, our studios have grown from 40 to over 350 people, whom we affectionately call ‘Aviators’. In addition to our headquarters in Warsaw, we have studios located in Poland (Lodz and Rzeszow), the UK (Newcastle), the US (New York and Chicago), and Canada (Montreal) – with plans to expand even further in near future! Recently, our family was extended with a newly formed partnership with Game On, a creative motion capture, animation, and audio studio with a portfolio of AAA collaborations.

To foster the creative process, we make sure that our culture stays informal, whilst direct
communication and a quick decision-making process really matter. As a PCF aviator, you will have a real impact on the games we’re working on. We also offer access to solid know-how, creative resources, and constructive feedback at every stage of development. Our modus operandi is based on staying dynamic, evolving in sync with gaming industry trends and focusing on delivering creative solutions in any circumstances.

During the pandemic, we have successfully transitioned to a remote work model, and we aim to develop it further and keep this option available to most of our employees. And with millions of players embracing our recent hit, Outriders, we can guarantee that you will work on the projects with true impact on the whole gaming community.

Project Dagger is a new IP developed with Take-Two Interactive. It’s a yet unannounced AAA action-adventure game developed by our North American team supported by PCF’s European studios.

Take flight on this amazing journey with us and spread your wings in the game industry! 

Job Description

Would you like to work with a team that consistently ships innovative and over-the-top action games?  Would you like to be the person engaged in development of our AAA products in New York? If you answered yes to any of those questions we would like to talk to you about joining our team here at People Can Fly.

People Can Fly is looking for a passionate Senior Concept Artist. You will be responsible for creating cool environments, characters, weapons and vehicles for our games and ensuring a consistent art style is maintained across the game. You need to have a creative mind, the ability to create scenes with a memorable “wow” factor, but with grounding details to make it believable and personal.

All applicants are required to relocate for full-time positions in New York. 

Qualifications

  • Strong understanding of color theory and how color affects mood & focal points
  • Strong portfolio showcasing your concept art skills
  • Solid traditional drawing skills and visual knowledge of human anatomy
  • Good mechanical design skills
  • Ability to show visual storytelling within an environment design
  • Traditional art skills along with core graphic design competencies (composition and layout, typography, color and light)
  • Strong Photoshop skills
  • Ability to work with several development teams, while maintaining consistency of design
  • Vector art creation (Flash, Illustrator) is a plus
  • 3D software knowledge (Maya/Max/SketchUp) is a plus


Additional Information

What we offer

  • 100% company paid Medical, Dental, and Vision plans 
  • Company-paid holidays and an attractive paid time off policy which includes 4 weeks of vacation
  • Relocation Assistance
  • Short and Long Term Disability, Life Insurance, Pet Insurance
  • Flexible Savings Account Programs
  • Commuter Tax benefits 
  • Discounted gym memberships to keep our staff healthy and happy
  • An informal atmosphere, no dress code, no unwanted formalities

title: Visual Designer
description:
Job Title: Visual Designer

Location: Toronto, ON

Duration: 6+ Months

Must-have

·         BA/BS degree in Design (e.g. interaction, graphic, visual communications, product, industrial), HCI, CS, or a related field or equivalent experience.

·         1-3 years design industry experience working on complex digital products.

·         Portfolio that includes web and/or mobile design samples.

·         Solid knowledge of design tools (Figma, Sketch, and InVision) and principles (typography, grid systems, visual hierarchy, colour, white space, etc.).

·         Understanding of responsive design and the utilization of design systems.

·         Solid problem-solving skills and the ability to build good working relationships.

Nice-to-have

·         Experience working in the Financial industry specifically with Wealth Management is an asset

·         General understanding of HTML/CSS (able to produce web-ready assets and designs)

title: Graphic Designer 3 - 16734
description:
Graphic Designer -- Social Content (Studios – Design Team)


Position Overview:

We are hiring a full-time Graphic Designer on our Design team ,  own in-house creative production team, for a one year contract.


Studios is composed of designers, photographers, producers, and web developers who partner with various teams to imagine, create and deliver creative content for both internal and external audiences.

You are a designer and creator well-versed in social media. In this role, you’ll be responsible for designing content for both corporate and executive channels; delivering graphic content for social platforms, like Instagram. To be successful, you’ll have to have strong creative skills (the ability to create compelling static and motion content for all social platforms), be fantastic with clients, and deliver content quickly (because social is all about being there in the moment). As part of our nimble and experienced design team, you’ll also be part of other design projects for a wide variety of mediums as required.

Reporting to the Manager,  Studios – Design, you will be part of a team of professionals who are restless in their search for new ways to engage audiences. Our culture fosters collaborative learning in a fast-paced environment. We push boundaries while protecting thebrand and supporting our clients.

Responsibilities:
  • Lead the creation of social-first content from ideation to delivery
  • Partner with social media and communications teams on content planning and execution
  • Push the boundaries for what is possible on social media using different formats (photo, GIF, cinemagraph, motion graphic, typography, illustration, etc.)
  • Keep up to date with industry trends and social media best practices
  • Work independently as well as collaboratively while taking direction from others

Required Skills & Abilities:
  • Fluency in Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects
  • Photography skills, specifically proficiency with photo editing apps for social is a plus
  • Solid typography, motion graphic and graphic design skills
  • Demonstrated ability to think quickly and creatively – must thrive on pace
  • Understanding of design principles and the application of brand guidelines
  • Strong communication and writing skills

Required Experience:
2-3 years industry experience
A diploma or degree in graphic design or communications (or equivalent)
An online portfolio that demonstrates strong aesthetics and design principles (provided during application)
Location: Toronto (preferred) or Vancouver

title: Painters Needed for the Summer!
description:
We’re hiring full time painters for the summer!

We are looking for individuals who want to be a part of a fun, high energy team and who love being outdoors!

Why is this the perfect summer position?

  • Work with your friends and roommates.
  • 40 PLUS hours available per week, earn $11,000- $14,000 this summer!
  • Work outside and get into shape.
  • Room to advance throughout the season to crew foreman or production manager.

Duties include:

  • Preparing, cleaning and repairing interior and exterior surfaces.
  • Applying paint, stains and other finishes using brushes, rollers and spray equipment.
  • Use of ladders, must not be afraid of heights!

Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required! If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.

 Apply now!

If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.']

title: Animation Artist
description:
Company Description

As a company founded and run by an artist, it's our mission to provide talented artists with the freedom and resources they need to deliver quality work and to thrive in a fun and creative environment.

Job Description

The Animation Artist creates hyper-realistic animation for creatures, characters and objects, ensuring to meet the high quality standards of Rodeo FX. 

Main responsibilities:

  • Develop performance and movement for a variety of creatures, animals, characters and objects, generating original concepts and designs as needed;
  • Work closely with the Animation Lead and Supervisor to find creative and technical solutions and approaches that enhance shots, while meeting project specifications and deadlines;
  • May participate in the development of tools and techniques for the department;
  • Perform quality control on shots before they are submitted for review/approval, ensuring all technical and creative standards are met, and promptly apply notes received;
  • Keep Production and the project team informed of the status of work, issues to be resolved, ramifications of problems encountered and recommend potential solutions;
  • Ensure deadlines are met, advising the project team promptly if delays could be expected.
Qualifications

  • Experience in a similar position, within the VFX industry;
  • Excellent knowledge of Maya software;
  • Good knowledge of body mechanics and facial animation;
  • Excellent sense of prioritization and respect of deadlines.


Additional Information

  • Full-time, Permanent Contract;
  • 5 paid sick days;
  • 2 additional statutory holidays in the winter holidays;
  • Group Insurance, access to Dialogue online support and to an Employee Assistance Program (EAP);
  • RRSP with employer contribution after 6 months of continuous employment;
  • Discounts with Bixi, Nautilus Plus and many more local businesses.

Diversity is a core value at Rodeo FX. We are passionate about building and sustaining an inclusive and equitable work environment where diversity is celebrated and valued. We believe every member on our team enriches our work by exposing us to a broad range of ways to perceive and interact with the world, identify challenges, and to design and deliver projects.

title: Senior Technical Artist
description:
Company Description

People Can Fly is one of the leading independent AAA games development studios with an international team of hundreds of talented individuals working from offices located in Poland, UK, US, and Canada, and from all over the world thanks to our remote work programs.

Founded in 2002, we made our mark on the shooter genre with titles such as Painkiller, Bulletstorm, Gears of War: Judgment, and Outriders. We are one of the most experienced Unreal Engine studios in the industry and we are expanding it with in-house solutions called PCF Framework.

Our creative teams are currently working on several exciting AAA projects with the top publishers in the industry: Project Gemini with Square Enix and Project Dagger with Take-Two (2K), in addition to a new IP to be self-published and two other games in a concept phase. One of our IPs is also being adapted for VR technology.

With over 20 years of experience, PCF sets out to explore new horizons. We aim to combine our expertise with creativity of the best and most forward-thinking talents in the industry to work together on the new generation of action games for the global gaming community.

If you decide to accompany us on this journey, you’ll have a chance to perfect your craft and expand your knowledge, working alongside leaders in the industry on bringing a brand-new unique experience to the players worldwide.

If you feel yourself able to deliver as nobody else, take ownership of your projects, and are ready to leave a mark on a game you work on, apply now!

Job Description

 

  • Creating materials and support and existing material systems.
  • Making final materials for characters, environment assets, effects etc, anything that is overly complex or technical Level Work.
  • Working closely with the art team making the result of their work even better with a good artistic eye
  • Identifying problems and proposing solutions and optimization.
  • Using diagnostic tools to examine the current content and identify areas for improvement as well as develop the tools
  • Working with programmers on developing new features and workflows
  • Maintaining the production and software pipeline and meeting deadlines
  • Bug Fixing and describing R&D case studies in the knowledge base

 

    Qualifications

    • At least 5 years of game development experience
    • Shipped title experience
    • Experience in several aspects of creating game content
    • Knowledge of Unreal Engine tools and best practices
    • Solid understanding of game dev standard pipelines and tools
    • Strong modeling and texturing skills
    • Experience with various software packages including Maya, Photoshop, Zbrush/Mudbox, Substance Designer
    • Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
    • Open-minded team player attitude
    • Strong work ethic and self-motivated
    • Visual scripting in Unreal Engine Editor
    • Passionate about playing and making video games

    Nice to have

    • Houdini knowledge is a plus
    • HLSL or shader programming experience is a plus
    • Scripting and plug-in writing skills with Maya, Python, or C is a plus


    Additional Information

    What we offer:

    U.S.

    • 100% group health insurance benefit premiums paid by PCF (Medical, Dental, Vision, Group Life, and Supplemental Live) and start on day 1 of employment.
    • 401K with 100% match, up to 3% of employee salary, and vested immediately.
    • Paid week off during Winter Holidays.
    • 20 paid vacation days and 5 paid sick days.
    • Free virtual health and mental wellbeing sessions included in the plan for members and their dependents.
    • A competitive salary and performance-based annual bonuses.
    • Personal development opportunities and ability to work in a global environment.
    • Work in a creative team with people full of passion for what they do.
    • Long term disability, short term disability, travel insurance, as well as other benefits provided. 

    Canada

    • Benefit package 100% paid by PCF. Insurance company reimburses 100% of claims (Up to $500 per service a year, as well as individual family coverage).
    • Full Dental coverage, including major dental and orthodontics.
    • 4% RRSP matching before tax deductions, 100% vested on day 1.
    • Paid week off during Winter Holidays.
    • 20 paid vacation days and 5 paid sick days.
    • Free virtual health and mental wellbeing sessions included in the plan for members and their dependents.
    • A competitive salary and performance-based annual bonuses.
    • Personal development opportunities and ability to work in a global environment.
    • Work in a creative team with people full of passion for what they do.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
GRAPHIC DESIGNER ROLE

Become one of the most impactful Graphic Designer on the planet!

WHY YOU WILL LOVE FINGERPRINT FOR SUCCESS (F4S) 

We are a groundbreaking technology platform that is expanding and growing rapidly around the world.We are looking to onboard and hire the next generation of graphic designers to help our customers set and achieve their crazy big goals.

Fingerprint for Success (F4S) is the future of human development. We are on a mission to empower individuals and teams to solve the worldâ€™s biggest problems. Featuring a vast range of tools for collaboration, performance, wellbeing, diversity, and inclusion, plus a huge library of AI and human coaching programs, with F4S anyone can develop and achieve amazing things at work and in life.

Until now professional coaching has been reserved only for the elite, financially inaccessible to most of the worldâ€™s population. Driven by a scientific evidence-based methodology, F4S democratizes coaching, creating for the first time a scalable human development solution for everyone. Through predictive data, conversational A.I., and also some of the world's very best professional coaches, F4S is loved by consumers, teams, enterprises, universities, and professional coaches alike.

We are a digital-first, small but fast-growing values-led team, genuinely on a mission to change the world. We are swift, passionate, hard-working, scaling ourselves at the same pace we grow our product and customers. We invest deeply in our company culture and our teamâ€™s wellbeing, knowing this is the well from where the worldâ€™s greatest products and companies flourish. 

Who you are:

  • An open-minded person who is willing to learn and become one of the most impactful graphic designers in the world 
  • A person with an insatiable curiosity and unrelenting drive to learn, succeed and lead by example
  • A person who is a force for good and celebrate individual uniqueness
  • Be driven by helping their team meet and exceed aggressive conversion targets and individual career goals. 
  • Be passionate about creating purposeful and valuable content that helps business professionals grow better.
  • Be highly organized and have a high level of accountability for the quality and outcomes of your work and your teamâ€™s work.
  • Lead with empathy, serve as an ally for underrepresented communities, and create psychological safety to ensure the team can do their best work. 
  • Able to identify design needs to continuously elevate the quality of digital marketing and brand management
  • A keen eye for aesthetics and details
  • Effective communication skills and comfortable with candor.
  • Strong prioritization skills and ability to consistently meet deadlines.
  • Ability to work independently (while also functioning and contributing as part of a team) and efficiently manage your own time.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills

The Graphic Designer will assist the Marketing Team with the production and implementation of the companyâ€™s portfolio of creative requirements.

What youâ€™ll do:

  • Responsible for creative design solutions that have a high visual impact
  • Creates branding proposals, advertising materials, e-books, magazines, brochures, folders, packaging, exhibitions and display materials, flyers, and online materials such as Facebook and Instagram posts, online ads and banners, as well as company AVPs and other video material.
  • Responsible for creating branding standard guidelines for the company and ensuring all design outputs are aligned with the company's and brandsâ€™ standards
  • Prepares rough drafts of material based on an agreed brief
  • Reviews final layouts and suggests improvements if required

Qualifications (any or all):

  • Entry-level 
  • Intermediate to proficient in layout design, with at least 1 - 2 years experience in doing layouts whether in a professional or freelance capacity.
  • Candidates with more experience are welcome to apply.
  • At least basic in illustrations, 2D animation, and storyboards.
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree.
  • Required skill(s): Canva or Adobe Photoshop (proficient), Adobe Illustrator (proficient), Adobe After Effects (basic - intermediate)
  • Has a creative flair in design and a good sense of art.
  • Has a strong design sense of color, layout, and typography.
  • Has strong creative skills and the ability to design ideas for a wide range of industries.
  • Has creative conceptualization ability as well as technical execution capability.
  • Can translate complex data or information into easy-to-digest designs, layouts, and infographics.
  • Has the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
  • Strong communication and organization skills.
  • Able to multi-task and can gracefully handle pressure.
  • Willing to learn other multimedia software apart from Adobe creative tools to deliver other multimedia-related work.

Software Expertise:

  • Applicants should have extensive knowledge of the use of Canva or Adobe Creative Suite, particularly:
    • Canva presentations & videos
    • Adobe Illustrator
    • Adobe InDesign
    • Adobe Premiere / After Effects
  • A plus if you have knowledge of and experience using the following programs:
    • Microsoft Office
    • Youtube and similar platforms
    • Google Suite
    • Activecampaign
    • WordPress and other CMS programs

Where?
This role is initially fully digital/remote, eventually establishing our US Hubs for regular teaming and events. Given our HQ in Sydney Australia, the ideal candidate will be based on the west coast or in Austin, Texas to benefit from the overlapping timezone windows. 

Why Join Us?

  • Empower our users with helpful content
  • Learn digital marketing and content marketing real-life skills
  • Bring direct impact to the business and see blog traffic grow with your efforts
  • Be among team members who believe in working and playing hard 
  • Flourish in a flat organizational structure with no office politics

Benefits

At F4S, we are committed to living out our mission every day and that starts with providing benefits that allow our employees to care for themselves, support their families, and give back to their community. 

  • Access to F4S coaching
  • A competitive compensation plan with opportunity for advancement
  • Flexible paid time off
  • Per year: paid holidays and leave 
  • Learning and Development stipend
  • Amazing high performing remote global team 
  • Incredible culture and community

We are hiring for many role types including Full-time, part-time, contract, internships.

We look forward to you joining us in our very real mission to make human development accessible to everyone!

hello@f4s.com

How to get started?

Go to F4S.com to complete the F4S Questionnaire (15-30 mins) to help us better understand your work-style motivations and how we can best support your onboarding. We look forward to making a positive impact with you!

Powered by JazzHR

title: Visual Designer
description:
Visual Designer

Our client, a highly reputable financial firm, is seeking an experienced Visual Designer with interaction design know-how. This is a full-time contract position offering competitive hourly pay based on experience Responsibilities center on harmonizing iconography, typography, color, space and texture to facilitate an engaging and efficient user experience. If you are a problem-solving digital professional who excels in a collaborative, team-focused environment AND you’re excited to create products that will be used by millions of people, apply now! *Portfolio with web or mobile design samples is require for consideration.

Details:
  • Location: Montreal preferred, Toronto, ON considered
  • Contract Length: Beginning 1/17/22 and continuing for 12 months.
  • Position Type: Full-time, Contract
  • Perks: This is an exciting opportunity to join a customer service-drive and team-focused company known for its supportive and innovative culture!
Responsibilities:
  • Develop designs that delight customers, encourage engagement, and support the exchange of information.
  • Create complex low-fidelity sketches, wireframes, and prototypes to explore, communicate, and validate ideas.
  • Cross-functionally facilitate constructive feedback sessions to evaluate interactions for inclusivity.
  • Champion collaborative brainstorming to support visual design strategies that advance efficiency and consistency across multiple disciplines.
  • Present visual design work to more senior stakeholders
  • Use visual-spatial displays to improve user comprehension and to improve task performance.
  • Use visualizations and interactions to support analytic thinking with large data sets
  • Research relevant visual design and communication strategies, and perform competitive audits as needed.
Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience in Design, Human Computer Interaction, Computer Science, or related field.
  • Portfolio with web or mobile design samples.
  • 5+ years prior experience designing usable interfaces across multiple channels and platforms.
  • Comprehensive understanding of interaction design theory, research data and best practices.
  • Experience in a large organization within an Agile environment.
  • Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Intermediate to advanced proficiency in Sketch, Photoshop and Illustrator.
  • Familiarity with presentation software, typography, grid systems, visual hierarchy, color, white space, and other design principles.
  • Experience using Figma is preferred.
  • Bilingual in English in French is a huge plus.

Mindlance is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in employment on the basis of – Minority/Gender/Disability/Religion/LGBTQI/Age/Veterans.

title: Graphic Designer Level 2-24904
description:
Description:

Marsh Canada is a PC based client with the majority of the work produced using corporate templates in various Microsoft programs. This is not a creative role. Our primary focus is Desktop Publishing, layout, text formatting and brand management. The ability to build client relationships and a focus on superior customer service is a key requirement of all applicants. Applicant needs to be professional, energetic and able manage numerous demands nationally.

Only looking for applicants who are seeking a long term position.

Experience in a corporate environment and using Word and PPT to create and format documents is required.

Experience in Adobe Suite, including Acrobat Pro is a must.


ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:
* Establish and maintain high levels of customer satisfaction
* Gather client requirements for all document design and printing projects
* Completing design projects independently with minimal guidance
* Advise clients on the best use of media
* Maintain strong relationships with clients
* Provide alternative visual and composition ideas to client
* Create or modify digital documents using office, desktop publishing and web page design software - using various platforms
* Adapt existing graphic elements with newly created graphics to complete graphic/digital projects
* Educate the client and Account Associates on designing, preparing and producing quality color documents
* Maintain file management
* Learn optimal qualities and configurations of  Printing Technology for jobs specific to the equipment * Remain fluent in current industry software (i.e. Quark, Illustrator, Photoshop, Web Publishing, Freehand, etc.) and graphic trends
* Work with print production staff to ensure hand-off design to production is efficient and error free * Provides consultation to customers to determine nature and content of designs
* Estimate costs of materials and time to complete graphic design
* Develop a concept from clear but broadly defined customer input
* Develop graphic elements that meet customer s objective * Prepare layouts and graphic elements of the subjects to be rendered
* Able to scan full colour images and accurately judge colour output on a variety of devices
* Use existing photo and illustration into design * Coordinate all aspects of print productions for print or electronic materials
* Complete all pre-flight requirements as needed
* Use customer feedback to improve performance graphics services at the site
* Demonstrates knowledge of industry trends, latest software applications and can articulate benefit to customer
SKILLS:
* Listen, understand and communicate effectively
* Able to work with minimal supervision
* Understand digital colour environment and requirements, able to prepress files in this environment * Understand colour issues as it relates to offset and digital colour printing
* Ability to comprehend and translate customer requests to job requirements
* Ability to work with others in a team environment
* Creative and design on small projects with some supervision
* Work in multidisciplinary environment
* Provides graphic and digital document design services from concept to design to print management seeking guidance when required * Working knowledge of multimedia software (i.e. Director) EDUCATION:
2 to 4 years graphic design/fine arts diploma/degree from recognized institution or post-secondary PC; Mac technology or graphics training or equivalent work experience in the graphics industry experience
EXPERIENCE:
In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with graphics design; desktop publishing and web page design software; digital colour preflight and prepress workflow competency.
Creative talent as evidenced by a portfolio of completed work.
Build and maintain relationships with customers and identify areas where relationships need to be built to increase use of design services.

title: Painters Needed for the Summer!
description:
We’re hiring full time painters for the summer!

We are looking for individuals who want to be a part of a fun, high energy team and who love being outdoors!

Why is this the perfect summer position?

  • Work with your friends and roommates.
  • 40 PLUS hours available per week, earn $11,000- $14,000 this summer!
  • Work outside and get into shape.
  • Room to advance throughout the season to crew foreman or production manager.

Duties include:

  • Preparing, cleaning and repairing interior and exterior surfaces.
  • Applying paint, stains and other finishes using brushes, rollers and spray equipment.
  • Use of ladders, must not be afraid of heights!

Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required! If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.

 Apply now!

title: Animation Artist
description:
Company Description

As a company founded and run by an artist, it's our mission to provide talented artists with the freedom and resources they need to deliver quality work and to thrive in a fun and creative environment.

Job Description

The Animation Artist creates hyper-realistic animation for creatures, characters and objects, ensuring to meet the high quality standards of Rodeo FX. 

Main responsibilities:

  • Develop performance and movement for a variety of creatures, animals, characters and objects;
  • Work closely with the Animation Lead and Supervisor to find creative and technical solutions and approaches that enhance shots, while meeting project specifications and deadlines;
  • May participate in the development of tools and techniques for the department;
  • Perform quality control on shots before they are submitted for review/approval, ensuring all technical and creative standards are met, and promptly apply notes received;
  • Keep Production and the project team informed of the status of work, issues to be resolved, ramifications of problems encountered and recommend potential solutions;
  • Ensure deadlines are met, advising the project team promptly if delays could be expected.
Qualifications

  • Experience in a similar position, within the VFX industry;
  • Excellent knowledge of Maya software;
  • Good knowledge of body mechanics and facial animation;
  • Excellent sense of prioritization and respect of deadlines.


Additional Information

  • Full-time, Permanent Contract;
  • 5 paid sick days;
  • 2 additional statutory holidays in the winter holidays;
  • Group Insurance, access to Dialogue online support and to an Employee Assistance Program (EAP);
  • RRSP with employer contribution.

Diversity is a core value at Rodeo FX. We are passionate about building and sustaining an inclusive and equitable work environment where diversity is celebrated and valued. We believe every member on our team enriches our work by exposing us to a broad range of ways to perceive and interact with the world, identify challenges, and to design and deliver projects.

title: Senior Material Artist
description:
Company Description

People Can Fly is one of the leading independent AAA games development studios with an international team of hundreds of talented individuals working from offices located in Poland, UK, US, and Canada, and from all over the world thanks to our remote work programs.

Founded in 2002, we made our mark on the shooter genre with titles such as Painkiller, Bulletstorm, Gears of War: Judgment, and Outriders. We are one of the most experienced Unreal Engine studios in the industry and we are expanding it with in-house solutions called PCF Framework.

Our creative teams are currently working on several exciting AAA projects with the top publishers in the industry: Project Gemini with Square Enix and Project Dagger with Take-Two (2K), in addition to a new IP to be self-published and two other games in a concept phase. One of our IPs is also being adapted for VR technology.

With over 20 years of experience, PCF sets out to explore new horizons. We aim to combine our expertise with creativity of the best and most forward-thinking talents in the industry to work together on the new generation of action games for the global gaming community.

If you decide to accompany us on this journey, you’ll have a chance to perfect your craft and expand your knowledge, working alongside leaders in the industry on bringing a brand-new unique experience to the players worldwide.

If you feel yourself able to deliver as nobody else, take ownership of your projects, and are ready to leave a mark on a game you work on, apply now!

Job Description

  • Creating high quality, game ready materials in a stylized format

  • Maintain an internal material library

  • Drive the look of the stylization of our textures

  • Collaborate with artists to create specific materials for in-game use

  • Cooperating with Tech Art on pipeline improvements

  • Maintaining the production and software pipeline and meeting deadlines

  • Providing R&D projects and pipeline and workflows improvements

  • Bug Fixing and describing R&D case studies in knowledge base

  • Share knowledge with less experienced peers

  • Occasionally supporting Lead in recruitment projects with HR collaboration

Qualifications

  • 7 years of experience in all aspects of the latest Material creation workflows

  • Shipped AAA title experience

  • Strong leadership and mentoring experience

  • Experienced organizing self. 

  • Expert knowledge of Substance Designer and Painter workflows

  • Expert knowledge of Photoshop

  • Advanced material creation in Unreal Engine

  • Strong knowledge of Zbrush modeling techniques for material creation

  • Ability to unwrap UVs for texturing meshes and lightmaps

  • Experience creating high quality creative/visual aesthetics as well as technical knowledge

  • Ability to adapt with minimum guidance new styles, techniques and workflows

  • Strong skills in using PBR shaders and normal maps on daily basis

  • Great understanding of color theory

  • Understanding of memory and frame budgets

  • Experience creating high quality creative/visual aesthetics as well as technical knowledge

  • Ability to show examples of top notch textures made for next gen console games

  • Skilled at balancing art quality and performance in the game engine

  • Strong verbal and written communication skills in English

  • Open-minded team player attitude

  • Strong work ethic and self-motivated

  • Passionate about playing and making video games



Additional Information

What we offer:

U.S.

  • 100% group health insurance benefit premiums paid by PCF (Medical, Dental, Vision, Group Life, and Supplemental Live) and start on day 1 of employment.
  • 401K with 100% match, up to 3% of employee salary, and vested immediately.
  • Paid week off during Winter Holidays.
  • 20 paid vacation days and 5 paid sick days.
  • Free virtual health and mental wellbeing sessions included in the plan for members and their dependents.
  • A competitive salary and performance-based annual bonuses.
  • Personal development opportunities and ability to work in a global environment.
  • Work in a creative team with people full of passion for what they do.
  • Long term disability, short term disability, travel insurance, as well as other benefits provided. 

Canada

  • Benefit package 100% paid by PCF. Insurance company reimburses 100% of claims (Up to $500 per service a year, as well as individual family coverage).
  • Full Dental coverage, including major dental and orthodontics.
  • 4% RRSP matching before tax deductions, 100% vested on day 1.
  • Paid week off during Winter Holidays.
  • 20 paid vacation days and 5 paid sick days.
  • Free virtual health and mental wellbeing sessions included in the plan for members and their dependents.
  • A competitive salary and performance-based annual bonuses.
  • Personal development opportunities and ability to work in a global environment.
  • Work in a creative team with people full of passion for what they do.
  • Long term disability, short term disability, travel insurance, as well as other benefits provided.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
GRAPHIC DESIGNER ROLE

Become one of the most impactful Graphic Designer on the planet!

WHY YOU WILL LOVE FINGERPRINT FOR SUCCESS (F4S) 

We are a groundbreaking technology platform that is expanding and growing rapidly around the world.We are looking to onboard and hire the next generation of graphic designers to help our customers set and achieve their crazy big goals.

Fingerprint for Success (F4S) is the future of human development. We are on a mission to empower individuals and teams to solve the worldâ€™s biggest problems. Featuring a vast range of tools for collaboration, performance, wellbeing, diversity, and inclusion, plus a huge library of AI and human coaching programs, with F4S anyone can develop and achieve amazing things at work and in life.

Until now professional coaching has been reserved only for the elite, financially inaccessible to most of the worldâ€™s population. Driven by a scientific evidence-based methodology, F4S democratizes coaching, creating for the first time a scalable human development solution for everyone. Through predictive data, conversational A.I., and also some of the world's very best professional coaches, F4S is loved by consumers, teams, enterprises, universities, and professional coaches alike.

We are a digital-first, small but fast-growing values-led team, genuinely on a mission to change the world. We are swift, passionate, hard-working, scaling ourselves at the same pace we grow our product and customers. We invest deeply in our company culture and our teamâ€™s wellbeing, knowing this is the well from where the worldâ€™s greatest products and companies flourish. 

Who you are:

  • An open-minded person who is willing to learn and become one of the most impactful graphic designers in the world 
  • A person with an insatiable curiosity and unrelenting drive to learn, succeed and lead by example
  • A person who is a force for good and celebrate individual uniqueness
  • Be driven by helping their team meet and exceed aggressive conversion targets and individual career goals. 
  • Be passionate about creating purposeful and valuable content that helps business professionals grow better.
  • Be highly organized and have a high level of accountability for the quality and outcomes of your work and your teamâ€™s work.
  • Lead with empathy, serve as an ally for underrepresented communities, and create psychological safety to ensure the team can do their best work. 
  • Able to identify design needs to continuously elevate the quality of digital marketing and brand management
  • A keen eye for aesthetics and details
  • Effective communication skills and comfortable with candor.
  • Strong prioritization skills and ability to consistently meet deadlines.
  • Ability to work independently (while also functioning and contributing as part of a team) and efficiently manage your own time.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills

The Graphic Designer will assist the Marketing Team with the production and implementation of the companyâ€™s portfolio of creative requirements.

What youâ€™ll do:

  • Responsible for creative design solutions that have a high visual impact
  • Creates branding proposals, advertising materials, e-books, magazines, brochures, folders, packaging, exhibitions and display materials, flyers, and online materials such as Facebook and Instagram posts, online ads and banners, as well as company AVPs and other video material.
  • Responsible for creating branding standard guidelines for the company and ensuring all design outputs are aligned with the company's and brandsâ€™ standards
  • Prepares rough drafts of material based on an agreed brief
  • Reviews final layouts and suggests improvements if required

Qualifications (any or all):

  • Entry-level 
  • Intermediate to proficient in layout design, with at least 1 - 2 years experience in doing layouts whether in a professional or freelance capacity.
  • Candidates with more experience are welcome to apply.
  • At least basic in illustrations, 2D animation, and storyboards.
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree.
  • Required skill(s): Canva or Adobe Photoshop (proficient), Adobe Illustrator (proficient), Adobe After Effects (basic - intermediate)
  • Has a creative flair in design and a good sense of art.
  • Has a strong design sense of color, layout, and typography.
  • Has strong creative skills and the ability to design ideas for a wide range of industries.
  • Has creative conceptualization ability as well as technical execution capability.
  • Can translate complex data or information into easy-to-digest designs, layouts, and infographics.
  • Has the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
  • Strong communication and organization skills.
  • Able to multi-task and can gracefully handle pressure.
  • Willing to learn other multimedia software apart from Adobe creative tools to deliver other multimedia-related work.

Software Expertise:

  • Applicants should have extensive knowledge of the use of Canva or Adobe Creative Suite, particularly:
    • Canva presentations & videos
    • Adobe Illustrator
    • Adobe InDesign
    • Adobe Premiere / After Effects
  • A plus if you have knowledge of and experience using the following programs:
    • Microsoft Office
    • Youtube and similar platforms
    • Google Suite
    • Activecampaign
    • WordPress and other CMS programs

Where?
This role is initially fully digital/remote, eventually establishing our US Hubs for regular teaming and events. Given our HQ in Sydney Australia, the ideal candidate will be based on the west coast or in Austin, Texas to benefit from the overlapping timezone windows. 

Why Join Us?

  • Empower our users with helpful content
  • Learn digital marketing and content marketing real-life skills
  • Bring direct impact to the business and see blog traffic grow with your efforts
  • Be among team members who believe in working and playing hard 
  • Flourish in a flat organizational structure with no office politics

Benefits

At F4S, we are committed to living out our mission every day and that starts with providing benefits that allow our employees to care for themselves, support their families, and give back to their community. 

  • Access to F4S coaching
  • A competitive compensation plan with opportunity for advancement
  • Flexible paid time off
  • Per year: paid holidays and leave 
  • Learning and Development stipend
  • Amazing high performing remote global team 
  • Incredible culture and community

We are hiring for many role types including Full-time, part-time, contract, internships.

We look forward to you joining us in our very real mission to make human development accessible to everyone!

hello@f4s.com

How to get started?

Go to F4S.com to complete the F4S Questionnaire (15-30 mins) to help us better understand your work-style motivations and how we can best support your onboarding. We look forward to making a positive impact with you!

Powered by JazzHR

title: Content Designer
description:
Content Designer

Our client, a highly reputable financial firm, is seeking an experienced Content Designer to shape the development of branded digital products. This is a full-time contract position offering competitive hourly pay based on experience. Responsibilities center on collaborating cross-functionally produce content that is tailored to the client’s needs and interests. If you are a problem-solver who excels in a collaborative, team-focused environment AND you are excited to create products that will be used by millions of people, apply now! *Portfolio demonstrating Portfolio demonstrating copywriting work required for consideration.

Details:
  • Location: Toronto, ON
  • Contract Length: Beginning 1/24/22 and continuing for 12 months.
  • Position Type: Full-time, Contract
  • Perks: This is an exciting opportunity to join a customer service-driven, team-focused company known for its supportive culture!
Responsibilities:
  • Create strategies for using content to support clients' needs.
  • Facilitate collaborative design activities and ideation sessions.
  • Provide practical direction to the larger design team on Content Design communications standards, tools, channels and processes.
  • Champion client needs and interests in discussions about the role of content in company products.
  • Create client-focused textual content, including labels, explanatory text, hidden or alternative text, metadata, and support content as well as go-to-market content.
  • Apply the principles of Inclusive Design in content design and creation.
  • Work with Legal, Compliance, and Regulatory teams to ensure that our digital conversations satisfy our legal and regulatory responsibilities.
  • Manage the documentation and sharing of content throughout its lifecycle.
  • Research content and messaging strategies in the competitive landscape and perform competitive audits pertinent to specific design or business goals.
  • Perform content audits where appropriate.

Requirements:
  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent.
  • Minimum 4+ years prior writing experience at a creative agency or in-house creative team required.
  • Portfolio demonstrating copywriting work.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and critical thinking skills.
  • A working knowledge of accessibility standards and methods to address them is preferred.
  • Must remain up to date on current and emerging design and technology trends.
  • Fluency in French is a huge plus.
Mindlance is an Equal Opportunity Employer and does not discriminate in employment on the basis of – Minority/Gender/Disability/Religion/LGBTQI/Age/Veterans.

title: Painters Needed for the Summer!
description:
We’re hiring full time painters for the summer!

We are looking for individuals who want to be a part of a fun, high energy team and who love being outdoors!

Why is this the perfect summer position?

  • Work with your friends and roommates.
  • 40 PLUS hours available per week, earn $11,000- $14,000 this summer!
  • Work outside and get into shape.
  • Room to advance throughout the season to crew foreman or production manager.

Duties include:

  • Preparing, cleaning and repairing interior and exterior surfaces.
  • Applying paint, stains and other finishes using brushes, rollers and spray equipment.
  • Use of ladders, must not be afraid of heights!

Previous painting experience is an asset, but not required! If you have a can-do attitude and great work ethic, we will provide all training. Labour experience such as landscaping, warehouse and heavy equipment work, grounds crew and athletics are also considered assets.

 Apply now!
